<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="pt-BR">
<head>
    <meta charset="UTF-8">
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
    <title>Disparos de Mensagens</title>
    <style>
        * {
            margin: 0;
            padding: 0;
            box-sizing: border-box;
        }

        body {
            background: linear-gradient(135deg, #0a0a0a 0%, #1a1a1a 100%);
            font-family: -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, 'Segoe UI', Roboto, sans-serif;
            color: white;
            min-height: 100vh;
            margin: 0;
            padding: 0;
        }

        .app-layout {
            display: flex;
            min-height: 100vh;
        }

        /* Sidebar */
        .sidebar {
            width: 70px;
            background: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.3);
            backdrop-filter: blur(10px);
            border-right: 1px solid rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.1);
            transition: all 0.3s ease;
            position: relative;
            z-index: 1000;
            display: flex;
            flex-direction: column;
            height: 100vh;
        }

        .sidebar:hover {
            width: 250px;
        }

        .sidebar-header {
            padding: 20px;
            text-align: center;
            border-bottom: 1px solid rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.1);
        }

        .sidebar-logo {
            font-size: 1.5rem;
            font-weight: 600;
            background: linear-gradient(135deg, #25d366 0%, #128c7e 100%);
            -webkit-background-clip: text;
            -webkit-text-fill-color: transparent;
            background-clip: text;
            white-space: nowrap;
            opacity: 0;
            transition: opacity 0.3s ease;
        }

        .sidebar:hover .sidebar-logo {
            opacity: 1;
        }

        .sidebar-menu {
            padding: 20px 0;
            flex: 1;
        }

        .menu-item {
            display: flex;
            align-items: center;
            padding: 15px 20px;
            color: #ccc;
            text-decoration: none;
            transition: all 0.3s ease;
            position: relative;
            white-space: nowrap;
        }

        .menu-item:hover {
            background: rgba(37, 211, 102, 0.1);
            color: #25d366;
        }

        .menu-item.active {
            background: rgba(37, 211, 102, 0.2);
            color: #25d366;
            border-right: 3px solid #25d366;
        }

        .menu-icon {
            font-size: 1.2rem;
            width: 30px;
            text-align: center;
            flex-shrink: 0;
        }

        .menu-text {
            margin-left: 15px;
            opacity: 0;
            transition: opacity 0.3s ease;
        }

        .sidebar:hover .menu-text {
            opacity: 1;
        }

        .sidebar-footer {
            margin-top: auto;
            border-top: 1px solid rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.1);
            padding: 10px 0;
        }

        .logout-item {
            color: #ff6b6b !important;
        }

        .logout-item:hover {
            background: rgba(255, 107, 107, 0.1) !important;
            color: #ff6b6b !important;
        }

        /* Main content */
        .main-content-wrapper {
            flex: 1;
            padding: 20px;
            overflow-x: auto;
        }

        .container {
            max-width: 1400px;
            margin: 0 auto;
        }

        .header {
            margin-bottom: 40px;
        }

        .header-info h1 {
            font-size: 2.5rem;
            font-weight: 600;
            margin-bottom: 10px;
            color: white;
        }

        .header-info p {
            color: #888;
            font-size: 1.1rem;
        }

        .main-content {
            display: grid;
            grid-template-columns: 1fr 400px;
            gap: 40px;
        }

        .form-container {
            background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.02);
            border: 1px solid rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.1);
            border-radius: 16px;
            padding: 40px;
            backdrop-filter: blur(10px);
        }

        .form-grid {
            display: grid;
            grid-template-columns: 1fr 1fr;
            gap: 30px;
            margin-bottom: 30px;
        }

        .form-group {
            display: flex;
            flex-direction: column;
        }

        .form-group.full-width {
            grid-column: 1 / -1;
        }

        .form-group label {
            color: #fff;
            font-weight: 500;
            margin-bottom: 8px;
            font-size: 0.95rem;
        }

        .form-group input,
        .form-group textarea {
            background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.05);
            border: 1px solid rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.2);
            border-radius: 8px;
            padding: 12px 15px;
            color: white;
            font-size: 1rem;
            outline: none;
            transition: all 0.3s ease;
        }

        .form-group input:focus,
        .form-group textarea:focus {
            border-color: #25d366;
            box-shadow: 0 0 0 2px rgba(37, 211, 102, 0.2);
        }

        .form-group input::placeholder,
        .form-group textarea::placeholder {
            color: #888;
        }

        .form-group textarea {
            resize: vertical;
            min-height: 100px;
        }

        .messages-section {
            margin-bottom: 30px;
        }

        .message-item {
            background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.02);
            border: 1px solid rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.1);
            border-radius: 12px;
            padding: 20px;
            margin-bottom: 15px;
        }

        .message-header {
            display: flex;
            justify-content: space-between;
            align-items: center;
            margin-bottom: 15px;
        }

        .message-title {
            color: #25d366;
            font-size: 0.9rem;
            font-weight: 600;
        }

        .remove-message {
            background: rgba(255, 59, 48, 0.1);
            border: 1px solid rgba(255, 59, 48, 0.3);
            color: #ff3b30;
            padding: 5px 10px;
            border-radius: 6px;
            cursor: pointer;
            font-size: 0.8rem;
            transition: all 0.3s ease;
        }

        .remove-message:hover {
            background: rgba(255, 59, 48, 0.2);
        }

        .media-upload {
            display: grid;
            grid-template-columns: repeat(4, 1fr);
            gap: 10px;
            margin-top: 15px;
        }

        .media-preview-section {
            margin-top: 15px;
        }

        .media-selected {
            background: rgba(37, 211, 102, 0.1);
            border: 1px solid rgba(37, 211, 102, 0.3);
            border-radius: 8px;
            padding: 12px;
            display: flex;
            align-items: center;
            justify-content: space-between;
        }

        .media-info-display {
            display: flex;
            align-items: center;
            gap: 10px;
        }

        .media-icon-display {
            font-size: 1.2rem;
        }

        .media-name-display {
            color: #fff;
            font-weight: 500;
        }

        .media-size-display {
            color: #888;
            font-size: 0.9rem;
        }

        .remove-media-btn {
            background: rgba(255, 59, 48, 0.1);
            border: 1px solid rgba(255, 59, 48, 0.3);
            color: #ff3b30;
            padding: 5px 8px;
            border-radius: 4px;
            cursor: pointer;
            font-size: 0.9rem;
            transition: all 0.3s ease;
        }

        .remove-media-btn:hover {
            background: rgba(255, 59, 48, 0.2);
        }

        .media-btn {
            background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.05);
            border: 1px solid rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.2);
            border-radius: 8px;
            padding: 12px 8px;
            color: white;
            cursor: pointer;
            text-align: center;
            font-size: 0.8rem;
            transition: all 0.3s ease;
            position: relative;
        }

        .media-btn:hover {
            background: rgba(37, 211, 102, 0.1);
            border-color: #25d366;
        }

        .media-btn input[type="file"] {
            position: absolute;
            opacity: 0;
            width: 100%;
            height: 100%;
            cursor: pointer;
        }

        .media-btn.active {
            background: rgba(37, 211, 102, 0.2);
            border-color: #25d366;
            color: #25d366;
        }

        .file-size-limit {
            font-size: 0.7rem;
            color: #888;
            margin-top: 4px;
            font-weight: 400;
        }

        .add-message-btn {
            width: 100%;
            padding: 15px;
            background: rgba(37, 211, 102, 0.1);
            border: 2px dashed rgba(37, 211, 102, 0.3);
            border-radius: 8px;
            color: #25d366;
            font-size: 1rem;
            cursor: pointer;
            transition: all 0.3s ease;
            margin-bottom: 20px;
        }

        .add-message-btn:hover {
            background: rgba(37, 211, 102, 0.2);
            border-color: #25d366;
        }

        .time-range {
            display: flex;
            gap: 20px;
            align-items: center;
        }

        .time-input {
            flex: 0 0 auto;
        }

        .time-separator {
            color: #888;
            font-weight: 500;
            font-size: 0.9rem;
            padding: 0 5px;
        }

        .file-upload {
            position: relative;
            display: flex;
            flex-direction: column;
            align-items: center;
            padding: 30px;
            border: 2px dashed rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.3);
            border-radius: 12px;
            background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.02);
            transition: all 0.3s ease;
            cursor: pointer;
        }

        .file-upload:hover {
            border-color: #25d366;
            background: rgba(37, 211, 102, 0.05);
        }

        .file-upload.dragover {
            border-color: #25d366;
            background: rgba(37, 211, 102, 0.1);
        }

        .file-upload input[type="file"] {
            position: absolute;
            opacity: 0;
            width: 100%;
            height: 100%;
            cursor: pointer;
        }

        .file-upload-content {
            text-align: center;
            pointer-events: none;
        }

        .file-upload-icon {
            font-size: 3rem;
            color: #25d366;
            margin-bottom: 15px;
        }

        .file-upload-text {
            color: #fff;
            font-size: 1.1rem;
            margin-bottom: 5px;
        }

        .file-upload-hint {
            color: #888;
            font-size: 0.9rem;
        }

        .file-info {
            display: none;
            background: rgba(37, 211, 102, 0.1);
            border: 1px solid rgba(37, 211, 102, 0.3);
            border-radius: 8px;
            padding: 15px;
            margin-top: 15px;
        }

        .file-info.show {
            display: block;
        }

        .file-info-content {
            display: flex;
            align-items: center;
            justify-content: space-between;
        }

        .file-details {
            display: flex;
            align-items: center;
            gap: 10px;
        }

        .file-icon {
            color: #25d366;
            font-size: 1.2rem;
        }

        .file-name {
            color: #fff;
            font-weight: 500;
        }

        .contact-count {
            color: #25d366;
            font-size: 0.9rem;
        }

        .remove-file {
            background: none;
            border: none;
            color: #ff3b30;
            cursor: pointer;
            font-size: 1.2rem;
            padding: 5px;
            border-radius: 4px;
            transition: all 0.3s ease;
        }

        .remove-file:hover {
            background: rgba(255, 59, 48, 0.1);
        }

        .dispatch-btn {
            width: 100%;
            padding: 18px;
            background: linear-gradient(135deg, #25d366 0%, #128c7e 100%);
            border: none;
            border-radius: 12px;
            color: white;
            font-size: 1.1rem;
            font-weight: 600;
            cursor: pointer;
            transition: all 0.3s ease;
            margin-top: 20px;
            display: flex;
            align-items: center;
            justify-content: center;
            gap: 10px;
        }

        .dispatch-btn:hover {
            transform: translateY(-2px);
            box-shadow: 0 12px 30px rgba(37, 211, 102, 0.4);
        }

        .dispatch-btn:disabled {
            background: #444;
            cursor: not-allowed;
            transform: none;
            box-shadow: none;
        }



        .loading-connections {
            text-align: center;
            padding: 40px 20px;
            color: #888;
        }

        .loading-spinner-large {
            width: 40px;
            height: 40px;
            border: 3px solid rgba(37, 211, 102, 0.3);
            border-top: 3px solid #25d366;
            border-radius: 50%;
            animation: spin 1s linear infinite;
            margin: 0 auto 15px;
        }

        .connections-section {
            margin-bottom: 30px;
        }

        .connections-grid {
            display: grid;
            grid-template-columns: repeat(auto-fill, minmax(250px, 1fr));
            gap: 15px;
            margin-top: 15px;
        }

        .loading-connections {
            text-align: center;
            padding: 40px 20px;
            color: #888;
        }

        .loading-spinner-large {
            width: 40px;
            height: 40px;
            border: 3px solid rgba(37, 211, 102, 0.3);
            border-top: 3px solid #25d366;
            border-radius: 50%;
            animation: spin 1s linear infinite;
            margin: 0 auto 15px;
        }

        .connections-section {
            margin-bottom: 30px;
        }

        .connections-grid {
            display: grid;
            grid-template-columns: repeat(auto-fill, minmax(200px, 1fr));
            gap: 12px;
            margin-top: 15px;
            max-height: 180px; /* Altura para 3 linhas (3 x 50px + 2 x 12px gap) */
            overflow-y: auto;
            padding-right: 5px;
        }

        /* Estiliza√ß√£o da scrollbar */
        .connections-grid::-webkit-scrollbar {
            width: 6px;
        }

        .connections-grid::-webkit-scrollbar-track {
            background: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.05);
            border-radius: 3px;
        }

        .connections-grid::-webkit-scrollbar-thumb {
            background: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.2);
            border-radius: 3px;
        }

        .connections-grid::-webkit-scrollbar-thumb:hover {
            background: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.3);
        }

        .connection-card {
            background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.03);
            border: 1px solid rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.1);
            border-radius: 8px;
            padding: 16px;
            cursor: pointer;
            transition: all 0.3s ease;
            position: relative;
            min-height: 80px;
        }

        .connection-card:hover {
            border-color: rgba(37, 211, 102, 0.4);
            background: rgba(37, 211, 102, 0.05);
            transform: translateY(-1px);
        }

        .connection-card.selected {
            border-color: #25d366;
            background: rgba(37, 211, 102, 0.1);
            box-shadow: 0 0 0 1px rgba(37, 211, 102, 0.2);
        }

        .connection-card.selected::before {
            content: '‚úì';
            position: absolute;
            top: 8px;
            right: 8px;
            background: #25d366;
            color: white;
            width: 18px;
            height: 18px;
            border-radius: 50%;
            display: flex;
            align-items: center;
            justify-content: center;
            font-size: 0.7rem;
            font-weight: bold;
        }

        .connection-header {
            display: flex;
            align-items: center;
            gap: 12px;
            position: relative;
            padding-right: 30px;
        }

        .connection-avatar {
            width: 36px;
            height: 36px;
            border-radius: 50%;
            background: #25d366;
            display: flex;
            align-items: center;
            justify-content: center;
            color: white;
            font-weight: bold;
            font-size: 1rem;
            flex-shrink: 0;
        }

        .connection-avatar img {
            width: 100%;
            height: 100%;
            border-radius: 50%;
            object-fit: cover;
        }

        .connection-info {
            flex: 1;
            min-width: 0;
        }

        .connection-name {
            color: #fff;
            font-size: 0.95rem;
            font-weight: 600;
            margin-bottom: 4px;
            line-height: 1.2;
            overflow: hidden;
            text-overflow: ellipsis;
            white-space: nowrap;
        }

        .connection-phone {
            color: #888;
            font-size: 0.8rem;
            font-weight: 400;
            overflow: hidden;
            text-overflow: ellipsis;
            white-space: nowrap;
        }

        .connection-status-pill {
            position: absolute;
            top: 8px;
            right: 8px;
            padding: 2px 8px;
            border-radius: 10px;
            font-size: 0.65rem;
            font-weight: 600;
            text-transform: uppercase;
            letter-spacing: 0.3px;
            line-height: 1;
        }

        .connection-status-pill.connected {
            background: rgba(52, 199, 89, 0.15);
            color: #34c759;
            border: 1px solid rgba(52, 199, 89, 0.3);
        }

        .connection-status-pill.disconnected {
            background: rgba(255, 59, 48, 0.15);
            color: #ff3b30;
            border: 1px solid rgba(255, 59, 48, 0.3);
        }

        .connections-header {
            display: flex;
            align-items: center;
            justify-content: space-between;
            margin-bottom: 6px;
        }

        .connections-header-buttons {
            display: flex;
            align-items: center;
            gap: 8px;
        }

        .select-active-btn {
            background: rgba(52, 199, 89, 0.1);
            border: 1px solid rgba(52, 199, 89, 0.3);
            color: #34c759;
            padding: 4px 8px;
            border-radius: 4px;
            cursor: pointer;
            font-size: 0.75rem;
            font-weight: 500;
            transition: all 0.3s ease;
        }

        .select-active-btn:hover {
            background: rgba(52, 199, 89, 0.2);
            transform: translateY(-1px);
        }

        .select-active-btn:active {
            transform: translateY(0);
        }

        .refresh-connections-btn-small {
            background: rgba(37, 211, 102, 0.1);
            border: 1px solid rgba(37, 211, 102, 0.2);
            color: #25d366;
            padding: 4px 8px;
            border-radius: 4px;
            cursor: pointer;
            font-size: 0.75rem;
            transition: all 0.3s ease;
        }

        .refresh-connections-btn-small:hover {
            background: rgba(37, 211, 102, 0.2);
            transform: rotate(180deg);
        }

        .connections-selected {
            background: rgba(37, 211, 102, 0.08);
            border: 1px solid rgba(37, 211, 102, 0.2);
            border-radius: 6px;
            padding: 12px;
            margin-top: 12px;
            display: none;
            font-size: 0.9rem;
        }

        .connections-selected.show {
            display: block;
        }

        .no-connections {
            text-align: center;
            padding: 40px 20px;
            color: #888;
            border: 2px dashed rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.2);
            border-radius: 12px;
        }

        .refresh-connections-btn {
            background: rgba(37, 211, 102, 0.1);
            border: 1px solid rgba(37, 211, 102, 0.3);
            color: #25d366;
            padding: 8px 12px;
            border-radius: 6px;
            cursor: pointer;
            font-size: 0.9rem;
            margin-left: 10px;
            transition: all 0.3s ease;
        }

        .refresh-connections-btn:hover {
            background: rgba(37, 211, 102, 0.2);
            transform: rotate(180deg);
        }

        .refresh-connections-btn:disabled {
            opacity: 0.5;
            cursor: not-allowed;
            transform: none;
        }

        /* Lists Section Styles */
        .lists-section {
            margin-bottom: 30px;
        }

        .lists-header {
            display: flex;
            align-items: center;
            justify-content: space-between;
            margin-bottom: 6px;
        }

        .refresh-lists-btn-small {
            background: rgba(37, 211, 102, 0.1);
            border: 1px solid rgba(37, 211, 102, 0.2);
            color: #25d366;
            padding: 4px 8px;
            border-radius: 4px;
            cursor: pointer;
            font-size: 0.75rem;
            transition: all 0.3s ease;
        }

        .refresh-lists-btn-small:hover {
            background: rgba(37, 211, 102, 0.2);
            transform: rotate(180deg);
        }

        .loading-lists {
            text-align: center;
            padding: 40px 20px;
            color: #888;
        }

        .lists-grid {
            display: grid;
            grid-template-columns: repeat(auto-fill, minmax(200px, 1fr));
            gap: 12px;
            margin-top: 15px;
            max-height: 180px; /* Altura para 3 linhas (3 x 50px + 2 x 12px gap) */
            overflow-y: auto;
            padding-right: 5px;
        }

        /* Estiliza√ß√£o da scrollbar para listas */
        .lists-grid::-webkit-scrollbar {
            width: 6px;
        }

        .lists-grid::-webkit-scrollbar-track {
            background: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.05);
            border-radius: 3px;
        }

        .lists-grid::-webkit-scrollbar-thumb {
            background: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.2);
            border-radius: 3px;
        }

        .lists-grid::-webkit-scrollbar-thumb:hover {
            background: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.3);
        }

        .list-card {
            background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.03);
            border: 1px solid rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.1);
            border-radius: 8px;
            padding: 16px;
            cursor: pointer;
            transition: all 0.3s ease;
            position: relative;
            min-height: 60px;
        }

        .list-card:hover {
            border-color: rgba(37, 211, 102, 0.4);
            background: rgba(37, 211, 102, 0.05);
            transform: translateY(-1px);
        }

        .list-card.selected {
            border-color: #25d366;
            background: rgba(37, 211, 102, 0.1);
            box-shadow: 0 0 0 1px rgba(37, 211, 102, 0.2);
        }

        .list-card.selected::before {
            content: '‚úì';
            position: absolute;
            top: 8px;
            right: 8px;
            background: #25d366;
            color: white;
            width: 18px;
            height: 18px;
            border-radius: 50%;
            display: flex;
            align-items: center;
            justify-content: center;
            font-size: 0.7rem;
            font-weight: bold;
        }

        .list-info {
            display: flex;
            align-items: center;
            gap: 12px;
        }

        .list-icon {
            width: 36px;
            height: 36px;
            border-radius: 50%;
            background: #25d366;
            display: flex;
            align-items: center;
            justify-content: center;
            color: white;
            font-weight: bold;
            font-size: 1rem;
            flex-shrink: 0;
        }

        .list-name {
            color: #fff;
            font-size: 0.95rem;
            font-weight: 600;
            line-height: 1.2;
            overflow: hidden;
            text-overflow: ellipsis;
            white-space: nowrap;
        }

        .lists-selected {
            background: rgba(37, 211, 102, 0.08);
            border: 1px solid rgba(37, 211, 102, 0.2);
            border-radius: 6px;
            padding: 12px;
            margin-top: 12px;
            display: none;
            font-size: 0.9rem;
        }

        .lists-selected.show {
            display: block;
        }

        .no-lists {
            text-align: center;
            padding: 40px 20px;
            color: #888;
            border: 2px dashed rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.2);
            border-radius: 12px;
        }

        /* Variables Section Styles */
        .variables-section {
            margin-bottom: 10px;
        }

        .variables-label {
            color: #888;
            font-size: 0.85rem;
            font-weight: 500;
            margin-bottom: 6px;
        }

        .variables-container {
            display: flex;
            flex-wrap: wrap;
            gap: 8px;
            margin-bottom: 8px;
        }

        .variable-btn {
            background: rgba(37, 211, 102, 0.1);
            border: 1px solid rgba(37, 211, 102, 0.3);
            color: #25d366;
            padding: 4px 10px;
            border-radius: 20px;
            cursor: pointer;
            font-size: 0.8rem;
            font-weight: 500;
            transition: all 0.3s ease;
            user-select: none;
            display: flex;
            align-items: center;
            gap: 4px;
        }

        .variable-btn:hover {
            background: rgba(37, 211, 102, 0.2);
            border-color: #25d366;
            transform: translateY(-1px);
        }

        .variable-btn:active {
            transform: translateY(0);
        }

        .no-variables {
            color: #666;
            font-size: 0.85rem;
            font-style: italic;
        }

        /* Advanced Settings Styles */
        .advanced-settings-section {
            margin: 20px 0 15px 0;
            padding: 20px;
            background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.02);
            border: 1px solid rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.1);
            border-radius: 12px;
        }

        .advanced-settings-label {
            color: #888;
            font-size: 0.85rem;
            font-weight: 600;
            margin-bottom: 12px;
            display: flex;
            align-items: center;
            gap: 6px;
        }

        .advanced-settings-container {
            display: flex;
            flex-direction: column;
            gap: 12px;
        }

        .setting-item {
            display: flex;
            align-items: center;
            justify-content: space-between;
            padding: 8px 0;
        }

        .setting-info {
            flex: 1;
            margin-right: 15px;
        }

        .setting-title {
            color: #fff;
            font-size: 0.9rem;
            font-weight: 500;
            margin-bottom: 2px;
            display: flex;
            align-items: center;
            gap: 8px;
        }

        .chatgpt-icon {
            width: 16px;
            height: 16px;
            color: #10a37f;
            flex-shrink: 0;
        }

        /* AI Settings Styles */
        .ai-settings-container {
            margin-top: 15px;
            padding: 15px;
            background: rgba(16, 163, 127, 0.05);
            border: 1px solid rgba(16, 163, 127, 0.2);
            border-radius: 8px;
            animation: fadeIn 0.3s ease;
        }

        .ai-settings-content {
            display: flex;
            flex-direction: column;
            gap: 15px;
        }

        .ai-input-group {
            display: flex;
            flex-direction: column;
            gap: 6px;
        }

        .ai-input-group label {
            color: #fff;
            font-size: 0.85rem;
            font-weight: 500;
        }

        .ai-input {
            background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.05);
            border: 1px solid rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.1);
            border-radius: 6px;
            padding: 8px 12px;
            color: #fff;
            font-size: 0.9rem;
            transition: all 0.3s ease;
        }

        .ai-input:focus {
            outline: none;
            border-color: #10a37f;
            background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.08);
        }

        .ai-textarea {
            background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.05);
            border: 1px solid rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.1);
            border-radius: 6px;
            padding: 10px 12px;
            color: #fff;
            font-size: 0.9rem;
            min-height: 80px;
            resize: vertical;
            font-family: inherit;
            transition: all 0.3s ease;
        }

        .ai-textarea:focus {
            outline: none;
            border-color: #10a37f;
            background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.08);
        }

        .ai-textarea::placeholder {
            color: #888;
        }

        .ai-note {
            display: flex;
            align-items: flex-start;
            gap: 8px;
            padding: 10px;
            background: rgba(16, 163, 127, 0.1);
            border: 1px solid rgba(16, 163, 127, 0.2);
            border-radius: 6px;
            color: #10a37f;
            font-size: 0.8rem;
            line-height: 1.4;
        }

        .info-icon {
            width: 14px;
            height: 14px;
            color: #10a37f;
            flex-shrink: 0;
            margin-top: 1px;
        }

        .generate-ai-btn {
            background: linear-gradient(135deg, #10a37f 0%, #0d8a6b 100%);
            border: 1px solid #10a37f;
            border-radius: 8px;
            padding: 12px 20px;
            color: #fff;
            font-size: 0.9rem;
            font-weight: 600;
            cursor: pointer;
            display: flex;
            align-items: center;
            justify-content: center;
            gap: 8px;
            transition: all 0.3s ease;
            width: 100%;
            margin-top: 5px;
        }

        .generate-ai-btn:hover {
            background: linear-gradient(135deg, #0d8a6b 0%, #0a6b52 100%);
            border-color: #0d8a6b;
            transform: translateY(-1px);
            box-shadow: 0 4px 12px rgba(16, 163, 127, 0.3);
        }

        .generate-ai-btn:active {
            transform: translateY(0);
        }

        .chatgpt-btn-icon {
            width: 16px;
            height: 16px;
            color: #fff;
            flex-shrink: 0;
        }

        @keyframes fadeIn {
            from {
                opacity: 0;
                transform: translateY(-10px);
            }
            to {
                opacity: 1;
                transform: translateY(0);
            }
        }

        .setting-description {
            color: #888;
            font-size: 0.8rem;
            line-height: 1.3;
        }

        /* Toggle Switch Styles */
        .toggle-switch {
            position: relative;
            display: inline-block;
            width: 44px;
            height: 24px;
            flex-shrink: 0;
        }

        .toggle-switch input {
            opacity: 0;
            width: 0;
            height: 0;
        }

        .toggle-slider {
            position: absolute;
            cursor: pointer;
            top: 0;
            left: 0;
            right: 0;
            bottom: 0;
            background-color: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.1);
            transition: 0.3s;
            border-radius: 24px;
            border: 1px solid rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.2);
        }

        .toggle-slider:before {
            position: absolute;
            content: "";
            height: 18px;
            width: 18px;
            left: 2px;
            bottom: 2px;
            background-color: #888;
            transition: 0.3s;
            border-radius: 50%;
        }

        .toggle-switch input:checked + .toggle-slider {
            background-color: rgba(37, 211, 102, 0.3);
            border-color: #25d366;
        }

        .toggle-switch input:checked + .toggle-slider:before {
            transform: translateX(20px);
            background-color: #25d366;
        }

        .toggle-switch:hover .toggle-slider {
            border-color: rgba(37, 211, 102, 0.4);
        }



        /* Missed Call Indicator Styles */
        .missed-call-indicator {
            background: #808080;
            border: 1px solid #666;
            border-radius: 8px;
            padding: 8px 12px;
            margin: 8px 0;
            display: flex;
            align-items: center;
            justify-content: flex-end;
            animation: fadeInUp 0.3s ease;
            width: auto;
            max-width: 200px;
            margin-left: auto;
            margin-right: 0;
            transition: all 0.3s ease;
        }

        .missed-call-content {
            display: flex;
            align-items: center;
            gap: 8px;
            color: #fff;
        }

        .missed-call-icon {
            width: 16px;
            height: 16px;
            color: #fff;
            flex-shrink: 0;
        }

        .missed-call-info {
            text-align: center;
        }

        .missed-call-title {
            font-size: 0.85rem;
            font-weight: 500;
            color: #fff;
        }

        @keyframes fadeInUp {
            from {
                opacity: 0;
                transform: translateY(10px);
            }
            to {
                opacity: 1;
                transform: translateY(0);
            }
        }

        /* Estilos para vari√°veis de tempo expans√≠veis */
        .time-variables-container {
            position: relative;
            display: inline-block;
        }

        .time-toggle-btn {
            background: rgba(37, 211, 102, 0.15) !important;
            border-color: rgba(37, 211, 102, 0.4) !important;
            color: #25d366 !important;
            font-weight: 600;
        }

        .time-toggle-btn:hover {
            background: rgba(37, 211, 102, 0.25) !important;
            border-color: #25d366 !important;
        }

        .time-toggle-btn.expanded svg:last-child {
            transform: rotate(180deg);
        }

        .time-variables-dropdown {
            position: absolute;
            top: 100%;
            left: 0;
            background: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.95);
            border: 1px solid rgba(37, 211, 102, 0.3);
            border-radius: 8px;
            padding: 8px;
            margin-top: 4px;
            z-index: 1000;
            min-width: 200px;
            box-shadow: 0 4px 20px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.3);
            backdrop-filter: blur(10px);
        }

        .time-var-btn {
            display: block;
            width: 100%;
            text-align: left;
            margin-bottom: 4px;
            padding: 8px 12px;
            border-radius: 6px;
            background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.05);
            border: 1px solid rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.1);
            color: #fff;
            font-size: 0.85rem;
            transition: all 0.2s ease;
        }

        .time-var-btn:hover {
            background: rgba(37, 211, 102, 0.15);
            border-color: rgba(37, 211, 102, 0.3);
            color: #25d366;
        }

        .time-var-btn:last-child {
            margin-bottom: 0;
        }

        /* Estilo para vari√°veis no textarea */
        .form-group textarea {
            font-family: 'Monaco', 'Menlo', 'Ubuntu Mono', monospace;
            font-size: 0.85rem;
        }

        /* Bot√µes de formata√ß√£o */
        .formatting-buttons {
            display: flex;
            gap: 8px;
            margin-bottom: 10px;
        }

        .format-btn {
            background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.05);
            border: 1px solid rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.2);
            color: #ccc;
            padding: 8px 12px;
            border-radius: 6px;
            cursor: pointer;
            font-size: 0.9rem;
            font-weight: 600;
            transition: all 0.3s ease;
            min-width: 40px;
            text-align: center;
        }

        .format-btn:hover {
            background: rgba(37, 211, 102, 0.1);
            border-color: #25d366;
            color: #25d366;
        }

        .format-btn:active {
            transform: translateY(1px);
        }

        .format-btn strong {
            font-weight: 700;
        }

        .format-btn em {
            font-style: italic;
        }

        .multiple-lists-warning {
            background: rgba(255, 193, 7, 0.1);
            border: 1px solid rgba(255, 193, 7, 0.3);
            border-radius: 6px;
            padding: 10px 12px;
            margin-top: 10px;
            font-size: 0.8rem;
            color: #ffc107;
            display: none;
        }

        .multiple-lists-warning.show {
            display: block;
        }

        .multiple-lists-warning::before {
            content: '‚ö†Ô∏è ';
            margin-right: 5px;
        }

        .dispatch-btn.loading .loading-spinner {
            display: block;
        }

        .success-message,
        .error-message {
            padding: 15px 20px;
            border-radius: 8px;
            margin: 20px 0;
            display: none;
        }

        .success-message {
            background: rgba(52, 199, 89, 0.1);
            border: 1px solid rgba(52, 199, 89, 0.3);
            color: #34c759;
        }

        .error-message {
            background: rgba(255, 59, 48, 0.1);
            border: 1px solid rgba(255, 59, 48, 0.3);
            color: #ff3b30;
        }

        .success-message.show,
        .error-message.show {
            display: block;
        }

        .warning-messages ul {
            margin: 0;
            padding-left: 20px;
        }

        .warning-messages li {
            margin-bottom: 5px;
            font-size: 0.9rem;
        }

        .warning-messages li:last-child {
            margin-bottom: 0;
        }

        .stats {
            display: grid;
            grid-template-columns: repeat(auto-fit, minmax(150px, 1fr));
            gap: 20px;
            margin-top: 30px;
        }

        .stat-card {
            background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.02);
            border: 1px solid rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.1);
            border-radius: 12px;
            padding: 20px;
            text-align: center;
        }

        .stat-value {
            font-size: 1.5rem;
            font-weight: 600;
            color: #25d366;
            margin-bottom: 5px;
        }

        .stat-label {
            color: #888;
            font-size: 0.8rem;
        }

        /* Phone Preview */
        .phone-preview {
            position: sticky;
            top: 20px;
        }

        .phone-container {
            width: 350px;
            height: 700px;
            background: #000;
            border-radius: 35px;
            padding: 20px 15px;
            position: relative;
            box-shadow: 0 20px 60px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.5);
        }

        .phone-screen {
            width: 100%;
            height: 100%;
            background: linear-gradient(135deg, #e5ddd5 0%, #d1c7b8 100%);
            border-radius: 25px;
            position: relative;
            overflow: hidden;
        }

        .whatsapp-header {
            background: #075e54;
            height: 60px;
            display: flex;
            align-items: center;
            padding: 0 16px;
            gap: 12px;
        }

        .contact-avatar {
            width: 40px;
            height: 40px;
            background: #25d366;
            border-radius: 50%;
            display: flex;
            align-items: center;
            justify-content: center;
            color: white;
            font-weight: bold;
            font-size: 1.2rem;
        }

        .contact-info {
            flex: 1;
        }

        .contact-name {
            color: white;
            font-size: 1rem;
            font-weight: 500;
        }

        .contact-status {
            color: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.7);
            font-size: 0.8rem;
        }

        .chat-area {
            flex: 1;
            padding: 20px 16px;
            overflow-y: auto;
            height: calc(100% - 60px);
            display: flex;
            flex-direction: column;
        }

        .no-messages {
            flex: 1;
            display: flex;
            align-items: center;
            justify-content: center;
            color: #666;
            font-style: italic;
            text-align: center;
        }

        .message-bubble {
            background: #dcf8c6;
            border-radius: 8px;
            padding: 8px 12px;
            margin-bottom: 15px;
            max-width: 80%;
            margin-left: auto;
            position: relative;
            box-shadow: 0 1px 2px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1);
        }

        .message-bubble:after {
            content: '';
            position: absolute;
            top: 8px;
            right: -8px;
            width: 0;
            height: 0;
            border-left: 8px solid #dcf8c6;
            border-top: 8px solid transparent;
            border-bottom: 8px solid transparent;
        }

        .message-text {
            color: #303030;
            font-size: 0.9rem;
            line-height: 1.4;
            word-wrap: break-word;
        }

        .message-time {
            color: #667781;
            font-size: 0.7rem;
            text-align: right;
            margin-top: 4px;
        }

        .media-preview-whatsapp {
            margin-bottom: 8px;
            border-radius: 8px;
            overflow: hidden;
            max-width: 200px;
        }

        .image-preview-whatsapp {
            width: 100%;
            height: auto;
            max-height: 150px;
            object-fit: cover;
            border-radius: 8px;
        }

        .video-preview-whatsapp {
            width: 100%;
            height: auto;
            max-height: 150px;
            border-radius: 8px;
        }

        .video-overlay {
            position: relative;
            display: flex;
            align-items: center;
            justify-content: center;
            margin-top: -75px;
            margin-bottom: 75px;
            pointer-events: none;
        }

        .play-button {
            background: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.6);
            color: white;
            width: 40px;
            height: 40px;
            border-radius: 50%;
            display: flex;
            align-items: center;
            justify-content: center;
            font-size: 1.2rem;
        }

        .audio-preview-whatsapp {
            background: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1);
            padding: 12px;
            border-radius: 8px;
            display: flex;
            align-items: center;
            gap: 12px;
            margin-bottom: 8px;
            max-width: 250px;
        }

        .audio-icon {
            font-size: 1.5rem;
            color: #075e54;
        }

        .audio-info {
            flex: 1;
        }

        .audio-name {
            font-size: 0.9rem;
            font-weight: 500;
            color: #303030;
            margin-bottom: 2px;
        }

        .audio-duration {
            font-size: 0.8rem;
            color: #667781;
        }

        .audio-controls {
            display: none;
        }

        .document-preview-whatsapp {
            background: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1);
            padding: 12px;
            border-radius: 8px;
            display: flex;
            align-items: center;
            gap: 12px;
            margin-bottom: 8px;
            max-width: 250px;
            cursor: pointer;
            transition: background 0.2s ease;
        }

        .document-preview-whatsapp:hover {
            background: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.15);
        }

        .document-icon {
            font-size: 1.5rem;
            color: #075e54;
        }

        .document-info {
            flex: 1;
        }

        .document-name {
            font-size: 0.9rem;
            font-weight: 500;
            color: #303030;
            margin-bottom: 2px;
            word-break: break-word;
        }

        .document-size {
            font-size: 0.8rem;
            color: #667781;
        }

        /* Sele√ß√£o de dias da semana */
        .days-grid {
            display: grid;
            grid-template-columns: repeat(auto-fit, minmax(100px, 1fr));
            gap: 12px;
            margin-bottom: 15px;
        }

        .day-item {
            background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.05);
            border: 2px solid rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.2);
            border-radius: 12px;
            padding: 16px 12px;
            text-align: center;
            cursor: pointer;
            transition: all 0.3s ease;
            position: relative;
            user-select: none;
        }

        .day-item:hover {
            border-color: rgba(37, 211, 102, 0.5);
            background: rgba(37, 211, 102, 0.08);
        }

        .day-item.selected {
            border-color: #25d366;
            background: rgba(37, 211, 102, 0.15);
            box-shadow: 0 4px 15px rgba(37, 211, 102, 0.2);
        }

        .day-item.selected::before {
            content: '‚úì';
            position: absolute;
            top: 8px;
            right: 8px;
            background: #25d366;
            color: white;
            width: 18px;
            height: 18px;
            border-radius: 50%;
            display: flex;
            align-items: center;
            justify-content: center;
            font-size: 0.7rem;
            font-weight: bold;
        }

        .day-name {
            display: block;
            color: #fff;
            font-size: 0.9rem;
            font-weight: 600;
            margin-bottom: 4px;
        }

        .day-short {
            display: block;
            color: #888;
            font-size: 0.75rem;
            font-weight: 500;
            text-transform: uppercase;
            letter-spacing: 0.5px;
        }

        .day-item.selected .day-name {
            color: #25d366;
        }

        .day-item.selected .day-short {
            color: #25d366;
        }

        .days-selected {
            background: rgba(37, 211, 102, 0.1);
            border: 1px solid rgba(37, 211, 102, 0.3);
            border-radius: 8px;
            padding: 12px 16px;
            margin-top: 10px;
        }

        .selected-days-text {
            color: #25d366;
            font-weight: 600;
            font-size: 0.9rem;
        }

        @media (max-width: 768px) {
            .days-grid {
                grid-template-columns: repeat(auto-fit, minmax(80px, 1fr));
                gap: 8px;
            }
            
            .day-item {
                padding: 12px 8px;
            }
            
            .day-name {
                font-size: 0.8rem;
            }
            
            .day-short {
                font-size: 0.7rem;
            }
        }

        @keyframes spin {
            0% { transform: rotate(0deg); }
            100% { transform: rotate(360deg); }
        }

        /* Loading spinner para bot√µes */
        .loading-spinner-small {
            width: 16px;
            height: 16px;
            border: 2px solid rgba(37, 211, 102, 0.3);
            border-top: 2px solid #25d366;
            border-radius: 50%;
            animation: spin 1s linear infinite;
            display: inline-block;
            margin-left: 8px;
        }

        @media (max-width: 1200px) {
            .main-content {
                grid-template-columns: 1fr;
                gap: 30px;
            }

            .phone-preview {
                position: static;
                display: flex;
                justify-content: center;
            }

            .phone-container {
                width: 300px;
                height: 600px;
            }

            .sidebar {
                width: 60px;
            }

            .sidebar:hover {
                width: 200px;
            }
        }

        @media (max-width: 768px) {
            .form-grid {
                grid-template-columns: 1fr;
                gap: 20px;
            }

            .time-range {
                flex-direction: column;
                gap: 10px;
            }

            .time-separator {
                display: none;
            }

            .header-info h1 {
                font-size: 2rem;
            }

            .form-container {
                padding: 25px;
            }

            .media-upload {
                grid-template-columns: repeat(2, 1fr);
            }

            .sidebar {
                width: 60px;
            }

            .sidebar:hover {
                width: 180px;
            }

            .main-content-wrapper {
                padding: 15px;
            }
        }

        .interval-range {
            display: flex;
            align-items: center;
            gap: 4px;
        }
        .time-range {
            display: flex;
            align-items: center;
            gap: 8px;
        }
        .time-input input[type="time"] {
            min-width: 90px;
        }

        /* Bloco de intervalo e pausa autom√°tica customizado */
        .interval-block {
            background: rgba(255,255,255,0.01);
            border-radius: 16px;
            padding: 28px 24px 18px 24px;
            margin-bottom: 28px;
            border: 1px solid rgba(255,255,255,0.08);
            box-shadow: 0 2px 8px 0 rgba(0,0,0,0.04);
        }
        .interval-title {
            display: flex;
            align-items: center;
            font-size: 1.15rem;
            font-weight: 700;
            margin-bottom: 18px;
            color: #fff;
            gap: 10px;
        }
        .interval-title-bar {
            width: 5px;
            height: 22px;
            border-radius: 3px;
            background: linear-gradient(135deg, #25d366 0%, #128c7e 100%);
            margin-right: 10px;
        }
        .interval-row {
            display: flex;
            align-items: center;
            gap: 12px;
            margin-bottom: 18px;
        }
        .interval-row:last-child { margin-bottom: 0; }
        .interval-input {
            background: #181f1b;
            border: 1.5px solid #2e2e2e;
            border-radius: 10px;
            color: #fff;
            font-size: 1.1rem;
            padding: 8px 14px;
            width: 90px;
            outline: none;
            transition: border 0.2s;
        }
        .interval-input:focus {
            border: 1.5px solid #25d366;
        }
        .interval-label {
            color: #b0b0b0;
            font-size: 1rem;
            font-weight: 500;
        }
        .interval-row .interval-label {
            margin-right: 4px;
        }

        .main-schedule-container {
            width: 100%;
            margin: 20px 0 32px 0;
            background: rgba(255,255,255,0.02);
            border-radius: 16px;
            box-shadow: 0 4px 32px 0 rgba(0,0,0,0.18);
            border: 1px solid rgba(255,255,255,0.1);
            padding: 40px 40px 32px 40px;
            display: flex;
            flex-direction: column;
            gap: 12px;
        }
        @media (max-width: 900px) {
            .main-schedule-container { padding: 18px 2vw; }
        }
        .schedule-section {
            background: none;
            border-radius: 14px;
            padding: 0 0 0 0;
            margin: 0 0 32px 0;
            display: flex;
            flex-direction: column;
            gap: 12px;
        }
        .schedule-title {
            display: flex;
            align-items: center;
            font-size: 1.13rem;
            font-weight: 600;
            color: #fff;
            margin-bottom: 8px;
            gap: 10px;
            letter-spacing: 0.01em;
        }
        .schedule-title-bar {
            width: 4px;
            height: 22px;
            border-radius: 3px;
            background: linear-gradient(135deg, #25d366 0%, #128c7e 100%);
            margin-right: 10px;
        }
        .interval-row, .pause-row, .time-row {
            display: flex;
            align-items: center;
            gap: 10px;
            flex-wrap: wrap;
            justify-content: flex-start !important;
        }
        .interval-input, .pause-input, .time-input input[type="time"] {
            background: #181f1b;
            border: 1.5px solid #2e2e2e;
            border-radius: 10px;
            color: #fff;
            font-size: 1.08rem;
            padding: 7px 0;
            text-align: center;
            outline: none;
            transition: border 0.2s;
            box-sizing: border-box;
        }
        .interval-input, .pause-input {
            width: 60px;
        }
        .time-input input[type="time"] {
            width: 100px;
            padding: 7px 0;
            text-align: center;
        }
        .interval-input:focus, .pause-input:focus, .time-input input[type="time"]:focus {
            border: 1.5px solid #25d366;
        }

        /* Toggle Switch Styles */
        .schedule-toggle-row {
            display: flex;
            align-items: center;
            justify-content: space-between;
            margin-bottom: 12px;
        }

        .toggle-label {
            color: #b0b0b0;
            font-size: 1rem;
            font-weight: 500;
        }

        .toggle-switch {
            position: relative;
            display: inline-block;
            width: 50px;
            height: 24px;
        }

        .toggle-switch input {
            opacity: 0;
            width: 0;
            height: 0;
        }

        .toggle-slider {
            position: absolute;
            cursor: pointer;
            top: 0;
            left: 0;
            right: 0;
            bottom: 0;
            background-color: #2e2e2e;
            transition: .4s;
            border-radius: 24px;
        }

        .toggle-slider:before {
            position: absolute;
            content: "";
            height: 18px;
            width: 18px;
            left: 3px;
            bottom: 3px;
            background-color: white;
            transition: .4s;
            border-radius: 50%;
        }

        input:checked + .toggle-slider {
            background-color: #25d366;
        }

        input:checked + .toggle-slider:before {
            transform: translateX(26px);
        }

        /* Schedule Input Styles */
        .schedule-input-container {
            margin-top: 8px;
        }

        .schedule-datetime-input {
            background: rgba(255,255,255,0.05) !important;
            border: 1.5px solid #2e2e2e;
            border-radius: 10px;
            color: #fff;
            font-size: 1.08rem;
            padding: 12px 16px;
            width: 100%;
            outline: none;
            transition: border 0.2s;
            box-sizing: border-box;
        }

        .schedule-datetime-input:focus {
            border: 1.5px solid #25d366;
        }
        .interval-label, .pause-label, .time-label {
            color: #b0b0b0;
            font-size: 1rem;
            font-weight: 500;
            margin: 0 2px;
        }
        /* Dias da semana */
        .days-section {
            display: flex;
            flex-direction: column;
            gap: 10px;
        }
        .days-grid {
            display: grid;
            grid-template-columns: repeat(7, 1fr);
            gap: 10px;
            margin-bottom: 8px;
        }
        @media (max-width: 600px) {
            .main-schedule-container { padding: 18px 4vw; }
            .days-grid { grid-template-columns: repeat(4, 1fr); }
        }
        .day-btn {
            background: rgba(255,255,255,0.05);
            border: 2px solid #232b25;
            border-radius: 12px;
            padding: 10px 0 7px 0;
            cursor: pointer;
            transition: all 0.18s;
            font-size: 0.98rem;
            font-weight: 600;
            color: #fff;
            user-select: none;
            outline: none;
            min-width: 0;
            display: flex;
            flex-direction: column;
            align-items: center;
            justify-content: center;
        }
        .day-btn .day-full { font-size: 0.98rem; font-weight: 700; }
        .day-btn .day-abbr { font-size: 0.82rem; color: #b0b0b0; font-weight: 500; letter-spacing: 0.04em; }
        .day-btn.selected {
            background: rgba(37, 211, 102, 0.18);
            border: 2px solid #25d366;
            color: #25d366;
            box-shadow: 0 2px 8px 0 rgba(37,211,102,0.08);
        }
        .day-btn:hover:not(.selected) {
            background: #232b25;
            border: 2px solid #128c7e;
            color: #25d366;
        }
        .days-feedback {
            background: #181f1b;
            border-radius: 8px;
            padding: 10px 0;
            text-align: center;
            color: #b0b0b0;
            font-size: 0.98rem;
            font-weight: 500;
            margin-top: 2px;
            transition: background 0.2s, color 0.2s;
        }
        .days-feedback.selected {
            background: rgba(37, 211, 102, 0.08);
            color: #25d366;
        }

        .interval-input,
        .pause-input,
        .time-input input[type="time"] {
            background: rgba(255,255,255,0.05) !important;
        }
    </style>
</head>

                        <div class="error-message" id="errorMessage"></div>
