            border: none;
            border-radius: 12px;
            color: white;
            font-size: 0.95rem;
            font-weight: 600;
            cursor: pointer;
            transition: all 0.3s ease;
            display: flex;
            align-items: center;
            justify-content: center;
            gap: 8px;
            text-decoration: none;
        }

        .btn-primary {
            background: linear-gradient(135deg, #25d366 0%, #128c7e 100%);
        }

        .btn-primary:hover {
            transform: translateY(-2px);
            box-shadow: 0 12px 30px rgba(37, 211, 102, 0.4);
        }

        .btn-secondary {
            background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.05);
            border: 1px solid rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.2);
        }

        .btn-secondary:hover {
            background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.1);
            transform: translateY(-2px);
        }

        .btn-whatsapp {
            background: linear-gradient(135deg, #25d366 0%, #128c7e 100%);
            width: 100%;
            grid-column: 1 / -1;
        }

        .btn-whatsapp:hover {
            transform: translateY(-2px);
            box-shadow: 0 12px 30px rgba(37, 211, 102, 0.4);
        }

        /* Mensagens */
        .message {
            padding: 15px;
            border-radius: 8px;
            margin-bottom: 15px;
            font-size: 0.9rem;
            display: none;
        }

        .message.show {
            display: block;
            animation: fadeIn 0.3s ease;
        }

        .message.success {
            background: rgba(37, 211, 102, 0.1);
            border: 1px solid rgba(37, 211, 102, 0.3);
            color: #25d366;
        }

        .message.error {
            background: rgba(255, 68, 68, 0.1);
            border: 1px solid rgba(255, 68, 68, 0.3);
            color: #ff4444;
        }

        .message.info {
            background: rgba(0, 123, 255, 0.1);
            border: 1px solid rgba(0, 123, 255, 0.3);
            color: #007bff;
        }

        .message.warning {
            background: rgba(255, 193, 7, 0.1);
            border: 1px solid rgba(255, 193, 7, 0.3);
            color: #ffc107;
        }

        /* Loading spinner */
        .loading-spinner {
            width: 20px;
            height: 20px;
            border: 2px solid rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.3);
            border-top: 2px solid white;
            border-radius: 50%;
            animation: spin 1s linear infinite;
            display: none;
        }

        .btn.loading .loading-spinner {
            display: block;
        }

        @keyframes spin {
            0% { transform: rotate(0deg); }
            100% { transform: rotate(360deg); }
        }

        @keyframes fadeIn {
            from {
                opacity: 0;
                transform: translateY(20px);
            }
            to {
                opacity: 1;
                transform: translateY(0);
            }
        }

        /* Scrollbar customization */
        .lists-table-container::-webkit-scrollbar {
            width: 6px;
        }

        .lists-table-container::-webkit-scrollbar-track {
            background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.05);
            border-radius: 3px;
        }

        .lists-table-container::-webkit-scrollbar-thumb {
            background: rgba(37, 211, 102, 0.5);
            border-radius: 3px;
        }

        .lists-table-container::-webkit-scrollbar-thumb:hover {
            background: rgba(37, 211, 102, 0.7);
        }

        /* Responsive */
        @media (max-width: 768px) {
            .main-content {
                gap: 20px;
            }
            
            .filters-container {
                flex-direction: column;
                align-items: stretch;
            }
            
            .filter-group {
                width: 100%;
            }
            
            .header {
                flex-direction: column;
                align-items: stretch;
                gap: 15px;
            }
            
            .header-actions {
                justify-content: flex-start;
                gap: 10px;
            }

            .main-content-wrapper {
                padding: 16px 0 0 0;
            }
            
            .container {
                padding: 0 8px;
            }
            
            .lists-table {
                font-size: 0.8rem;
            }
            
            .lists-table th,
            .lists-table td {
                padding: 10px 12px;
            }
        }

        /* Modal */
        .modal {
            display: none;
            position: fixed;
            top: 0;
            left: 0;
            width: 100%;
            height: 100%;
            background: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.8);
            z-index: 1000;
            backdrop-filter: blur(5px);
        }
        .modal.show {
            display: flex;
            align-items: center;
            justify-content: center;
        }
        .modal-content {
            background: rgba(26, 26, 26, 0.95);
            border: 1px solid rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.1);
            border-radius: 16px;
            padding: 30px;
            max-width: 400px;
            width: 90%;
            backdrop-filter: blur(10px);
            box-shadow: 0 20px 60px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.5);
        }
        .modal-header {
            display: flex;
            align-items: center;
            justify-content: space-between;
            margin-bottom: 20px;
        }
        .modal-title {
            font-size: 1.3rem;
            font-weight: 600;
            color: #25d366;
        }
        .modal-close {
            background: none;
            border: none;
            color: #888;
            font-size: 1.5rem;
            cursor: pointer;
            padding: 5px;
            border-radius: 4px;
            transition: all 0.3s ease;
        }
        .modal-close:hover {
            background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.1);
            color: white;
        }
        .modal .form-group {
            margin-bottom: 22px;
        }
        .modal .form-group label {
            color: #fff;
            font-weight: 500;
            margin-bottom: 8px;
            font-size: 0.95rem;
            display: block;
        }
        .modal .form-group input,
        .modal .form-group select {
            width: 100%;
            padding: 12px 15px;
            background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.05);
            border: 1px solid rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.2);
            border-radius: 8px;
            color: white;
            font-size: 1rem;
            outline: none;
            transition: all 0.3s ease;
        }
        .modal .form-group input:focus,
        .modal .form-group select:focus {
            border-color: #25d366;
            box-shadow: 0 0 0 2px rgba(37, 211, 102, 0.2);
        }
        .modal .form-group input::placeholder {
            color: #888;
        }

        /* Custom Dropdown Styles */
        .custom-dropdown {
            position: relative;
            width: 100%;
        }

        .dropdown-header {
            width: 100%;
            padding: 12px 15px;
            background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.05);
            border: 1px solid rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.2);
            border-radius: 8px;
            color: white;
            font-size: 1rem;
            cursor: pointer;
            display: flex;
            align-items: center;
            justify-content: space-between;
            transition: all 0.3s ease;
            user-select: none;
        }

        .dropdown-header:hover {
            border-color: rgba(37, 211, 102, 0.5);
            background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.08);
        }

        .dropdown-header.active {
            border-color: #25d366;
            box-shadow: 0 0 0 2px rgba(37, 211, 102, 0.2);
        }

        .dropdown-selected {
            color: white;
        }

        .dropdown-arrow {
            color: #888;
            transition: transform 0.3s ease;
        }

        .dropdown-header.active .dropdown-arrow {
            transform: rotate(180deg);
            color: #25d366;
        }

        .dropdown-options {
            position: absolute;
            top: 100%;
            left: 0;
            right: 0;
            background: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.95);
            border: 1px solid rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.2);
            border-radius: 8px;
            margin-top: 4px;
            max-height: 200px;
            overflow-y: auto;
            z-index: 1000;
            opacity: 0;
            visibility: hidden;
            transform: translateY(-10px);
            transition: all 0.3s ease;
            backdrop-filter: blur(10px);
        }

        .dropdown-options.show {
            opacity: 1;
            visibility: visible;
            transform: translateY(0);
        }

        .dropdown-option {
            padding: 12px 15px;
            color: white;
            cursor: pointer;
            transition: all 0.2s ease;
            border-bottom: 1px solid rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.1);
        }

        .dropdown-option:last-child {
            border-bottom: none;
        }

        .dropdown-option:hover {
            background: rgba(37, 211, 102, 0.1);
            color: #25d366;
        }

        .dropdown-option.selected {
            background: rgba(37, 211, 102, 0.2);
            color: #25d366;
        }

        /* Scrollbar para o dropdown */
        .dropdown-options::-webkit-scrollbar {
            width: 6px;
        }

        .dropdown-options::-webkit-scrollbar-track {
            background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.1);
            border-radius: 3px;
        }

        .dropdown-options::-webkit-scrollbar-thumb {
            background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.3);
            border-radius: 3px;
        }

        .dropdown-options::-webkit-scrollbar-thumb:hover {
            background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.5);
        }
    </style>
</head>
<body>
    <div class="app-layout">
        <!-- Sidebar -->
        <div class="sidebar">
            <div class="sidebar-header">
                <div class="sidebar-logo">EnviaZap</div>
            </div>
            <nav class="sidebar-menu">
                <a href="#" class="menu-item" onclick="navigateToPage('https://n8n.typebot.pro/webhook/dashboard')">
                    <span class="menu-icon">üìä</span>
                    <span class="menu-text">Dashboard</span>
                </a>
                <a href="#" class="menu-item" onclick="navigateToPage('https://n8n.typebot.pro/webhook/historico-disparos')">
                    <span class="menu-icon">üìã</span>
                    <span class="menu-text">Hist√≥rico de disparos</span>
                </a>
                <a href="#" class="menu-item" onclick="navigateToPage('https://n8n.typebot.pro/webhook/conectar')">
                    <span class="menu-icon">üîó</span>
                    <span class="menu-text">Nova Conex√£o</span>
                </a>
                <a href="#" class="menu-item" onclick="navigateToPage('https://n8n.typebot.pro/webhook/conexoes')">
                    <span class="menu-icon">üîå</span>
                    <span class="menu-text">Conex√µes</span>
                </a>
                <a href="#" class="menu-item" onclick="navigateToPage('https://n8n.typebot.pro/webhook/disparos-individuais')">
                    <span class="menu-icon">üí¨</span>
                    <span class="menu-text">Disparos individuais</span>
                </a>
                <a href="#" class="menu-item" onclick="navigateToPage('https://n8n.typebot.pro/webhook/disparos-grupos')">
                    <span class="menu-icon">üë•</span>
                    <span class="menu-text">Disparos em grupo</span>
                </a>
                <a href="#" class="menu-item active">
                    <span class="menu-icon">üìã</span>
                    <span class="menu-text">Listas</span>
                </a>
            </nav>
            <div class="sidebar-footer">
                <a href="#" class="menu-item logout-item" onclick="logout()">
                    <span class="menu-icon">üö™</span>
                    <span class="menu-text">Sair</span>
                </a>
            </div>
        </div>

        <!-- Main Content -->
        <div class="main-content-wrapper">
            <div class="container">
                <div class="header">
                    <div class="header-info">
                        <h1>üìã Listas</h1>
                        <p>Gerencie suas listas de contatos e grupos do WhatsApp</p>
                    </div>
                    <div class="header-actions">
                        <button class="btn-refresh" id="refreshBtn" onclick="loadLists()">
                            <span>
                                <svg width="16" height="16" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="currentColor">
                                    <path d="M17.65 6.35C16.2 4.9 14.21 4 12 4c-4.42 0-7.99 3.58-7.99 8s3.57 8 7.99 8c3.73 0 6.84-2.55 7.73-6h-2.08c-.82 2.33-3.04 4-5.65 4-3.31 0-6-2.69-6-6s2.69-6 6-6c1.66 0 3.14.69 4.22 1.78L13 11h7V4l-2.35 2.35z"/>
                                </svg>
                            </span>
                            Atualizar
                        </button>
                        <button class="btn-refresh" id="createListBtn" onclick="openCreateModal()">
                            <span>
                                <svg width="16" height="16" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="currentColor">
                                    <path d="M19 13h-6v6h-2v-6H5v-2h6V5h2v6h6v2z"/>
                                </svg>
                            </span>
                            Criar Lista
                        </button>
                    </div>
                </div>

                <!-- Loading State -->
                <div class="loading-container" id="loadingContainer" style="display: none;">
                    <div class="loading-spinner"></div>
                    <div class="loading-text">Carregando listas...</div>
                </div>

                <div class="main-content" id="mainContent">
                    <!-- Filtros -->
                    <div class="filters-container">
                        <div class="filter-group">
                            <label class="filter-label">Tipo de Lista</label>
                            <select class="filter-select" id="typeFilter">
                                <option value="">Todos os tipos</option>
                                <option value="contacts">Contatos</option>
                                <option value="groups">Grupos</option>
                            </select>
                        </div>
                        
                        <div class="filter-group">
                            <label class="filter-label">Data de Cria√ß√£o</label>
                            <select class="filter-select" id="dateFilter">
                                <option value="">Todas as datas</option>
                                <option value="today">Hoje</option>
                                <option value="week">√öltima semana</option>
                                <option value="month">√öltimo m√™s</option>
                                <option value="year">√öltimo ano</option>
                            </select>
                        </div>
                        
                        <div class="filter-group">
                            <label class="filter-label">Buscar</label>
                            <input type="text" class="filter-input" id="searchFilter" placeholder="Nome da lista...">
                        </div>
                    </div>

                    <!-- Tabela de Listas -->
                    <!-- Mensagens -->
                    <div class="message" id="listsMessage"></div>

                    <div class="lists-table-container">
                        <table class="lists-table">
                            <thead>
                                <tr>
                                    <th>Nome da Lista</th>
                                    <th>Tipo</th>
                                    <th>Data de Cria√ß√£o</th>
                                    <th>A√ß√µes</th>
                                </tr>
                            </thead>
                            <tbody id="listsTableBody">
                                <tr>
                                    <td colspan="5" style="text-align: center; color: #888; padding: 40px 20px;">
                                        <div class="loading-spinner" style="margin: 0 auto 15px auto;"></div>
                                        <p>Carregando listas...</p>
                                    </td>
                                </tr>
                            </tbody>
                        </table>
                    </div>
                </div>
            </div>
        </div>
    </div>

    <!-- Modal para criar nova lista -->
    <div class="modal" id="createListModal">
        <div class="modal-content">
            <div class="modal-header">
                <h3 class="modal-title">üìã Nova Lista</h3>
                <button class="modal-close" id="closeModal">×</button>
            </div>
            <form id="createListForm">
                <div class="form-group">
                    <label for="listName">Nome da Lista *</label>
                    <input 
                        type="text" 
                        id="listName" 
                        name="listName" 
                        placeholder="Ex: Clientes VIP, Grupos Marketing, etc." 
                        required
                    >
                </div>
                <div class="form-group">
                    <label for="listType">Tipo de Lista *</label>
                    <div class="custom-dropdown" id="listTypeDropdown">
                        <div class="dropdown-header" onclick="toggleDropdown('listTypeDropdown')">
                            <span class="dropdown-selected" id="listTypeSelected">Selecione o tipo</span>
                            <svg class="dropdown-arrow" width="16" height="16" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="currentColor">
                                <path d="M7 10l5 5 5-5z"/>
                            </svg>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dropdown-options" id="listTypeOptions">
                            <div class="dropdown-option" data-value="contacts" onclick="selectDropdownOption('listTypeDropdown', 'contacts', 'Contatos')">
                                <span>üë• Contatos</span>
                            </div>
                            <div class="dropdown-option" data-value="groups" onclick="selectDropdownOption('listTypeDropdown', 'groups', 'Grupos')">
                                <span>üë• Grupos</span>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <input type="hidden" id="listType" name="listType" required>
                    </div>
                </div>
                <div class="form-group">
                    <label for="listDescription">Descri√ß√£o (opcional)</label>
                    <input 
                        type="text" 
                        id="listDescription" 
                        name="listDescription" 
                        placeholder="Descreva o objetivo desta lista..."
                    >
                </div>
                <button type="submit" class="btn btn-primary" style="width: 100%;">
                    <div class="loading-spinner"></div>
                    <span>
                        <svg width="16" height="16" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="currentColor" style="margin-right: 8px;">
                            <path d="M19 13h-6v6h-2v-6H5v-2h6V5h2v6h6v2z"/>
                        </svg>
                        Criar Lista
                    </span>
                </button>
            </form>
        </div>
    </div>

    <script>
        // Elementos do DOM
        const listsTableBody = document.getElementById('listsTableBody');
        const listsMessage = document.getElementById('listsMessage');
        const refreshBtn = document.getElementById('refreshBtn');
        
        // Filtros
        const typeFilter = document.getElementById('typeFilter');
        const dateFilter = document.getElementById('dateFilter');
        const searchFilter = document.getElementById('searchFilter');
        
        // Modal criar lista
        const createListModal = document.getElementById('createListModal');
        const createListBtn = document.getElementById('createListBtn');
        const closeModal = document.getElementById('closeModal');
        const createListForm = document.getElementById('createListForm');
        const listNameInput = document.getElementById('listName');
        const listTypeInput = document.getElementById('listType');
        const listDescriptionInput = document.getElementById('listDescription');

        // Fun√ß√µes do dropdown personalizado
        function toggleDropdown(dropdownId) {
            const dropdown = document.getElementById(dropdownId);
            const header = dropdown.querySelector('.dropdown-header');
            const options = dropdown.querySelector('.dropdown-options');
            
            // Fecha todos os outros dropdowns
            document.querySelectorAll('.dropdown-options').forEach(opt => {
                if (opt !== options) {
                    opt.classList.remove('show');
                    opt.closest('.custom-dropdown').querySelector('.dropdown-header').classList.remove('active');
                }
            });
            
            // Toggle do dropdown atual
            const isOpen = options.classList.contains('show');
            if (isOpen) {
                options.classList.remove('show');
                header.classList.remove('active');
            } else {
                options.classList.add('show');
                header.classList.add('active');
            }
        }

        function selectDropdownOption(dropdownId, value, text) {
            const dropdown = document.getElementById(dropdownId);
            const header = dropdown.querySelector('.dropdown-header');
            const options = dropdown.querySelector('.dropdown-options');
            const selectedSpan = dropdown.querySelector('.dropdown-selected');
            const hiddenInput = dropdown.querySelector('input[type="hidden"]');
            
            // Atualiza o texto selecionado
            selectedSpan.textContent = text;
            
            // Atualiza o input hidden
            hiddenInput.value = value;
            
            // Remove sele√ß√£o anterior
            options.querySelectorAll('.dropdown-option').forEach(option => {
                option.classList.remove('selected');
            });
            
            // Adiciona sele√ß√£o ao item clicado
            const selectedOption = options.querySelector(`[data-value="${value}"]`);
            if (selectedOption) {
                selectedOption.classList.add('selected');
            }
            
            // Fecha o dropdown
            options.classList.remove('show');
            header.classList.remove('active');
            
            // Dispara evento de change para valida√ß√£o
            hiddenInput.dispatchEvent(new Event('change'));
        }

        // Fecha dropdowns ao clicar fora
        document.addEventListener('click', function(event) {
            if (!event.target.closest('.custom-dropdown')) {
                document.querySelectorAll('.dropdown-options').forEach(options => {
                    options.classList.remove('show');
                    options.closest('.custom-dropdown').querySelector('.dropdown-header').classList.remove('active');
                });
            }
        });

        // Dados das listas
        let lists = [];
        let filteredLists = [];
        let currentPage = 1;
        const pageSize = 20;

        // Fun√ß√µes de mensagens
        function showMessage(element, message, type = 'info') {
            element.textContent = message;
            element.className = `message ${type} show`;
            setTimeout(() => {
                element.classList.remove('show');
            }, 8000); // Aumentado para 8 segundos
        }

        function setButtonLoading(button, loading) {
            const spinner = button.querySelector('.loading-spinner');
            const span = button.querySelector('span');
            
            if (loading) {
                button.classList.add('loading');
                button.disabled = true;
                if (spinner) spinner.style.display = 'block';
            } else {
                button.classList.remove('loading');
                button.disabled = false;
                if (spinner) spinner.style.display = 'none';
            }
        }

        // Fun√ß√£o para ler cookies
        function getCookie(name) {
            const value = `; ${document.cookie}`;
            const parts = value.split(`; ${name}=`);
            if (parts.length === 2) return parts.pop().split(';').shift();
            return null;
        }

        // Fun√ß√£o para obter userId de forma segura via cookies
        function getSecureUserId() {
            const userId = getCookie('userId');
            if (userId && /^[0-9a-f]{8}-[0-9a-f]{4}-[0-9a-f]{4}-[0-9a-f]{4}-[0-9a-f]{12}$/i.test(userId)) {
                console.log('‚úÖ UserId (UUID) obtido dos cookies:', userId);
                return userId;
            }
            console.error('‚ùå UserId (UUID) n√£o encontrado ou formato inv√°lido nos cookies!');
            return null;
        }

        // Autentica√ß√£o obrigat√≥ria ao carregar a p√°gina
        function checkAuth() {
            const userId = getSecureUserId();
            if (!userId) {
                console.error('‚ùå Usu√°rio n√£o autenticado, redirecionando para login');
                window.location.href = 'https://n8n.typebot.pro/webhook/login';
                return false;
            }
            console.log('‚úÖ Usu√°rio autenticado:', userId);
            return true;
        }

        // Navega√ß√£o simplificada (sem par√¢metros de autentica√ß√£o)
        function navigateToPage(url) {
            window.location.href = url;
        }

        // Redirecionar para lista de contatos ou grupos ao clicar no nome
        function goToListaContatos(idLista) {
            const userId = getSecureUserId();
            if (!userId) {
                window.location.href = 'https://n8n.typebot.pro/webhook/login';
                return;
            }
            // Buscar a lista pelo id para saber o tipo
            const list = lists.find(l => l.id === idLista);
            if (!list) {
                window.location.href = 'https://n8n.typebot.pro/webhook/listas';
                return;
            }
            // Definir cookies para a lista
            document.cookie = `userId=${userId}; path=/`;
            document.cookie = `idLista=${idLista}; path=/`;
            
            if (list.type === 'groups') {
                window.location.href = 'https://n8n.typebot.pro/webhook/listas-grupos';
            } else {
                window.location.href = 'https://n8n.typebot.pro/webhook/listas-contatos';
            }
        }

        // Renderizar tabela de listas
        function renderListsTable() {
            const total = filteredLists.length;
            const totalPages = Math.ceil(total / pageSize) || 1;
            if (currentPage > totalPages) currentPage = totalPages;
            if (currentPage < 1) currentPage = 1;
            const start = (currentPage - 1) * pageSize;
            const end = start + pageSize;
            const pageLists = filteredLists.slice(start, end);

            if (total === 0) {
                listsTableBody.innerHTML = `
                    <tr>
                        <td colspan="5" style="text-align: center; color: #888; padding: 40px 20px;">
                            <div style="margin-bottom: 15px; font-size: 3rem;">üìã</div>
                            <p style="font-size: 1.1rem; margin-bottom: 8px;">Voc√™ n√£o tem nenhuma lista</p>
                            <p style="font-size: 0.9rem; color: #aaa;">Clique no bot√£o "Criar Lista" acima para criar sua primeira lista.</p>
                        </td>
                    </tr>
                `;
            } else {
                listsTableBody.innerHTML = pageLists.map(list => `
                    <tr class="list-row" onclick="goToListaContatos(${list.id})" style="cursor: pointer;">
                        <td>
                            <div class="list-name">${list.name}</div>
                            <div style="color: #888; font-size: 0.8rem; margin-top: 4px;">${list.description}</div>
                        </td>
                        <td>
                            <span class="list-type ${list.type}">
                                ${list.type === 'contacts' ? 'Contatos' : 'Grupos'}
                            </span>
                        </td>
                        <td class="list-date">${formatDate(list.created)}</td>
                        <td>
                            <div class="list-actions" onclick="event.stopPropagation();">
                                <button class="action-btn" onclick="goToDisparo(${list.id}, '${list.type}')" title="Disparar">
                                    <svg width="18" height="18" viewBox="0 0 32 32" fill="currentColor" style="vertical-align:middle;"><path d="M16 3C9.373 3 4 8.373 4 15c0 2.637.86 5.08 2.48 7.13L4 29l7.13-2.48A11.94 11.94 0 0 0 16 27c6.627 0 12-5.373 12-12S22.627 3 16 3zm0 22c-1.98 0-3.89-.58-5.51-1.67l-.39-.25-4.23 1.47 1.47-4.23-.25-.39A9.94 9.94 0 0 1 6 15c0-5.514 4.486-10 10-10s10 4.486 10 10-4.486 10-10 10zm5.07-7.75c-.28-.14-1.65-.81-1.9-.9-.26-.1-.45-.14-.64.14-.19.28-.74.9-.91 1.08-.17.19-.34.21-.62.07-.28-.14-1.18-.44-2.25-1.41-.83-.74-1.39-1.65-1.55-1.93-.16-.28-.02-.43.12-.57.13-.13.28-.34.42-.51.14-.17.19-.28.28-.47.09-.19.05-.36-.02-.5-.07-.14-.64-1.54-.88-2.11-.23-.56-.47-.48-.64-.49-.16-.01-.36-.01-.56-.01-.19 0-.5.07-.76.36-.26.28-1 1-.99 2.43.01 1.43 1.03 2.81 1.18 3.01.15.2 2.03 3.1 4.93 4.23.69.28 1.23.45 1.65.58.69.22 1.32.19 1.81.12.55-.08 1.65-.67 1.89-1.32.23-.65.23-1.2.16-1.32-.07-.12-.25-.19-.53-.33z"/></svg>
                                </button>
                                <button class="action-btn delete" onclick="deleteList(${list.id})" title="Excluir">
                                    <svg width="16" height="16" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="currentColor"><path d="M6 19c0 1.1.9 2 2 2h8c1.1 0 2-.9 2-2V7H6v12zM19 4h-3.5l-1-1h-5l-1 1H5v2h14V4z"/></svg>
                                </button>
                            </div>
                        </td>
                    </tr>
                `).join('');
            }

            // Pagina√ß√£o
            renderPagination(totalPages);
        }

        function renderPagination(totalPages) {
            let paginationHtml = '';
            if (totalPages > 1) {
                paginationHtml += `<tr><td colspan="5" style="text-align:center; padding: 20px 0;">
                    <div class="pagination-controls">
                        <button class="btn" onclick="goToPage(${currentPage - 1})" ${currentPage === 1 ? 'disabled' : ''}>Anterior</button>
                        <span style="margin: 0 12px;">P√°gina ${currentPage} de ${totalPages}</span>
                        <button class="btn" onclick="goToPage(${currentPage + 1})" ${currentPage === totalPages ? 'disabled' : ''}>Pr√≥xima</button>
                    </div>
                </td></tr>`;
            }
            // Adiciona a pagina√ß√£o ao final da tabela
            listsTableBody.innerHTML += paginationHtml;
        }

        window.goToPage = function(page) {
            const totalPages = Math.ceil(filteredLists.length / pageSize) || 1;
            if (page < 1 || page > totalPages) return;
            currentPage = page;
            renderListsTable();
        }

        // Aplicar filtros
        function applyFilters() {
            let filtered = [...lists];
            
            // Filtro por tipo
            const typeValue = typeFilter.value;
            if (typeValue) {
                filtered = filtered.filter(list => list.type === typeValue);
            }
            
            // Filtro por data
            const dateValue = dateFilter.value;
            if (dateValue) {
                const today = new Date();
                const todayStr = today.toISOString().split('T')[0];
                
                filtered = filtered.filter(list => {
                    const listDate = new Date(list.created);
                    
                    switch (dateValue) {
                        case 'today':
                            return list.created === todayStr;
                        case 'week':
                            const weekAgo = new Date(today.getTime() - 7 * 24 * 60 * 60 * 1000);
                            return listDate >= weekAgo;
                        case 'month':
                            const monthAgo = new Date(today.getTime() - 30 * 24 * 60 * 60 * 1000);
                            return listDate >= monthAgo;
                        case 'year':
                            const yearAgo = new Date(today.getTime() - 365 * 24 * 60 * 60 * 1000);
                            return listDate >= yearAgo;
                        default:
                            return true;
                    }
                });
            }
            
            // Filtro por busca
            const searchValue = searchFilter.value.toLowerCase();
            if (searchValue) {
                filtered = filtered.filter(list => 
                    list.name.toLowerCase().includes(searchValue) ||
                    list.description.toLowerCase().includes(searchValue)
                );
            }
            
            filteredLists = filtered;
            currentPage = 1;
            renderListsTable();
        }

        // Carregar listas
        async function loadLists() {
            console.log('üìã Iniciando carregamento das listas...');
            
            // Mostrar loading
            document.getElementById('loadingContainer').style.display = 'flex';
            document.getElementById('mainContent').style.display = 'none';
            setButtonLoading(refreshBtn, true);
            
            try {
                const userId = getSecureUserId();
                if (!userId) {
                    throw new Error('ID do usu√°rio n√£o encontrado');
                }
                
                console.log('üîç Buscando listas para o usu√°rio:', userId);
                
                const response = await fetch('https://n8n.typebot.pro/webhook/puxar-lista', {
                    method: 'POST',
                    headers: {
                        'Content-Type': 'application/json',
                    },
                    body: JSON.stringify({ userId: userId })
                });
                
                if (!response.ok) {
                    const errorText = await response.text();
                    throw new Error(`Erro ao carregar listas: ${response.status} - ${errorText}`);
                }
                
                const responseData = await response.json();
                console.log('üìä Resposta da API:', responseData);
                
                // Verificar se a resposta tem a estrutura esperada
                if (responseData && responseData.data && Array.isArray(responseData.data)) {
                    lists = responseData.data.map(list => ({
                        id: list.id,
                        name: list.nome,
                        type: list.tipo,
                        size: 0,
                        created: list.created_at ? list.created_at.split('T')[0] : new Date().toISOString().split('T')[0],
                        description: list.descricao || ''
                    }));
                } else if (responseData && Array.isArray(responseData)) {
                    let allLists = [];
                    responseData.forEach(item => {
                        if (item.data && Array.isArray(item.data)) {
                            const processedLists = item.data.map(list => ({
                                id: list.id,
                                name: list.nome,
                                type: list.tipo,
                                size: 0,
                                created: list.created_at ? list.created_at.split('T')[0] : new Date().toISOString().split('T')[0],
                                description: list.descricao || ''
                            }));
                            allLists = allLists.concat(processedLists);
                        }
                    });
                    lists = allLists;
                } else {
                    lists = [];
                }
                
                filteredLists = [...lists];
                renderListsTable();
                
                console.log(`‚úÖ ${lists.length} lista(s) processada(s) com sucesso`);
                
                if (lists.length === 0) {
                    showMessage(listsMessage, 'üì≠ Voc√™ n√£o tem nenhuma lista', 'info');
                } else {
                    showMessage(listsMessage, `‚úÖ ${lists.length} lista(s) carregada(s) com sucesso!`, 'success');
                }
            } catch (error) {
                console.error('‚ùå Erro ao carregar listas:', error);
                
                // Verifica se √© o erro espec√≠fico de "No item to return got found"
                if (error.message && error.message.includes('No item to return got found')) {
                    console.log('üì≠ Resposta vazia - usu√°rio n√£o possui listas');
                    lists = [];
                    filteredLists = [];
                    renderListsTable();
                    showMessage(listsMessage, 'üì≠ Voc√™ n√£o tem nenhuma lista', 'info');
                } else {
                    showMessage(listsMessage, `‚ùå ${error.message}`, 'error');
                    lists = [];
                    filteredLists = [];
                    renderListsTable();
                }
            } finally {
                // Esconder loading
                document.getElementById('loadingContainer').style.display = 'none';
                document.getElementById('mainContent').style.display = 'flex';
                setButtonLoading(refreshBtn, false);
            }
        }

        // Fun√ß√µes utilit√°rias
        function formatDate(dateString) {
            const date = new Date(dateString);
            return date.toLocaleDateString('pt-BR');
        }

        // Event Listeners

        // Fun√ß√µes de a√ß√£o das listas
        window.editList = function(id) {
            const list = lists.find(l => l.id === id);
            if (list) {
                showMessage(listsMessage, `‚úèÔ∏è Editando lista: ${list.name}`, 'info');
                // Aqui voc√™ implementaria a edi√ß√£o
            }
            renderListsTable();
        };

        window.exportList = function(id) {
            const list = lists.find(l => l.id === id);
            if (list) {
                showMessage(listsMessage, `üì§ Exportando lista: ${list.name}`, 'info');
                // Aqui voc√™ implementaria a exporta√ß√£o
            }
        };

        window.deleteList = async function(id) {
            const list = lists.find(l => l.id === id);
            if (!list) {
                showMessage(listsMessage, '‚ùå Lista n√£o encontrada!', 'error');
                return;
            }
            
            if (!confirm(`Tem certeza que deseja excluir a lista "${list.name}"?\n\n‚ö†Ô∏è Esta a√ß√£o n√£o pode ser desfeita!`)) {
                return;
            }
            
            console.log('üóëÔ∏è Excluindo lista:', list);
            
            // Encontrar o bot√£o de exclus√£o para mostrar loading
            const deleteButton = document.querySelector(`button[onclick="deleteList(${id})"]`);
            const originalText = deleteButton ? deleteButton.innerHTML : 'üóëÔ∏è';
            
            if (deleteButton) {
                deleteButton.innerHTML = '‚è≥';
                deleteButton.disabled = true;
            }
            
            try {
                const response = await fetch('https://n8n.typebot.pro/webhook/excluir-lista', {
                    method: 'POST',
                    headers: {
                        'Content-Type': 'application/json',
                    },
                    body: JSON.stringify({ idLista: id })
                });

                if (response.ok) {
                    console.log('‚úÖ Lista exclu√≠da com sucesso:', list.name);
                    
                    // Remove a lista do array local
                    lists = lists.filter(l => l.id !== id);
                    filteredLists = [...lists];
                    currentPage = 1;
                    renderListsTable();
                    showMessage(listsMessage, `üóëÔ∏è Lista "${list.name}" exclu√≠da com sucesso!`, 'success');
                } else {
                    // Tratar erro espec√≠fico
                    const errorText = await response.text();
                    console.error('‚ùå Erro ao excluir lista:', response.status, errorText);
                    
                    // Sempre mostrar a mensagem espec√≠fica, independente do status
                    showMessage(listsMessage, '‚ö†Ô∏è N√£o √© poss√≠vel excluir uma lista que tenha um disparo', 'warning');
                }
                
            } catch (error) {
                console.error('‚ùå Erro ao excluir lista:', error);
                showMessage(listsMessage, '‚ö†Ô∏è N√£o √© poss√≠vel excluir uma lista que tenha um disparo', 'warning');
            } finally {
                // Restaurar o bot√£o
                if (deleteButton) {
                    deleteButton.innerHTML = originalText;
                    deleteButton.disabled = false;
                }
            }
        };

        // Event listeners para filtros
        typeFilter.addEventListener('change', applyFilters);
        dateFilter.addEventListener('change', applyFilters);
        searchFilter.addEventListener('input', applyFilters);

        // Inicializa√ß√£o
        document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', () => {
            console.log('üöÄ Iniciando carregamento da p√°gina de Listas...');
            
            if (!checkAuth()) {
                return; // checkAuth j√° redireciona se necess√°rio
            }
            
            loadLists();
            console.log('‚úÖ Tela de Listas carregada com sucesso');
        });



        function openCreateModal() {
            createListModal.classList.add('show');
            setTimeout(() => listNameInput.focus(), 100);
        }
        function closeCreateModal() {
            createListModal.classList.remove('show');
            createListForm.reset();
            
            // Reset do dropdown personalizado
            const dropdown = document.getElementById('listTypeDropdown');
            if (dropdown) {
                const selectedSpan = dropdown.querySelector('.dropdown-selected');
                const hiddenInput = dropdown.querySelector('input[type="hidden"]');
                const options = dropdown.querySelector('.dropdown-options');
                const header = dropdown.querySelector('.dropdown-header');
                
                selectedSpan.textContent = 'Selecione o tipo';
                hiddenInput.value = '';
                options.classList.remove('show');
                header.classList.remove('active');
                
                // Remove sele√ß√£o das op√ß√µes
                options.querySelectorAll('.dropdown-option').forEach(option => {
                    option.classList.remove('selected');
                });
            }
        }
        closeModal.addEventListener('click', closeCreateModal);
        createListModal.addEventListener('click', (e) => {
            if (e.target === createListModal) closeCreateModal();
        });
        createListForm.addEventListener('submit', async (e) => {
            e.preventDefault();
            const name = listNameInput.value.trim();
            const type = listTypeInput.value;
            const description = listDescriptionInput.value.trim();
            
            if (!name || !type) {
                showMessage(listsMessage, '‚ùå Por favor, preencha todos os campos obrigat√≥rios!', 'error');
                return;
            }
            
            console.log('üìù Criando nova lista:', { name, type, description });
            setButtonLoading(createListForm.querySelector('button'), true);
            
            try {
                const userId = getSecureUserId();
                if (!userId) {
                    throw new Error('Usu√°rio n√£o autenticado');
                }
                
                const requestBody = {
                    nome: name,
                    tipo: type,
                    descricao: description || '',
                    userId: userId
                };
                
                console.log('üì§ Enviando requisi√ß√£o para criar lista:', requestBody);
                
                const response = await fetch('https://n8n.typebot.pro/webhook/criar-lista', {
                    method: 'POST',
                    headers: {
                        'Content-Type': 'application/json',
                    },
                    body: JSON.stringify(requestBody)
                });
                
                if (!response.ok) {
                    const errorText = await response.text();
                    throw new Error(`Erro ao criar lista: ${response.status} - ${errorText}`);
                }
                
                const responseData = await response.json();
                console.log('‚úÖ Lista criada com sucesso:', responseData);
                
                const newList = {
                    id: responseData.id || Date.now(),
                    name,
                    type,
                    size: 0,
                    created: new Date().toISOString().split('T')[0],
                    description
                };
                
                lists.unshift(newList);
                filteredLists = [...lists];
                renderListsTable();
                showMessage(listsMessage, `‚úÖ Lista "${name}" criada com sucesso!`, 'success');
                closeCreateModal();
                
            } catch (error) {
                console.error('‚ùå Erro ao criar lista:', error);
                showMessage(listsMessage, `‚ùå ${error.message}`, 'error');
            } finally {
                setButtonLoading(createListForm.querySelector('button'), false);
            }
        });

        window.goToDisparo = function(idLista, listType) {
            const userId = getSecureUserId();
            if (!userId) {
                window.location.href = 'https://n8n.typebot.pro/webhook/login';
                return;
            }
            // Definir cookies para o disparo
            document.cookie = `userId=${userId}; path=/`;
            document.cookie = `idLista=${idLista}; path=/`;
            
            // Direcionar para a p√°gina correta baseado no tipo da lista
            if (listType === 'groups') {
                window.location.href = 'https://n8n.typebot.pro/webhook/disparos-grupos';
            } else {
                window.location.href = 'https://n8n.typebot.pro/webhook/disparos-individuais';
            }
        }

        // Fun√ß√£o de logout
        function logout() {
            console.log('üö™ Iniciando logout...');
            
            // Limpar todos os cookies
            document.cookie = 'userId=; expires=Thu, 01 Jan 1970 00:00:00 UTC; path=/;';
            document.cookie = 'idLista=; expires=Thu, 01 Jan 1970 00:00:00 UTC; path=/;';
            document.cookie = 'idConexao=; expires=Thu, 01 Jan 1970 00:00:00 UTC; path=/;';
            document.cookie = 'idDisparo=; expires=Thu, 01 Jan 1970 00:00:00 UTC; path=/;';
            
            // Limpar sessionStorage
            sessionStorage.clear();
            
            console.log('üßπ Cookies e sessionStorage limpos');
            console.log('üîÑ Redirecionando para login...');
            
            // Redirecionar para p√°gina de login
            window.location.href = 'https://n8n.typebot.pro/webhook/login';
        }
    </script>
</body>
</html>

<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="pt-BR">
<head>
    <meta charset="UTF-8">
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
    <title>Lista de Contatos - EnviaZap</title>
    <style>
        * {
            margin: 0;
            padding: 0;
            box-sizing: border-box;
        }

        body {
            background: linear-gradient(135deg, #0a0a0a 0%, #1a1a1a 100%);
            font-family: -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, 'Segoe UI', Roboto, sans-serif;
            color: white;
            min-height: 100vh;
            margin: 0;
            padding: 0;
        }

        .app-layout {
            display: flex;
            min-height: 100vh;
        }

        /* Sidebar */
        .sidebar {
            width: 70px;
            background: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.3);
            backdrop-filter: blur(10px);
            border-right: 1px solid rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.1);
            transition: all 0.3s ease;
            position: relative;
            z-index: 1000;
            display: flex;
            flex-direction: column;
            height: 100vh;
            overflow: hidden;
        }

        /* Hover controlado via JavaScript */
        /* .sidebar:hover {
            width: 250px;
        } */

        .sidebar-header {
            padding: 20px;
            text-align: center;
            border-bottom: 1px solid rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.1);
        }

        .sidebar-logo {
            font-size: 1.5rem;
            font-weight: 600;
            background: linear-gradient(135deg, #25d366 0%, #128c7e 100%);
            -webkit-background-clip: text;
            -webkit-text-fill-color: transparent;
            background-clip: text;
            white-space: nowrap;
            opacity: 0;
            transition: opacity 0.3s ease;
        }

        /* Controlado via JavaScript */
        /* .sidebar:hover .sidebar-logo {
            opacity: 1;
        } */

        .sidebar-menu {
            padding: 20px 0;
            flex: 1;
        }

        .menu-item {
            display: flex;
            align-items: center;
            padding: 15px 20px;
            color: #ccc;
            text-decoration: none;
            transition: all 0.3s ease;
            position: relative;
            white-space: nowrap;
        }

        .menu-item:hover {
            background: rgba(37, 211, 102, 0.1);
            color: #25d366;
        }

        .menu-item.active {
            background: rgba(37, 211, 102, 0.2);
            color: #25d366;
            border-right: 3px solid #25d366;
        }

        .menu-icon {
            font-size: 1.2rem;
            width: 30px;
            text-align: center;
            flex-shrink: 0;
        }

        .menu-text {
            margin-left: 15px;
            opacity: 0;
            transition: opacity 0.3s ease;
        }

        /* Controlado via JavaScript */
        /* .sidebar:hover .menu-text {
            opacity: 1;
        } */

        .sidebar-footer {
            margin-top: auto;
            border-top: 1px solid rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.1);
            padding: 10px 0;
        }

        .logout-item {
            color: #ff6b6b !important;
        }

        .logout-item:hover {
            background: rgba(255, 107, 107, 0.1) !important;
            color: #ff6b6b !important;
        }

        /* Main content */
        .main-content-wrapper {
            flex: 1;
            padding: 30px 0 30px 0;
            overflow-x: auto;
        }

        .container {
            width: 100%;
            max-width: 100vw;
            margin: 0;
            padding: 0 30px;
        }

        .header {
            display: flex;
            justify-content: space-between;
            align-items: center;
            margin-bottom: 40px;
        }

        .header-info {
            display: flex;
            flex-direction: column;
            gap: 4px;
        }

        .header-info h1 {
            font-size: 2.5rem;
            font-weight: 600;
            margin-bottom: 10px;
            color: white;
        }



        .list-name-display {
            color: white;
            font-size: 2.2rem;
            font-weight: 700;
            background: linear-gradient(135deg, rgba(37,211,102,0.15) 0%, rgba(18,140,126,0.15) 100%);
            border: 1px solid rgba(37,211,102,0.3);
            border-radius: 12px;
            padding: 12px 20px;
            display: inline-block;
            letter-spacing: 0.5px;
            min-width: 200px;
            transition: all 0.3s ease, opacity 0.3s ease, visibility 0.3s ease;
            margin-top: 8px;
        }

        .list-name-display:hover {
            border-color: rgba(37,211,102,0.5);
            background: linear-gradient(135deg, rgba(37,211,102,0.2) 0%, rgba(18,140,126,0.2) 100%);
        }

        .header-info p {
            color: #888;
            font-size: 1.1rem;
        }

        /* Melhorar design dos bot√µes */
        .btn {
            padding: 10px 16px;
            background: linear-gradient(135deg, #25d366 0%, #128c7e 100%);
            border: none;
            border-radius: 10px;
            color: white;
            font-weight: 600;
            cursor: pointer;
            transition: all 0.3s ease;
            display: flex;
            align-items: center;
            gap: 8px;
            font-size: 0.9rem;
            text-decoration: none;
            box-shadow: 0 2px 8px rgba(37, 211, 102, 0.2);
        }

        .btn:hover {
            transform: translateY(-2px);
            box-shadow: 0 6px 20px rgba(37, 211, 102, 0.3);
        }

        .btn-danger:hover {
            transform: translateY(-2px);
            box-shadow: 0 6px 20px rgba(220, 38, 38, 0.4);
        }

        .btn-success {
            background: linear-gradient(135deg, #10b981 0%, #059669 100%);
            box-shadow: 0 2px 8px rgba(16, 185, 129, 0.2);
        }

        .btn-success:hover {
            transform: translateY(-2px);
            box-shadow: 0 6px 20px rgba(16, 185, 129, 0.4);
        }

        .btn-secondary {
            background: linear-gradient(135deg, rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.08) 0%, rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.12) 100%);
            border: 1px solid rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.2);
            box-shadow: 0 2px 8px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1);
        }

        .btn-secondary:hover {
            background: linear-gradient(135deg, rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.12) 0%, rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.16) 100%);
            box-shadow: 0 6px 20px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.2);
        }

        .btn:disabled {
            background: linear-gradient(135deg, #444 0%, #555 100%);
            cursor: not-allowed;
            transform: none;
            box-shadow: none;
        }

        .btn-icon {
            width: 16px;
            height: 16px;
            fill: currentColor;
            flex-shrink: 0;
        }

        /* √çcones para se√ß√µes */
        .section-icon svg {
            width: 20px;
            height: 20px;
            fill: #25d366;
        }

        .main-content {
            display: flex;
            flex-direction: column;
            gap: 30px;
        }
        
        /* Garantir que a pagina√ß√£o n√£o seja afetada pela tabela */
        .section:has(.contacts-table-container) {
            position: relative;
            overflow: visible;
        }

        .section {
            background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.02);
            border: 1px solid rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.1);
            border-radius: 16px;
            padding: 40px;
            backdrop-filter: blur(10px);
            box-shadow: 0 20px 60px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.3);
            overflow: visible;
        }

        .section-header {
            display: flex;
            align-items: center;
            gap: 12px;
            margin-bottom: 25px;
            padding-bottom: 15px;
            border-bottom: 1px solid rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.1);
        }

        .section-icon {
            font-size: 1.5rem;
        }

        .section-title {
            font-size: 1.4rem;
            font-weight: 600;
            color: #25d366;
        }

        .section-subtitle {
            color: #888;
            font-size: 0.9rem;
            margin-bottom: 20px;
            line-height: 1.4;
        }

        /* Header com a√ß√µes */
        .header-actions {
            display: flex;
            gap: 15px;
            align-items: center;
            flex-wrap: wrap;
        }

        .btn {
            padding: 12px 20px;
            background: linear-gradient(135deg, #25d366 0%, #128c7e 100%);
            border: none;
            border-radius: 8px;
            color: white;
            font-weight: 600;
            cursor: pointer;
            transition: all 0.3s ease;
            display: flex;
            align-items: center;
            gap: 8px;
            font-size: 0.9rem;
            text-decoration: none;
        }

        .btn:hover {
            transform: translateY(-2px);
            box-shadow: 0 8px 25px rgba(37, 211, 102, 0.3);
        }

        .btn-secondary {
            background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.05);
            border: 1px solid rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.2);
        }

        .btn-secondary:hover {
            background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.1);
        }

        .btn:disabled {
            background: #444;
            cursor: not-allowed;
            transform: none;
        }

        /* Tabela de contatos */
        .contacts-table-container {
            background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.02);
            border: 1px solid rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.1);
            border-radius: 16px;
            overflow: hidden;
            backdrop-filter: blur(10px);
            overflow-x: auto;
            margin-bottom: 0;
        }

        .contacts-table {
            width: 100%;
            border-collapse: collapse;
            table-layout: fixed;
            min-width: 800px;
        }

        .contacts-table th {
            background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.05);
            padding: 15px 20px;
            text-align: left;
            font-weight: 600;
            color: #25d366;
            font-size: 0.9rem;
            border-bottom: 1px solid rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.1);
            white-space: nowrap;
        }

        .contacts-table td {
            padding: 15px 20px;
            border-bottom: 1px solid rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.05);
            font-size: 0.9rem;
            word-wrap: break-word;
            overflow: hidden;
            text-overflow: ellipsis;
        }

        .contacts-table tr:hover {
            background: rgba(37, 211, 102, 0.05);
        }

        .contacts-table tr:last-child td {
            border-bottom: none;
        }

        .contact-name {
            font-weight: 600;
            color: #fff;
        }

        .contact-phone {
            color: #25d366;
            font-family: monospace;
        }

        .contact-date {
            color: #888;
            font-size: 0.85rem;
        }

        .contact-actions {
            display: flex;
            gap: 8px;
        }

        .action-btn {
            background: none;
            border: none;
            color: #888;
            cursor: pointer;
            padding: 6px;
            border-radius: 4px;
            transition: all 0.3s ease;
            font-size: 0.9rem;
        }

        .action-btn:hover {
            background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.1);
            color: white;
        }

        .action-btn.edit:hover {
            color: #25d366;
        }

        .action-btn.delete:hover {
            color: #ff4444;
        }

        /* Loading state */
        .loading-container {
            display: flex;
            flex-direction: column;
            align-items: center;
            justify-content: center;
            min-height: 400px;
            gap: 20px;
        }

        .loading-spinner {
            width: 60px;
            height: 60px;
            border: 4px solid rgba(37, 211, 102, 0.3);
            border-top: 4px solid #25d366;
            border-radius: 50%;
            animation: spin 1s linear infinite;
        }

        .loading-text {
            color: #25d366;
            font-size: 1.2rem;
            font-weight: 500;
        }

        /* Mensagens */
        .message {
            padding: 15px;
            border-radius: 8px;
            margin-bottom: 15px;
            font-size: 0.9rem;
            display: none;
        }

        .message.show {
            display: block;
            animation: fadeIn 0.3s ease;
        }

        .message.success {
            background: rgba(37, 211, 102, 0.1);
            border: 1px solid rgba(37, 211, 102, 0.3);
            color: #25d366;
        }

        .message.error {
            background: rgba(255, 68, 68, 0.1);
            border: 1px solid rgba(255, 68, 68, 0.3);
            color: #ff4444;
        }

        .message.info {
            background: rgba(255, 193, 7, 0.1);
            border: 1px solid rgba(255, 193, 7, 0.3);
            color: #ffc107;
        }

        /* Loading spinner */
        .loading-spinner {
            width: 20px;
            height: 20px;
            border: 2px solid rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.3);
            border-top: 2px solid white;
            border-radius: 50%;
            animation: spin 1s linear infinite;
            display: none;
        }

        .btn.loading .loading-spinner {
            display: block;
        }

        @keyframes spin {
            0% { transform: rotate(0deg); }
            100% { transform: rotate(360deg); }
        }

        @keyframes fadeIn {
            from {
                opacity: 0;
                transform: translateY(20px);
            }
            to {
                opacity: 1;
                transform: translateY(0);
            }
        }

        /* Scrollbar customization */
        .contacts-table-container::-webkit-scrollbar {
            width: 6px;
        }

        .contacts-table-container::-webkit-scrollbar-track {
            background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.05);
            border-radius: 3px;
        }

        .contacts-table-container::-webkit-scrollbar-thumb {
            background: rgba(37, 211, 102, 0.5);
            border-radius: 3px;
        }

        .contacts-table-container::-webkit-scrollbar-thumb:hover {
            background: rgba(37, 211, 102, 0.7);
        }

        /* Pagina√ß√£o */
        #contactsPagination {
            display: flex !important;
            justify-content: center !important;
            align-items: center !important;
            gap: 8px !important;
            margin: 20px auto 0 auto !important;
            flex-wrap: wrap !important;
            width: 100% !important;
            max-width: 100% !important;
            clear: both !important;
            position: relative !important;
            z-index: 1 !important;
            background: transparent !important;
            box-sizing: border-box !important;
            padding: 0 !important;
        }

        #contactsPagination button {
            margin: 0 !important;
            flex-shrink: 0 !important;
            position: relative !important;
            z-index: 1 !important;
            white-space: nowrap !important;
        }

        /* Responsive */
        @media (max-width: 768px) {
            .main-content {
                gap: 20px;
            }
            
            .header {
                flex-direction: column;
                align-items: stretch;
                gap: 15px;
            }

            .header-info h1 {
                font-size: 2rem;
                margin-bottom: 8px;
            }
            
            .header-actions {
                gap: 8px;
                width: 100%;
                justify-content: flex-start;
            }

            .header-actions .btn {
                font-size: 0.8rem;
                padding: 8px 12px;
            }

            .list-name-display {
                font-size: 1.6rem;
                padding: 8px 14px;
                min-width: 150px;
                transition: all 0.3s ease, opacity 0.3s ease, visibility 0.3s ease;
            }

            .main-content-wrapper {
                padding: 15px;
            }
            
            .contacts-table {
                font-size: 0.8rem;
            }
            
            .contacts-table th,
            .contacts-table td {
                padding: 10px 12px;
            }
            
            #contactsPagination {
                gap: 4px !important;
                margin: 15px auto 0 auto !important;
            }
            
            #contactsPagination button {
                padding: 4px 8px !important;
                font-size: 0.75rem !important;
                min-width: 28px !important;
            }
        }

        /* Modal */
        .modal {
            display: none;
            position: fixed;
            top: 0;
            left: 0;
            width: 100%;
            height: 100%;
            background: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.8);
            z-index: 1000;
            backdrop-filter: blur(5px);
        }
        .modal.show {
            display: flex;
            align-items: center;
            justify-content: center;
        }
        .modal-content {
            background: rgba(26, 26, 26, 0.95);
            border: 1px solid rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.1);
            border-radius: 16px;
            padding: 30px;
            max-width: 500px;
            width: 90%;
            max-height: 90vh;
            overflow-y: auto;
            backdrop-filter: blur(10px);
            box-shadow: 0 20px 60px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.5);
        }
        
        .modal-content.with-invalid-table {
            max-width: 800px;

        }
        .modal-header {
            display: flex;

            margin-bottom: 20px;
        }
        .modal-title {

        }
        .modal-close {

            cursor: pointer;
            padding: 5px;
            border-radius: 4px;
            transition: all 0.3s ease;
        }
        .modal-close:hover {
            background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.1);
            color: white;
        }
        .modal .form-group {
            margin-bottom: 22px;
        }
        .modal .form-group label {
            color: #fff;
            font-weight: 500;
            margin-bottom: 8px;
            font-size: 0.95rem;
            display: block;
        }
        .modal .form-group input,
        .modal .form-group select {
            width: 100%;
            padding: 12px 15px;
            background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.05);
            border: 1px solid rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.2);
            border-radius: 8px;
            color: white;
            font-size: 1rem;
            outline: none;
            transition: all 0.3s ease;
        }
        .modal .form-group input:focus,
        .modal .form-group select:focus {
            border-color: #25d366;
            box-shadow: 0 0 0 2px rgba(37, 211, 102, 0.2);
        }
        .modal .form-group input::placeholder {
            color: #888;
        }

        /* Vari√°veis */
        .variables-container {
            display: flex;
            flex-wrap: wrap;
            gap: 10px;
            margin-bottom: 20px;
        }

        .variable-tag {
            background: rgba(37, 211, 102, 0.1);

        }

        .variable-remove {
            background: none;
            border: none;

            padding: 0;
            width: 16px;
            height: 16px;
            display: flex;
            align-items: center;
            justify-content: center;
            border-radius: 50%;

        .variable-remove:hover {

            color: #ff4444;
        }

        /* File upload */
        .file-upload {
            border: 2px dashed rgba(37, 211, 102, 0.3);
            border-radius: 8px;
            padding: 30px;
            text-align: center;
            transition: all 0.3s ease;
            cursor: pointer;
            position: relative;
        }

        .file-upload:hover {
            border-color: #25d366;
            background: rgba(37, 211, 102, 0.05);
        }

        .file-upload.has-file {
            border-color: #25d366;
            background: rgba(37, 211, 102, 0.1);
        }

        .file-upload input[type="file"] {

        .file-upload-icon {

            color: #25d366;
            margin-bottom: 10px;

        .file-upload.has-file .file-upload-icon {
            color: #25d366;
        }

        .file-name {
            color: #25d366;
            font-weight: 600;
            font-size: 1rem;
            margin-top: 10px;
            word-break: break-all;
        }

        .file-upload-text {
            transition: all 0.3s ease;
        }

        .file-upload.has-file .file-upload-text {
            display: none;
        }

        .download-example {
            color: #25d366;
            text-decoration: none;
            font-size: 0.9rem;
            margin-top: 15px;
            display: inline-block;
        }

        .download-example:hover {
            text-decoration: underline;
        }

        /* Modal WhatsApp */
        .connection-dropdown {
            width: 100%;
            padding: 12px 15px;
            background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.05);
            border: 1px solid rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.2);
            border-radius: 8px;
            color: white;
            font-size: 1rem;
            outline: none;
            transition: all 0.3s ease;
            appearance: none;
            background-image: url("data:image/svg+xml,%3csvg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' fill='none' viewBox='0 0 20 20'%3e%3cpath stroke='%236b7280' stroke-linecap='round' stroke-linejoin='round' stroke-width='1.5' d='m6 8 4 4 4-4'/%3e%3c/svg%3e");
            background-position: right 12px center;
            background-repeat: no-repeat;
            background-size: 16px;
            padding-right: 40px;
        }

        .connection-dropdown:focus {
            border-color: #25d366;
            box-shadow: 0 0 0 2px rgba(37, 211, 102, 0.2);
        }

        .connection-dropdown option { 
            background: rgba(26, 26, 26, 0.95); 
            color: white; 
            padding: 8px 12px; 
            border: none;
        }
        .connection-dropdown option[data-connected="1"] {
            color: #25d366 !important;
            background: rgba(37, 211, 102, 0.1) !important;
            font-weight: 600;
        }
        .connection-dropdown option[data-connected="0"] {
            color: #ff4444 !important;
            background: rgba(255, 68, 68, 0.1) !important;
            font-weight: 400;
        }
        .connection-dropdown option[data-connected="checking"] {
            color: #888 !important;
            background: rgba(136, 136, 136, 0.1) !important;
            font-weight: 400;
        }

        .connection-option {
            background: #2a2a2a;
            color: white;
            padding: 8px;
        }

        .connection-status {
            display: inline-block;
            width: 8px;
            height: 8px;
            border-radius: 50%;
            margin-right: 8px;
        }

        .connection-status.connected {
            background-color: #22c55e;
            box-shadow: 0 0 4px rgba(34, 197, 94, 0.5);
        }

        .connection-status.disconnected {
            background-color: #ef4444;
            box-shadow: 0 0 4px rgba(239, 68, 68, 0.5);
        }

        .whatsapp-loading {
            display: flex;
            align-items: center;
            justify-content: center;
            padding: 20px;
            color: #25d366;
        }

        .whatsapp-loading .loading-spinner {
            width: 30px;
            height: 30px;
            margin-right: 10px;
        }

        /* Lista de contatos do WhatsApp */
        .whatsapp-contacts-container {
            margin-top: 20px;
            display: none;
        }

        .whatsapp-contacts-list {
            max-height: 300px;
            overflow-y: auto;
            border: 1px solid rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.1);
            border-radius: 8px;
            background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.02);
        }

        .whatsapp-contact-item {
            display: flex;

            gap: 12px;

            border-bottom: 1px solid rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.05);

            position: relative;
        }

        .whatsapp-contact-item:last-child {
            border-bottom: none;
        }

        .whatsapp-contact-item:hover {
            background: rgba(37, 211, 102, 0.05);
        }

        .whatsapp-contact-item.duplicate {
            background: rgba(255, 193, 7, 0.08);
            border-left: 3px solid #ffc107;
        }

        .whatsapp-contact-item.duplicate:hover {
            background: rgba(255, 193, 7, 0.12);
        }

        .whatsapp-contact-item.duplicate .whatsapp-contact-name {
            color: #ffc107;
        }

        .whatsapp-contact-item.duplicate .whatsapp-contact-phone {
            color: #e0a800;
        }

        .whatsapp-contact-checkbox {
            width: 16px;
            height: 16px;
            margin: 0;
        }

        .whatsapp-contact-info {
            flex: 1;
        }

        .whatsapp-contact-name {
            font-weight: 600;
            color: #fff;
            margin-bottom: 2px;
        }

        .whatsapp-contact-phone {
            font-size: 0.85rem;
            color: #888;
            font-family: monospace;
        }

        .whatsapp-contacts-header {
            display: flex;
            justify-content: space-between;
            align-items: center;
            margin-bottom: 10px;
            padding: 0 2px;
        }

        .whatsapp-contacts-count {
            color: #25d366;
            font-weight: 600;
            font-size: 0.9rem;
        }

        .whatsapp-contacts-actions {
            display: flex;
            gap: 8px;
        }

        .btn-link {
            background: none;
            border: none;
            color: #25d366;
            font-size: 0.85rem;
            cursor: pointer;
            text-decoration: underline;
            padding: 0;
        }

        .btn-link:hover {
            color: #1da851;
        }

        .duplicate-badge {
            position: absolute;
            top: 8px;
            right: 8px;
            background: #ffc107;
            color: #000;
            font-size: 0.7rem;
            padding: 2px 6px;
            border-radius: 10px;
            font-weight: 600;
        }

        /* Tabela de n√∫meros inv√°lidos */
        .invalid-numbers-table {
            background: rgba(255, 68, 68, 0.05);
            border: 1px solid rgba(255, 68, 68, 0.3);
            border-radius: 12px;
            padding: 20px;

        }

        .invalid-numbers-header {
            display: flex;

            gap: 10px;

            color: #ff4444;

        .invalid-numbers-table table {
            width: 100%;
            border-collapse: collapse;

        }

        .invalid-numbers-table th {
            background: rgba(255, 68, 68, 0.1);

            font-weight: 600;
            border-bottom: 1px solid rgba(255, 68, 68, 0.2);
        }

        .invalid-numbers-table td {
            padding: 12px;
            border-bottom: 1px solid rgba(255, 68, 68, 0.1);
            vertical-align: middle;
        }

        .invalid-numbers-table tr:hover {
            background: rgba(255, 68, 68, 0.05);
        }

        .invalid-number-row {
            background: rgba(255, 68, 68, 0.02);
        }

        .fixable-number-row {
            background: rgba(255, 193, 7, 0.05);
        }

        .fixable-number-row:hover {
            background: rgba(255, 193, 7, 0.08);
        }

        .whatsapp-invalid-number-row {
            background: rgba(255, 68, 68, 0.03);
            border-left: 3px solid #ff4444;
        }

        .whatsapp-invalid-number-row:hover {
            background: rgba(255, 68, 68, 0.06);
        }

        .number-original {
            font-family: monospace;
            color: #ff4444;
            font-weight: 500;
        }

        .number-corrected {
            font-family: monospace;
            color: #ffc107;
            font-weight: 600;
        }

        .number-status {
            display: flex;
            align-items: center;
            gap: 8px;
        }

        .status-icon {
            width: 16px;
            height: 16px;
        }

        .edit-number-btn {
            background: none;
            border: none;
            color: #25d366;
            cursor: pointer;
            padding: 4px;
            border-radius: 4px;
            transition: all 0.2s ease;
            display: flex;
            align-items: center;
            justify-content: center;
        }

        .edit-number-btn:hover {
            background: rgba(37, 211, 102, 0.1);

        .edit-number-input {

        .edit-number-input:focus {

        }

        .save-number-btn {
            background: #25d366;
            border: none;
            color: white;
            padding: 4px 8px;
            border-radius: 4px;
            font-size: 0.8rem;
            cursor: pointer;
            margin-left: 4px;
        }

        .save-number-btn:hover {
            background: #1da851;
        }

        .cancel-number-btn {
            background: #ff4444;
            border: none;
            color: white;
            padding: 4px 8px;
            border-radius: 4px;
            font-size: 0.8rem;
            cursor: pointer;
            margin-left: 4px;
        }

        .cancel-number-btn:hover {
            background: #dc2626;

</head>

    <div class="app-layout">
        <!-- Sidebar -->
        <div class="sidebar">
            <div class="sidebar-header">
                <div class="sidebar-logo">EnviaZap</div>
            </div>
            <nav class="sidebar-menu">

    <!-- Modal para verificar n√∫meros -->
    <div class="modal" id="verifyNumbersModal">

                <!-- Container para resultados da verifica√ß√£o -->

                                <div style="color: #ff4444; font-size: 1.8rem; font-weight: 700;" id="invalidCount">0</div>

                                <div style="color: #ffc107; font-size: 1.8rem; font-weight: 700;" id="duplicateCount">0</div>

                    <div class="verification-details" id="verificationDetails" style="display: none;">
                        <div style="margin-bottom: 15px;">
