        // ===== FUN√á√ïES VERIFY NUMBERS MODAL =====

        // Carregar conex√µes para o modal de verifica√ß√£o de n√∫meros
        async function loadVerifyConnections() {
            console.log('üîÑ Carregando conex√µes para verifica√ß√£o...');
            
            try {
                const userId = getSecureUserId();
                if (!userId) {
                    throw new Error('ID do usu√°rio n√£o encontrado');
                }

                const response = await fetch('https://n8n.typebot.pro/webhook/listarconexoes', {
                    method: 'POST',
                    headers: {
                        'Content-Type': 'application/json',
                    },
                    body: JSON.stringify({ userId: userId })
                });

                if (!response.ok) {
                    const errorText = await response.text();
                    throw new Error(`Erro ao carregar conex√µes: ${response.status} - ${errorText}`);
                }

                const responseData = await response.json();
                console.log('‚úÖ Conex√µes carregadas para verifica√ß√£o:', responseData);

                // Processar conex√µes da resposta (mesmo c√≥digo do outro modal)
                let rawConnections = [];
                if (responseData && responseData.Conexoes && Array.isArray(responseData.Conexoes)) {
                    rawConnections = responseData.Conexoes;
                } else if (Array.isArray(responseData) && responseData.length > 0 && responseData[0].Conexoes && Array.isArray(responseData[0].Conexoes)) {
                    rawConnections = responseData[0].Conexoes;
                } else if (responseData && responseData.data && Array.isArray(responseData.data)) {
                    rawConnections = responseData.data;
                } else if (Array.isArray(responseData)) {
                    rawConnections = responseData;
                } else {
                    rawConnections = [];
                }

                // Filtrar conex√µes v√°lidas
                const verifyConnections = rawConnections.filter(conn => (conn.instanceName || conn.instance_name) && (conn.NomeConexao || conn.nomeConexao || conn.name));
                
                // Inicializar todas as conex√µes como "verificando" status
                verifyConnections.forEach(conn => {
                    conn.isConnected = null;
                    conn.isVerifying = true;
                });

                // Renderizar dropdown imediatamente
                renderVerifyConnectionsDropdown(verifyConnections);

                // Verificar status em background
                const statusPromises = verifyConnections.map(async (conn, index) => {
                    try {
                        const instanceName = conn.instanceName || conn.instance_name;
                        if (!instanceName) { 
                            conn.isConnected = false;
                            conn.isVerifying = false;
                            updateVerifyConnectionOption(index, conn, false);
                            return; 
                        }
                        
                        const statusResp = await fetch(`https://whatsapi.typebot.pro/instance/connectionState/${instanceName}`, {
                            method: 'GET',
                            headers: { 'apikey': 'b4d71f9c38e3ac12a6b08e4b6d53aa90' }
                        });
                        
                        if (!statusResp.ok) { 
                            conn.isConnected = false;
                            conn.isVerifying = false;
                            updateVerifyConnectionOption(index, conn, false);
                            return; 
                        }
                        
                        const statusData = await statusResp.json();
                        const state = statusData?.instance?.state || statusData?.state || statusData?.status || statusData?.connectionState;
                        const isConnected = (state === 'open' || state === 'connected');
                        conn.isConnected = isConnected;
                        conn.isVerifying = false;
                        
                        updateVerifyConnectionOption(index, conn, isConnected);
                        
                    } catch (error) { 
                        console.error(`‚ùå Erro ao verificar status da conex√£o ${conn.instanceName}:`, error);
                        conn.isConnected = false; 
                        conn.isVerifying = false;
                        updateVerifyConnectionOption(index, conn, false);
                    }
                });

                await Promise.all(statusPromises);
                console.log('‚úÖ Verifica√ß√µes de status conclu√≠das para modal de verifica√ß√£o');

            } catch (error) {
                console.error('‚ùå Erro ao carregar conex√µes para verifica√ß√£o:', error);
                showMessage(verifyNumbersModalMessage, `‚ùå ${error.message}`, 'error');
                verifyConnectionsLoading.style.display = 'none';
                verifyConnectionSelect.style.display = 'block';
            }
        }

        // Renderizar dropdown de conex√µes para verifica√ß√£o
        function renderVerifyConnectionsDropdown(verifyConnections) {
            if (verifyConnections.length === 0) {
                verifyConnectionSelect.innerHTML = '<option value="">Nenhuma conex√£o encontrada</option>';
            } else {
                // Renderizar com status inicial "verificando" usando innerHTML para melhor styling
                verifyConnectionSelect.innerHTML = '<option value="">Selecione...</option>' +
                    verifyConnections.map(conn => {
                        const nome = conn.NomeConexao || conn.nomeConexao || conn.name;
                        const instance = conn.instanceName || conn.instance_name;
                        return `<option value="${instance}" data-connected="checking" style="color: #888; background-color: rgba(136, 136, 136, 0.1);">üîÑ ${nome} (verificando...)</option>`;
                    }).join('');
            }

            verifyConnectionsLoading.style.display = 'none';
            verifyConnectionSelect.style.display = 'block';
        }

        // Atualizar op√ß√£o espec√≠fica do dropdown de verifica√ß√£o
        function updateVerifyConnectionOption(index, conn, isConnected) {
            const nome = conn.NomeConexao || conn.nomeConexao || conn.name;
            const instance = conn.instanceName || conn.instance_name;
            const status = isConnected ? '‚úÖ ' : '‚ùå ';
            const statusText = isConnected ? 'Conectada' : 'Desconectada';
            const textColor = isConnected ? '#25d366' : '#ff4444';
            const backgroundColor = isConnected ? 'rgba(37, 211, 102, 0.1)' : 'rgba(255, 68, 68, 0.1)';
            
            // Encontrar a op√ß√£o correta no select (index + 1 porque a primeira √© "Selecione...")
            const option = verifyConnectionSelect.options[index + 1];
            if (option) {
                option.innerHTML = `${status}${nome} (${statusText})`;
                option.style.color = textColor;
                option.style.backgroundColor = backgroundColor;
                option.style.fontWeight = isConnected ? '600' : '400';
                option.setAttribute('data-connected', isConnected ? '1' : '0');
                option.disabled = !isConnected; // S√≥ permite selecionar se conectada
            }
            
            console.log(`üîÑ Op√ß√£o de verifica√ß√£o atualizada: ${nome} - ${isConnected ? 'Conectada' : 'Desconectada'}`);
        }

        // Verificar n√∫meros no WhatsApp
        async function verifyNumbers(instanceName) {
            console.log('üîç Verificando n√∫meros no WhatsApp...');
            
            // Extrair n√∫meros dos contatos (remover formata√ß√£o)
            const allNumbers = contacts.map(contact => contact.phone.replace(/\D/g, ''));
            
            // Remover duplicatas mantendo ordem original
            const numbersToVerify = [...new Set(allNumbers)];
            
            console.log('üìã N√∫meros originais:', allNumbers.length);
            console.log('üìã N√∫meros √∫nicos a verificar:', numbersToVerify.length, numbersToVerify);
            
            // Iniciar anima√ß√£o da barra de progresso (30 segundos)
            startProgressAnimation();
            
            try {
                const response = await fetch(`https://whatsapi.typebot.pro/chat/whatsappNumbers/${instanceName}`, {
                    method: 'POST',
                    headers: {
                        'Content-Type': 'application/json',
                        'apikey': 'b4d71f9c38e3ac12a6b08e4b6d53aa90'
                    },
                    body: JSON.stringify({
                        numbers: numbersToVerify
                    })
                });

                if (!response.ok) {
                    const errorText = await response.text();
                    throw new Error(`Erro ao verificar n√∫meros: ${response.status} - ${errorText}`);
                }

                const responseData = await response.json();
                console.log('‚úÖ Resposta da verifica√ß√£o:', responseData);

                // Processar resultados usando TODOS os n√∫meros originais (incluindo duplicatas)
                processVerificationResults(responseData, allNumbers);

            } catch (error) {
                console.error('‚ùå Erro ao verificar n√∫meros:', error);
                throw error;
            }
        }

        // Vari√°vel para controlar a anima√ß√£o
        let progressAnimationId = null;

        // Animar barra de progresso por 30 segundos
        function startProgressAnimation() {
            const duration = 30000; // 30 segundos
            const startTime = Date.now();
            
            function updateProgress() {
                const elapsed = Date.now() - startTime;
                const progress = Math.min((elapsed / duration) * 100, 100);
                
                verificationProgress.textContent = `${Math.round(progress)}%`;
                verificationProgressBar.style.width = `${progress}%`;
                
                if (progress < 100) {
                    progressAnimationId = requestAnimationFrame(updateProgress);
                } else {
                    progressAnimationId = null;
                }
            }
            
            // Iniciar anima√ß√£o
            progressAnimationId = requestAnimationFrame(updateProgress);
        }

        // Parar anima√ß√£o e for√ßar 100%
        function completeProgress() {
            if (progressAnimationId) {
                cancelAnimationFrame(progressAnimationId);
                progressAnimationId = null;
            }
            
            verificationProgress.textContent = '100%';
            verificationProgressBar.style.width = '100%';
        }

        // Processar resultados da verifica√ß√£o
        function processVerificationResults(apiResponse, originalNumbers) {
            console.log('üìä Processando resultados da verifica√ß√£o...');
            console.log('üìã Resposta da API:', apiResponse);
            
            verificationResults = [];
            
            // Identificar n√∫meros duplicados primeiro
            const phoneOccurrences = {};
            originalNumbers.forEach(number => {
                if (phoneOccurrences[number]) {
                    phoneOccurrences[number]++;
                } else {
                    phoneOccurrences[number] = 1;
                }
            });
            
            // A API retorna um array de objetos com { exists: boolean, jid: string, number: string }
            if (apiResponse && Array.isArray(apiResponse)) {
                console.log('‚úÖ Processando resposta da API...');
                
                // Criar estrutura de resultados baseada na resposta da API
                originalNumbers.forEach(number => {
                    const contact = contacts.find(c => c.phone.replace(/\D/g, '') === number);
                    
                    // Encontrar o resultado correspondente na resposta da API
                    const apiResult = apiResponse.find(item => {
                        if (item.number) {
                            return item.number.replace(/\D/g, '') === number;
                        }
                        if (item.jid) {
                            return item.jid.split('@')[0].replace(/\D/g, '') === number;
                        }
                        return false;
                    });
                    
                    // Determinar se o n√∫mero √© v√°lido baseado na propriedade 'exists'
                    const isValid = apiResult ? apiResult.exists === true : false;
                    
                    // Determinar se o n√∫mero √© duplicado
                    const isDuplicate = phoneOccurrences[number] > 1;
                    
                    verificationResults.push({
                        number: number,
                        contact: contact,
                        isValid: isValid,
                        isDuplicate: isDuplicate,
                        displayPhone: contact ? contact.phone : number,
                        name: contact ? contact.name : 'Contato n√£o encontrado',
                        apiResult: apiResult // Manter refer√™ncia para debug
                    });
                    
                    console.log(`üì± N√∫mero ${number}: ${isValid ? 'V√ÅLIDO' : 'INV√ÅLIDO'} ${isDuplicate ? 'DUPLICADO' : ''} (exists: ${apiResult ? apiResult.exists : 'n√£o encontrado'})`);
                });
            } else {
                console.error('‚ùå Formato de resposta da API n√£o reconhecido:', apiResponse);
                throw new Error('Formato de resposta da API n√£o reconhecido');
            }
            
            console.log('üìã Resultados processados:', verificationResults);
            
            // Atualizar interface
            renderVerificationResults();
        }

        // Renderizar resultados da verifica√ß√£o
        function renderVerificationResults() {
            // Completar progresso
            completeProgress();
            
            // Mostrar container de resultados
            verificationResultsContainer.style.display = 'block';
            verificationSummary.style.display = 'block';
            verificationDetails.style.display = 'block';
            
            // Calcular estat√≠sticas
            const valid = verificationResults.filter(r => r.isValid);
            const invalid = verificationResults.filter(r => !r.isValid);
            const duplicates = verificationResults.filter(r => r.isDuplicate);
            
            // Atualizar contadores
            validCount.textContent = valid.length;
            invalidCount.textContent = invalid.length;
            duplicateCount.textContent = duplicates.length;
            
            // Renderizar lista baseada na visualiza√ß√£o atual
            renderVerificationList();
            
            console.log(`üìä Resultados: ${valid.length} v√°lidos, ${invalid.length} inv√°lidos, ${duplicates.length} duplicados`);
        }

        // Renderizar lista de verifica√ß√£o baseada no filtro atual
        function renderVerificationList() {
            let filteredResults = verificationResults;
            
            if (currentVerificationView === 'valid') {
                filteredResults = verificationResults.filter(r => r.isValid);
            } else if (currentVerificationView === 'invalid') {
                filteredResults = verificationResults.filter(r => !r.isValid);
            } else if (currentVerificationView === 'duplicate') {
                filteredResults = verificationResults.filter(r => r.isDuplicate);
            }
            
            if (filteredResults.length === 0) {
                verificationList.innerHTML = '<div style="padding: 20px; text-align: center; color: #888;">Nenhum resultado encontrado</div>';
                return;
            }
            
            verificationList.innerHTML = filteredResults.map(result => {
                let statusIcon, statusColor, statusText;
                
                if (currentVerificationView === 'duplicate') {
                    statusIcon = 'üîÑ';
                    statusColor = '#ffc107';
                    statusText = 'Duplicado';
                } else {
                    statusIcon = result.isValid ? '‚úÖ' : '‚ùå';
                    statusColor = result.isValid ? '#25d366' : '#ff4444';
                    statusText = result.isValid ? 'V√°lido' : 'Inv√°lido';
                }
                
                return `
                    <div style="display: flex; align-items: center; padding: 12px 15px; border-bottom: 1px solid rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.05);">
                        <div style="margin-right: 12px; font-size: 1.2rem;">${statusIcon}</div>
                        <div style="flex: 1;">
                            <div style="font-weight: 600; color: #fff; margin-bottom: 2px;">${result.name}</div>
                            <div style="font-size: 0.85rem; color: #888; font-family: monospace;">${result.displayPhone}</div>
                        </div>
                        <div style="color: ${statusColor}; font-size: 0.85rem; font-weight: 600;">${statusText}</div>
                    </div>
                `;
            }).join('');
        }

        // Alternar visualiza√ß√£o dos resultados
        function toggleVerificationView(view) {
            currentVerificationView = view;
            
            // Atualizar bot√µes ativos
            document.getElementById('showValidNumbers').style.fontWeight = view === 'valid' ? '700' : '500';
            document.getElementById('showInvalidNumbers').style.fontWeight = view === 'invalid' ? '700' : '500';
            document.getElementById('showDuplicateNumbers').style.fontWeight = view === 'duplicate' ? '700' : '500';
            
            // Renderizar lista filtrada
            renderVerificationList();
            
            console.log(`üîÑ Visualiza√ß√£o alterada para: ${view}`);
        }



        // Verificar n√∫meros via API do WhatsApp
        async function verifyImportedNumbersViaAPI() {
            console.log('üìä Verificando n√∫meros via API do WhatsApp...');
            
            // Extrair n√∫meros dos contatos
            const validContactNumbers = importContacts.map(contact => contact.telefone);
            
            // Identificar n√∫meros duplicados
            const phoneOccurrences = {};
            validContactNumbers.forEach(number => {
                if (phoneOccurrences[number]) {
                    phoneOccurrences[number]++;
                } else {
                    phoneOccurrences[number] = 1;
                }
            });
            
            // Remover duplicatas mantendo ordem original para verifica√ß√£o
            const numbersToVerify = [...new Set(validContactNumbers)];
            
            console.log('üìã N√∫meros √∫nicos a verificar:', numbersToVerify.length, numbersToVerify);
            
            try {
                // Obter nome da inst√¢ncia selecionada
                const connectionSelect = document.getElementById('connectionSelectImport');
                const selectedInstanceName = connectionSelect.value;
                
                if (!selectedInstanceName) {
                    throw new Error('Nenhuma conex√£o selecionada');
                }
                
                // Fazer requisi√ß√£o para a API real
                const response = await fetch(`https://whatsapi.typebot.pro/chat/whatsappNumbers/${selectedInstanceName}`, {
                    method: 'POST',
                    headers: {
                        'Content-Type': 'application/json',
                        'apikey': 'b4d71f9c38e3ac12a6b08e4b6d53aa90'
                    },
                    body: JSON.stringify({
                        numbers: numbersToVerify
                    })
                });

                if (!response.ok) {
                    const errorText = await response.text();
                    throw new Error(`Erro ao verificar n√∫meros: ${response.status} - ${errorText}`);
                }

                const responseData = await response.json();
                console.log('‚úÖ Resposta da verifica√ß√£o:', responseData);

                // Processar resultados da API
                const apiInvalidNumbers = [];
                const apiValidNumbers = [];
                
                // A API retorna um array de objetos com { exists: boolean, jid: string, number: string }
                if (responseData && Array.isArray(responseData)) {
                    console.log('‚úÖ Processando resposta da API...');
                    
                    // Processar cada n√∫mero √∫nico verificado
                    numbersToVerify.forEach(number => {
                        // Encontrar o resultado correspondente na resposta da API
                        const apiResult = responseData.find(item => {
                            if (item.number) {
                                return item.number.replace(/\D/g, '') === number;
                            }
                            if (item.jid) {
                                return item.jid.split('@')[0].replace(/\D/g, '') === number;
                            }
                            return false;
                        });
                        
                        // Determinar se o n√∫mero √© v√°lido baseado na propriedade 'exists'
                        const isValid = apiResult ? apiResult.exists === true : false;
                        
                        if (isValid) {
                            apiValidNumbers.push(number);
                        } else {
                            // Encontrar o contato correspondente
                            const contact = importContacts.find(c => c.telefone === number);
                            if (contact) {
                                apiInvalidNumbers.push({
                                    line: apiInvalidNumbers.length + 1,
                                    original: contact.telefone,
                                    name: contact.nome,
                                    reason: 'N√∫mero n√£o existe no WhatsApp',
                                    variables: contact.variaveis,
                                    canBeFixed: false
                                });
                            }
                        }
                        
                        console.log(`üì± N√∫mero ${number}: ${isValid ? 'V√ÅLIDO' : 'INV√ÅLIDO'} (exists: ${apiResult ? apiResult.exists : 'n√£o encontrado'})`);
                    });
                } else {
                    console.error('‚ùå Formato de resposta da API n√£o reconhecido:', responseData);
                    throw new Error('Formato de resposta da API n√£o reconhecido');
                }
                
                // Atualizar dados globais
                invalidNumbersData = apiInvalidNumbers;
                
                // Filtrar apenas contatos v√°lidos (v√°lidos no WhatsApp)
                importContacts = importContacts.filter(contact => {
                    const isValidInWhatsApp = apiValidNumbers.includes(contact.telefone);
                    return isValidInWhatsApp;
                });
                
                // Remover duplicatas mantendo apenas a primeira ocorr√™ncia de cada n√∫mero
                const seenNumbers = new Set();
                importContacts = importContacts.filter(contact => {
                    if (seenNumbers.has(contact.telefone)) {
                        return false; // J√° vimos este n√∫mero, remover
                    } else {
                        seenNumbers.add(contact.telefone);
                        return true; // Primeira vez vendo este n√∫mero, manter
                    }
                });
                
                // Mostrar tabela de n√∫meros inv√°lidos (retornados pela API)
                if (apiInvalidNumbers.length > 0) {
                    showInvalidNumbersTable(apiInvalidNumbers);
                }
                
                // Atualizar estat√≠sticas
                updateImportStatistics(apiValidNumbers.length, apiInvalidNumbers.length, phoneOccurrences);
                
                console.log(`üìä Verifica√ß√£o conclu√≠da: ${apiValidNumbers.length} v√°lidos, ${apiInvalidNumbers.length} inv√°lidos`);
                
            } catch (error) {
                console.error('‚ùå Erro ao verificar n√∫meros:', error);
                throw error;
            }
        }

        // Atualizar estat√≠sticas de importa√ß√£o
        function updateImportStatistics(validCount, invalidCount, phoneOccurrences) {
            // Calcular duplicados (n√∫meros que aparecem mais de uma vez)
            const duplicateCount = Object.values(phoneOccurrences).reduce((sum, count) => {
                return sum + (count > 1 ? count - 1 : 0);
            }, 0);
            
            // Mostrar container de verifica√ß√£o com estat√≠sticas
            importVerificationResults.style.display = 'block';
            importVerificationSummary.style.display = 'block';
            
            // Atualizar contadores
            importValidCount.textContent = validCount;
            importInvalidCount.textContent = invalidCount;
            importDuplicateCount.textContent = duplicateCount;
            
            // Completar progresso
            importVerificationProgress.textContent = '100%';
            importVerificationProgressBar.style.width = '100%';
            
            console.log(`üìä Estat√≠sticas finais: ${validCount} v√°lidos, ${invalidCount} inv√°lidos, ${duplicateCount} duplicados`);
        }





        // Salvar apenas n√∫meros v√°lidos da importa√ß√£o
        window.saveValidContacts = async function() {
            if (!importContacts || importContacts.length === 0) {
                showMessage(importModalMessage, '‚ùå N√£o h√° n√∫meros v√°lidos para salvar', 'error');
                return;
            }
            
            // Desabilitar bot√£o durante a salvamento
            const saveBtn = document.getElementById('saveValidContactsBtn');
            setButtonLoading(saveBtn, true);
            
            try {
                console.log('üíæ Salvando contatos v√°lidos:', importContacts.length);
                
                const response = await fetch('https://n8n.typebot.pro/webhook/criar-contatos', {
                    method: 'POST',
                    headers: {
                        'Content-Type': 'application/json',
                    },
                    body: JSON.stringify(importContacts)
                });

                if (!response.ok) {
                    const errorText = await response.text();
                    throw new Error(`Erro ao salvar contatos: ${response.status} - ${errorText}`);
                }

                const responseData = await response.json();
                console.log('‚úÖ Contatos salvos:', responseData);

                // Adicionar os novos contatos localmente
                const newContacts = importContacts.map((contact, index) => ({
                    id: responseData.ids ? responseData.ids[index] : Date.now() + index,
                    name: contact.nome,
                    phone: contact.telefone,
                    added_at: new Date().toISOString().split('T')[0],
                    variables: contact.variaveis || {}
                }));

                contacts = contacts.concat(newContacts);
                resetPagination();
                renderContactsTable();
                
                const invalidCount = invalidNumbersData.length;
                
                // Calcular quantos duplicados foram removidos (baseado nas estat√≠sticas)
                const duplicateCount = parseInt(importDuplicateCount.textContent) || 0;
                
                let message = `‚úÖ ${importContacts.length} contato(s) v√°lido(s) salvos com sucesso!`;
                if (invalidCount > 0) {
                    message += ` (${invalidCount} n√∫meros inv√°lidos filtrados)`;
                }
                if (duplicateCount > 0) {
                    message += ` (${duplicateCount} duplicatas removidas)`;
                }
                
                showMessage(contactsMessage, message, 'success');
                
                // Fechar modal ap√≥s sucesso
                setTimeout(() => {
                    closeImportModal();
                }, 2000);

            } catch (error) {
                console.error('‚ùå Erro ao salvar contatos v√°lidos:', error);
                showMessage(importModalMessage, `‚ùå ${error.message}`, 'error');
            } finally {
                setButtonLoading(saveBtn, false);
            }
        };

        // Validar conex√£o selecionada para verifica√ß√£o
        function onVerifyConnectionSelect() {
            const selectedValue = verifyConnectionSelect.value;
            const selectedOption = verifyConnectionSelect.options[verifyConnectionSelect.selectedIndex];
            const submitButton = verifyNumbersForm.querySelector('button[type="submit"]');
            const connectionStatus = selectedOption && selectedOption.getAttribute('data-connected');
            const isConnected = connectionStatus === '1';
            const isChecking = connectionStatus === 'checking';
            
            // Atualizar cor do select baseado no status da conex√£o selecionada (igual outros dropdowns)
            if (isConnected) {
                verifyConnectionSelect.style.color = '#25d366';
                verifyConnectionSelect.style.backgroundColor = 'rgba(37, 211, 102, 0.08)';
                verifyConnectionSelect.style.borderColor = 'rgba(37, 211, 102, 0.3)';
            } else if (isChecking) {
                verifyConnectionSelect.style.color = '#888';
                verifyConnectionSelect.style.backgroundColor = 'rgba(136, 136, 136, 0.08)';
                verifyConnectionSelect.style.borderColor = 'rgba(136, 136, 136, 0.3)';
            } else if (connectionStatus === '0') {
                verifyConnectionSelect.style.color = '#ff4444';
                verifyConnectionSelect.style.backgroundColor = 'rgba(255, 68, 68, 0.08)';
                verifyConnectionSelect.style.borderColor = 'rgba(255, 68, 68, 0.3)';
            } else {
                // Reset para padr√£o quando seleciona "Selecione..."
                verifyConnectionSelect.style.color = 'white';
                verifyConnectionSelect.style.backgroundColor = 'rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.05)';
                verifyConnectionSelect.style.borderColor = 'rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.2)';
            }
            
            if (selectedValue) {
                if (isConnected) {
                    submitButton.disabled = false;
                    showMessage(verifyNumbersModalMessage, '', ''); // Limpar mensagens
                } else if (isChecking) {
                    submitButton.disabled = true;
                    showMessage(verifyNumbersModalMessage, 'Verificando status da conex√£o...', 'info');
                } else if (!isConnected) {
                    // Resetar sele√ß√£o se conex√£o desconectada
                    verifyConnectionSelect.value = '';
                    submitButton.disabled = true;
                    // Reset cor quando deseleciona
                    verifyConnectionSelect.style.color = 'white';
                    verifyConnectionSelect.style.backgroundColor = 'rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.05)';
                    verifyConnectionSelect.style.borderColor = 'rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.2)';
                    showMessage(verifyNumbersModalMessage, 'Conex√£o desconectada. Conecte o WhatsApp antes de verificar n√∫meros.', 'error');
                } else {
                    submitButton.disabled = true;
                    showMessage(verifyNumbersModalMessage, '', ''); // Limpar mensagens
                }
            } else {
                submitButton.disabled = true;
                showMessage(verifyNumbersModalMessage, '', ''); // Limpar mensagens
            }
        }

        // Fun√ß√£o para mostrar tabela de n√∫meros inv√°lidos
        function showInvalidNumbersTable(invalidNumbers) {
            console.log('üìã Mostrando tabela de n√∫meros inv√°lidos:', invalidNumbers);
            
            // Todos os n√∫meros s√£o inv√°lidos no WhatsApp e n√£o podem ser editados
            const unfixableNumbers = invalidNumbers;
            
            // Armazenar dados para uso posterior
            invalidNumbersData = [...unfixableNumbers];
            
            // Criar tabela HTML
            const container = document.getElementById('invalidNumbersContainer');
            container.innerHTML = `
                <div class="invalid-numbers-table">
                    <div class="invalid-numbers-header">
                        <svg class="status-icon" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="#ff4444">
                            <path d="M12,2A10,10 0 0,1 22,12A10,10 0 0,1 12,22A10,10 0 0,1 2,12A10,10 0 0,1 12,2M12,4A8,8 0 0,0 4,12A8,8 0 0,0 12,20A8,8 0 0,0 20,12A8,8 0 0,0 12,4M11,16.5L6.5,12L7.91,10.59L11,13.67L16.59,8.09L18,9.5L11,16.5Z"/>
                        </svg>
                        <span>${invalidNumbers.length} n√∫mero(s) inv√°lido(s)</span>
                    </div>
                    <table>
                        <thead>
                            <tr>
                                <th>Linha</th>
                                <th>Nome</th>
                                <th>N√∫mero Original</th>
                                <th>Status</th>
                            </tr>
                        </thead>
                        <tbody>
                            ${unfixableNumbers.map(number => `
                                <tr class="whatsapp-invalid-number-row" data-line="${number.line}" onclick="event.stopPropagation();">
                                    <td>${number.line}</td>
                                    <td>${number.name}</td>
                                    <td class="number-original">${number.original}</td>
                                    <td>
                                        <div class="number-status">
                                            <svg class="status-icon" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="#ff4444">
                                                <path d="M12,2A10,10 0 0,1 22,12A10,10 0 0,1 12,22A10,10 0 0,1 2,12A10,10 0 0,1 12,2M12,4A8,8 0 0,0 4,12A8,8 0 0,0 12,20A8,8 0 0,0 20,12A8,8 0 0,0 12,4M11,16.5L6.5,12L7.91,10.59L11,13.67L16.59,8.09L18,9.5L11,16.5Z"/>
                                            </svg>
                                            <span style="color: #ff4444;">${number.reason}</span>
                                        </div>
                                    </td>
                                </tr>
                            `).join('')}
                        </tbody>
                    </table>
                    <div style="margin-top: 15px; text-align: center;">
                        <p style="color: #ff4444; font-size: 0.9rem;">
                            ‚ö†Ô∏è Estes n√∫meros n√£o existem no WhatsApp e n√£o podem ser salvos.
                        </p>
                    </div>
                </div>
            `;
            
            // Mostrar container
            container.style.display = 'block';
            
            // Ajustar tamanho do modal para acomodar a tabela
            const modalContent = document.querySelector('#importModal .modal-content');
            modalContent.classList.add('with-invalid-table');
            
            // Ocultar bot√£o de importar
            importSubmitBtn.style.display = 'none';
            
            showMessage(importModalMessage, `‚ùå ${invalidNumbers.length} n√∫mero(s) inv√°lidos no WhatsApp.`, 'error');
        }







        // Fun√ß√£o para atualizar a tabela de n√∫meros inv√°lidos
        function updateInvalidNumbersTable() {
            if (invalidNumbersData.length === 0) {
                // Se n√£o h√° mais n√∫meros inv√°lidos, ocultar a tabela
                document.getElementById('invalidNumbersContainer').style.display = 'none';
                
                // Remover classe de tamanho do modal
                const modalContent = document.querySelector('#importModal .modal-content');
                modalContent.classList.remove('with-invalid-table');
                
                return;
            }
            
            // Re-renderizar a tabela com os n√∫meros restantes
            showInvalidNumbersTable(invalidNumbersData);
        }



        // Fun√ß√£o para mostrar bot√£o de salvar n√∫meros v√°lidos
        function showSaveValidNumbersButton() {
            // Mostrar bot√£o de salvar n√∫meros v√°lidos (que j√° existe)
            saveValidContactsBtn.style.display = 'block';
            
            showMessage(importModalMessage, '‚úÖ Todos os n√∫meros est√£o v√°lidos! Clique em "Salvar apenas n√∫meros v√°lidos" para continuar.', 'success');
        }

        // Fun√ß√£o de logout
        function logout() {
            console.log('üö™ Iniciando logout...');
            
            // Limpar todos os cookies
            document.cookie = 'userId=; expires=Thu, 01 Jan 1970 00:00:00 UTC; path=/;';
            document.cookie = 'idConexao=; expires=Thu, 01 Jan 1970 00:00:00 UTC; path=/;';
            document.cookie = 'idDisparo=; expires=Thu, 01 Jan 1970 00:00:00 UTC; path=/;';
            
            // Limpar sessionStorage
            sessionStorage.clear();
            
            console.log('üßπ Cookies e sessionStorage limpos');
            console.log('üîÑ Redirecionando para login...');
            
            // Redirecionar para p√°gina de login
            window.location.href = 'https://n8n.typebot.pro/webhook/login';
        }

        // Controle de hover do sidebar
        function initializeSidebarHover() {
            const sidebar = document.querySelector('.sidebar');
            const sidebarLogo = document.querySelector('.sidebar-logo');
            const menuTexts = document.querySelectorAll('.menu-text');
            let hoverTimeout;
            let isExpanded = false;

            // Fun√ß√£o para expandir o sidebar
            function expandSidebar() {
                if (!isExpanded) {
                    sidebar.style.width = '250px';
                    if (sidebarLogo) sidebarLogo.style.opacity = '1';
                    menuTexts.forEach(text => text.style.opacity = '1');
                    isExpanded = true;
                }
            }

            // Fun√ß√£o para recolher o sidebar
            function collapseSidebar() {
                if (isExpanded) {
                    sidebar.style.width = '70px';
                    if (sidebarLogo) sidebarLogo.style.opacity = '0';
                    menuTexts.forEach(text => text.style.opacity = '0');
                    isExpanded = false;
                }
            }

            // Event listeners para mouse
            sidebar.addEventListener('mouseenter', () => {
                clearTimeout(hoverTimeout);
                expandSidebar();
            });

            sidebar.addEventListener('mouseleave', () => {
                hoverTimeout = setTimeout(() => {
                    collapseSidebar();
                }, 300); // Pequeno delay para evitar flickering
            });

            // Event listeners para touch (mobile)
            let touchStartX = 0;
            let touchEndX = 0;

            sidebar.addEventListener('touchstart', (e) => {
                touchStartX = e.changedTouches[0].screenX;
            });

            sidebar.addEventListener('touchend', (e) => {
                touchEndX = e.changedTouches[0].screenX;
                const swipeDistance = touchEndX - touchStartX;
                
                if (swipeDistance > 50 && !isExpanded) {
                    // Swipe para direita - expandir
                    expandSidebar();
                } else if (swipeDistance < -50 && isExpanded) {
                    // Swipe para esquerda - recolher
                    collapseSidebar();
                }
            });
        }

        // Inicializar controle de hover do sidebar quando a p√°gina carregar
        document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', function() {
            initializeSidebarHover();
        });

    </script>
</body>
</html>

<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="pt-BR">
<head>
    <meta charset="UTF-8">
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
    <title>Lista de Grupos - EnviaZap</title>
    <style>
        * { margin: 0; padding: 0; box-sizing: border-box; }
        body {
            background: linear-gradient(135deg, #0a0a0a 0%, #1a1a1a 100%);
            font-family: -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, 'Segoe UI', Roboto, sans-serif;
            color: white;
            min-height: 100vh;
            margin: 0;
            padding: 0;
        }
        .app-layout { display: flex; min-height: 100vh; }
        .sidebar { width: 70px; background: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.3); backdrop-filter: blur(10px); border-right: 1px solid rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.1); transition: all 0.3s ease; position: relative; z-index: 1000; display: flex; flex-direction: column; height: 100vh; }
        .sidebar:hover { width: 250px; }
        .sidebar-header { padding: 20px; text-align: center; border-bottom: 1px solid rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.1); }
        .sidebar-logo { font-size: 1.5rem; font-weight: 600; background: linear-gradient(135deg, #25d366 0%, #128c7e 100%); -webkit-background-clip: text; -webkit-text-fill-color: transparent; background-clip: text; white-space: nowrap; opacity: 0; transition: opacity 0.3s ease; }
        .sidebar:hover .sidebar-logo { opacity: 1; }
        .sidebar-menu { padding: 20px 0; flex: 1; }
        .menu-item { display: flex; align-items: center; padding: 15px 20px; color: #ccc; text-decoration: none; transition: all 0.3s ease; position: relative; white-space: nowrap; }
        .menu-item:hover { background: rgba(37, 211, 102, 0.1); color: #25d366; }
        .menu-item.active { background: rgba(37, 211, 102, 0.2); color: #25d366; border-right: 3px solid #25d366; }
        .menu-icon { font-size: 1.2rem; width: 30px; text-align: center; flex-shrink: 0; }
        .menu-text { margin-left: 15px; opacity: 0; transition: opacity 0.3s ease; }
        .sidebar:hover .menu-text { opacity: 1; }

        .sidebar-footer {
            margin-top: auto;
            border-top: 1px solid rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.1);
            padding: 10px 0;
        }

        .logout-item {
            color: #ff6b6b !important;
        }

        .logout-item:hover {
            background: rgba(255, 107, 107, 0.1) !important;
            color: #ff6b6b !important;
        }
        .main-content-wrapper {
            flex: 1;
            padding: 30px 0 30px 0;
            overflow-x: auto;
        }
        .container {
            width: 100%;
            max-width: 100vw;
            margin: 0;
            padding: 0 30px;
        }
        .header { display: flex; justify-content: space-between; align-items: center; margin-bottom: 40px; }
        .header-info { display: flex; flex-direction: column; gap: 4px; }
        .header-info h1 { font-size: 2.5rem; font-weight: 600; margin-bottom: 10px; color: white; display: flex; align-items: center; gap: 12px; }
        .header-info p { color: #888; font-size: 1.1rem; }
        .header-icon { width: 32px; height: 32px; fill: #25d366; }
        .list-name-display {
            color: white;
            font-size: 2.2rem;
            font-weight: 700;
            background: linear-gradient(135deg, rgba(37,211,102,0.15) 0%, rgba(18,140,126,0.15) 100%);
            border: 1px solid rgba(37,211,102,0.3);
            border-radius: 12px;
            padding: 12px 20px;
            display: inline-block;
            letter-spacing: 0.5px;
            min-width: 200px;
            transition: all 0.3s ease, opacity 0.3s ease, visibility 0.3s ease;
            margin-top: 8px;
        }
        .list-name-display:hover {
            border-color: rgba(37,211,102,0.5);
            background: linear-gradient(135deg, rgba(37,211,102,0.2) 0%, rgba(18,140,126,0.2) 100%);
        }
        .main-content { display: flex; flex-direction: column; gap: 30px; }
        .section { background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.02); border: 1px solid rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.1); border-radius: 16px; padding: 40px; backdrop-filter: blur(10px); box-shadow: 0 20px 60px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.3); }
        .section-header { display: flex; align-items: center; gap: 12px; margin-bottom: 25px; padding-bottom: 15px; border-bottom: 1px solid rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.1); }
        .section-icon { font-size: 1.5rem; }
        .section-icon svg { width: 20px; height: 20px; fill: #25d366; }
        .section-title { font-size: 1.4rem; font-weight: 600; color: #25d366; }
        .section-subtitle { color: #888; font-size: 0.9rem; margin-bottom: 20px; line-height: 1.4; }
        .header-actions { display: flex; gap: 15px; align-items: center; }
        .btn {
            padding: 10px 16px;
            background: linear-gradient(135deg, #25d366 0%, #128c7e 100%);
            border: none;
            border-radius: 10px;
            color: white;
            font-weight: 600;
            cursor: pointer;
            transition: all 0.3s ease;
            display: flex;
            align-items: center;
            gap: 8px;
            font-size: 0.9rem;
            text-decoration: none;
            box-shadow: 0 2px 8px rgba(37, 211, 102, 0.2);
        }
        .btn:hover {
            transform: translateY(-2px);
            box-shadow: 0 6px 20px rgba(37, 211, 102, 0.3);
        }
        .btn-secondary {
            background: linear-gradient(135deg, rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.08) 0%, rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.12) 100%);
            border: 1px solid rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.2);
            box-shadow: 0 2px 8px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1);
        }
        .btn-secondary:hover {
            background: linear-gradient(135deg, rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.12) 0%, rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.16) 100%);
            box-shadow: 0 6px 20px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.2);
        }
        .btn:disabled {
            background: linear-gradient(135deg, #444 0%, #555 100%);
            cursor: not-allowed;
            transform: none;
            box-shadow: none;
        }
        .btn-icon {
            width: 16px;
            height: 16px;
            fill: currentColor;
            flex-shrink: 0;
        }
        .btn.loading .loading-spinner {
            display: block;
        }
        /* Tabela de grupos */
        .groups-table-container { background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.02); border: 1px solid rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.1); border-radius: 16px; overflow: hidden; backdrop-filter: blur(10px); }
        .groups-table { width: 100%; border-collapse: collapse; }
        .groups-table th { background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.05); padding: 15px 20px; text-align: left; font-weight: 600; color: #25d366; font-size: 0.9rem; border-bottom: 1px solid rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.1); }
        .groups-table td { padding: 15px 20px; border-bottom: 1px solid rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.05); font-size: 0.9rem; }
        .groups-table tr:hover { background: rgba(37, 211, 102, 0.05); }
        .groups-table tr:last-child td { border-bottom: none; }
        .group-name { font-weight: 600; color: #fff; }
        .group-participants { color: #25d366; font-family: monospace; }
        .group-date { color: #888; font-size: 0.85rem; }
        .group-actions { display: flex; gap: 8px; }
        .action-btn { background: none; border: none; color: #888; cursor: pointer; padding: 6px; border-radius: 4px; transition: all 0.3s ease; font-size: 0.9rem; }
        .action-btn:hover { background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.1); color: white; }
        .action-btn.delete:hover { color: #ff4444; }
        /* Modal */
        .modal { display: none; position: fixed; top: 0; left: 0; width: 100%; height: 100%; background: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.8); z-index: 1000; backdrop-filter: blur(5px); }
        .modal.show { display: flex; align-items: center; justify-content: center; }
        .modal-content { background: rgba(26, 26, 26, 0.95); border: 1px solid rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.1); border-radius: 16px; padding: 30px; max-width: 500px; width: 90%; backdrop-filter: blur(10px); box-shadow: 0 20px 60px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.5); }
        .modal-header { display: flex; align-items: center; justify-content: space-between; margin-bottom: 20px; }
        .modal-title { font-size: 1.3rem; font-weight: 600; color: #25d366; }
        .modal-close { background: none; border: none; color: #888; font-size: 1.5rem; cursor: pointer; padding: 5px; border-radius: 4px; transition: all 0.3s ease; }
        .modal-close:hover { background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.1); color: white; }
        .modal .form-group { margin-bottom: 22px; }
        .modal .form-group label { color: #fff; font-weight: 500; margin-bottom: 8px; font-size: 0.95rem; display: block; }
        .modal .form-group select { width: 100%; padding: 12px 15px; background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.05); border: 1px solid rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.2); border-radius: 8px; color: white; font-size: 1rem; outline: none; transition: all 0.3s ease; }
        .modal .form-group select:focus { border-color: #25d366; box-shadow: 0 0 0 2px rgba(37, 211, 102, 0.2); }
        .modal .form-group select::placeholder { color: #888; }
        .modal .form-group select option { 
            background: rgba(26, 26, 26, 0.95); 
            color: white; 
            padding: 8px 12px; 
            border: none;
        }
        .modal .form-group select option[data-connected="1"] {
            color: #25d366 !important;
            background: rgba(37, 211, 102, 0.1) !important;
            font-weight: 600;
        }
        .modal .form-group select option[data-connected="0"] {
            color: #ff4444 !important;
            background: rgba(255, 68, 68, 0.1) !important;
            font-weight: 400;
        }
        .modal .form-group select option[data-connected="checking"] {
            color: #888 !important;
            background: rgba(136, 136, 136, 0.1) !important;
            font-weight: 400;
        }
        .modal .message { padding: 15px; border-radius: 8px; margin-bottom: 15px; font-size: 0.9rem; display: none; }
        .modal .message.show { display: block; animation: fadeIn 0.3s ease; }
        .modal .message.success { background: rgba(37, 211, 102, 0.1); border: 1px solid rgba(37, 211, 102, 0.3); color: #25d366; }
        .modal .message.error { background: rgba(255, 68, 68, 0.1); border: 1px solid rgba(255, 68, 68, 0.3); color: #ff4444; }
        .modal .message.info { background: rgba(255, 193, 7, 0.1); border: 1px solid rgba(255, 193, 7, 0.3); color: #ffc107; }
        /* Pesquisa de grupos */
        .groups-search {
            padding: 0;
            border-bottom: none;
            background: none;
        }
        .groups-search input { 
            width: 100%; 
            background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.05); 
            border: 1px solid rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.2); 
            border-radius: 6px; 
            padding: 10px 36px 10px 12px; 
            color: white; 
            font-size: 0.9rem; 
            outline: none; 
            transition: all 0.3s ease; 
            background-image: url("data:image/svg+xml,%3csvg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' viewBox='0 0 24 24' fill='%23888'%3e%3cpath d='M9.5,3A6.5,6.5 0 0,1 16,9.5C16,11.11 15.41,12.59 14.44,13.73L14.71,14H15.5L20.5,19L19,20.5L14,15.5V14.71L13.73,14.44C12.59,15.41 11.11,16 9.5,16A6.5,6.5 0 0,1 3,9.5A6.5,6.5 0 0,1 9.5,3M9.5,5C7,5 5,7 5,9.5C5,12 7,14 9.5,14C12,14 14,12 14,9.5C14,7 12,5 9.5,5Z'/%3e%3c/svg%3e");
            background-repeat: no-repeat;
            background-position: right 12px center;
            background-size: 16px 16px;
        }
        .groups-search input:focus { border-color: #25d366; box-shadow: 0 0 0 2px rgba(37, 211, 102, 0.2); }
        .groups-search input::placeholder { color: #888; }
        .groups-list {
            max-height: 300px;
            overflow-y: auto;
            border-radius: 12px;
            border: 1px solid rgba(255,255,255,0.10);
            margin-bottom: 8px;
            background: none;
        }
        .groups-list-count {
            color: #25d366;
            font-weight: 600;
            font-size: 0.9rem;
        }
        .progress-bar-container {
            width: 100%;
            background: rgba(255,255,255,0.08);
            border-radius: 8px;
            margin-bottom: 12px;
            margin-top: 8px;
            height: 28px;
            display: flex;
            align-items: center;
            position: relative;
        }
        .progress-bar {
            height: 100%;
            border-radius: 8px;
            background: linear-gradient(90deg, #25d366 0%, #128c7e 100%);
            transition: width 0.3s linear;
        }
        .progress-bar-text {
            position: absolute;
            left: 0; right: 0; top: 0; bottom: 0;
            display: flex;
            align-items: center;
            justify-content: center;
            color: #fff;
            font-size: 0.98rem;
            font-weight: 500;
            letter-spacing: 0.5px;
            z-index: 2;
            text-shadow: 0 1px 4px rgba(0,0,0,0.18);
        }
        .group-item { 
            display: flex; 
            align-items: center; 
            padding: 12px 15px; 
            border-bottom: 1px solid rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.05); 
            cursor: pointer; 
            transition: all 0.3s ease; 
            position: relative;
        }
        .group-item:last-child { border-bottom: none; }
        .group-item:hover { background: rgba(37, 211, 102, 0.05); }
        .group-item.selected { background: rgba(37, 211, 102, 0.1); border-left: 3px solid #25d366; }
        .group-item.duplicate {
            background: rgba(255, 193, 7, 0.08);
            border-left: 3px solid #ffc107;
        }
        .group-item.duplicate:hover {
            background: rgba(255, 193, 7, 0.12);
        }
        .group-item.duplicate .group-name {
            color: #ffc107;
        }
        .group-item.duplicate .group-details {
            color: #e0a800;
        }
        .group-checkbox { 
            width: 18px; 
            height: 18px; 
            accent-color: #25d366; 
            margin-right: 12px; 
            flex-shrink: 0; 
            cursor: pointer;
        }
        .group-info { flex: 1; min-width: 0; }
        .group-name { color: #fff; font-weight: 500; font-size: 0.9rem; margin-bottom: 4px; line-height: 1.3; overflow: hidden; text-overflow: ellipsis; white-space: nowrap; }
        .group-details { color: #888; font-size: 0.8rem; display: flex; gap: 15px; }
        .group-type { display: flex; align-items: center; gap: 4px; }
        .group-type.community { color: #25d366; }
        .group-type.announce { color: #ffc107; }
        .duplicate-badge {
            position: absolute;
            top: 8px;
            right: 8px;
            background: #ffc107;
            color: #000;
            font-size: 0.7rem;
            padding: 2px 6px;
            border-radius: 10px;
            font-weight: 600;
        }
        .groups-list-header {
            display: flex;
            justify-content: space-between;
            align-items: center;
            margin-bottom: 10px;
            padding: 0 2px;
        }
        .groups-list-actions {
            display: flex;
            gap: 8px;
        }
        .btn-link {
            background: none;
            border: none;
            color: #25d366;
            font-size: 0.85rem;
            cursor: pointer;
            text-decoration: underline;
            padding: 0;
        }
        .btn-link:hover {
            color: #1da851;
        }
        /* Scrollbar para a lista de grupos */
        .groups-list::-webkit-scrollbar { width: 6px; }
        .groups-list::-webkit-scrollbar-track { background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.05); border-radius: 3px; }
        .groups-list::-webkit-scrollbar-thumb { background: rgba(37, 211, 102, 0.5); border-radius: 3px; }
        .groups-list::-webkit-scrollbar-thumb:hover { background: rgba(37, 211, 102, 0.7); }
        
        /* Pagina√ß√£o */
        #groupsPagination {
            display: flex !important;
            justify-content: center !important;
            align-items: center !important;
            gap: 8px !important;
            margin: 20px auto 0 auto !important;
            flex-wrap: wrap !important;
            width: 100% !important;
            max-width: 100% !important;
            clear: both !important;
            position: relative !important;
            z-index: 1 !important;
            background: transparent !important;
            box-sizing: border-box !important;
            padding: 0 !important;
        }

        #groupsPagination button {
            margin: 0 !important;
            flex-shrink: 0 !important;
            position: relative !important;
            z-index: 1 !important;
            white-space: nowrap !important;
        }

        /* Responsive para pagina√ß√£o */
        @media (max-width: 768px) {
            #groupsPagination {
                gap: 4px !important;
                margin: 15px auto 0 auto !important;
            }
            
            #groupsPagination button {
                padding: 4px 8px !important;
                font-size: 0.75rem !important;
                min-width: 28px !important;
            }
        }
        @keyframes fadeIn { from { opacity: 0; transform: translateY(20px); } to { opacity: 1; transform: translateY(0); } }
        
        /* Loading state */
        .loading-container {
            display: flex;
            flex-direction: column;
            align-items: center;
            justify-content: center;
            min-height: 400px;
            gap: 20px;
        }

        .loading-spinner {
            width: 60px;
            height: 60px;
            border: 4px solid rgba(37, 211, 102, 0.3);
            border-top: 4px solid #25d366;
            border-radius: 50%;
            animation: spin 1s linear infinite;
        }

        .loading-text {
            color: #25d366;
            font-size: 1.2rem;
            font-weight: 500;
        }

        @keyframes spin {
            0% { transform: rotate(0deg); }
            100% { transform: rotate(360deg); }
        }
        
        /* Garantir que a anima√ß√£o funcione desde o carregamento */
        .loading-spinner {
            animation: spin 1s linear infinite !important;
        }
        /* Avisos/Mensagens */
        .message {
            padding: 15px;
            border-radius: 8px;
            margin-bottom: 15px;
            font-size: 0.9rem;
            display: none;
        }
        .message.show {
            display: block;
            animation: fadeIn 0.3s ease;
        }
        .message.success {
            background: rgba(37, 211, 102, 0.1);
            border: 1px solid rgba(37, 211, 102, 0.3);
            color: #25d366;
        }
        .message.error {
            background: rgba(255, 68, 68, 0.1);
            border: 1px solid rgba(255, 68, 68, 0.3);
            color: #ff4444;
        }
        .message.info {
            background: rgba(255, 193, 7, 0.1);
            border: 1px solid rgba(255, 193, 7, 0.3);
            color: #ffc107;
        }
        /* Exportar mensagem */
        #exportMessage {
            display: none;
            position: fixed;
            top: 24px;
            left: 50%;
            transform: translateX(-50%);
            min-width: 320px;
            max-width: 90vw;
            z-index: 2000;
            text-align: center;
            padding: 16px 32px;
            font-size: 1.05rem;
            font-weight: 600;
            background: rgba(255, 193, 7, 0.1);
            color: #ffc107;
            border: 1.5px solid rgba(255,193,7,0.3);
            border-radius: 12px;
            box-shadow: 0 4px 24px rgba(0,0,0,0.10);
            transition: opacity 0.3s, top 0.3s;
            opacity: 0.98;
            animation: fadeIn 0.3s ease;
            pointer-events: none;
        }
    </style>
</head>

                            <svg class="header-icon" viewBox="0 0 24 24">
                                <path d="M12,5.5A3.5,3.5 0 0,1 15.5,9A3.5,3.5 0 0,1 12,12.5A3.5,3.5 0 0,1 8.5,9A3.5,3.5 0 0,1 12,5.5M5,8C5.56,8 6.08,8.15 6.53,8.42C6.38,9.85 6.8,11.27 7.66,12.38C7.16,13.34 6.16,14 5,14A3,3 0 0,1 2,11A3,3 0 0,1 5,8M19,8A3,3 0 0,1 22,11A3,3 0 0,1 19,14C17.84,14 16.84,13.34 16.34,12.38C17.2,11.27 17.62,9.85 17.47,8.42C17.92,8.15 18.44,8 19,8M5.5,18.25C5.5,16.18 8.41,14.5 12,14.5C15.59,14.5 18.5,16.18 18.5,18.25V20H5.5V18.25M0,20V18.5C0,17.11 1.89,15.94 4.45,15.6C3.86,16.28 3.5,17.22 3.5,18.25V20H0M24,20H20.5V18.25C20.5,17.22 20.14,16.28 19.55,15.6C22.11,15.94 24,17.11 24,18.5V20Z"/>

                            </svg>
                            Contar Participantes

                        <button class="btn btn-secondary" id="syncGroupsBtn" onclick="openSyncModal()">
                            <svg class="btn-icon" viewBox="0 0 24 24">

                            Voltar
                        </a>
                    </div>
                </div>
                <!-- Caixinha de conex√£o vinculada logo abaixo do header -->

                <!-- Mensagens na parte superior -->
                <div class="message" id="groupsMessage" style="margin-bottom: 20px;"></div>
                
                <div class="main-content">
                    <!-- Tabela de Grupos -->
                    <div class="section">
                        <div class="section-header" style="display: flex; align-items: center; gap: 12px; justify-content: space-between;">
                            <div style="display: flex; align-items: center; gap: 12px;">

    <!-- Modal de Sincronizar Grupos -->
    <div class="modal" id="syncModal">
        <div class="modal-content">
            <div class="modal-header">
                <h3 class="modal-title">
                    <svg style="width: 20px; height: 20px; fill: #25d366; margin-right: 8px;" viewBox="0 0 24 24">
                        <path d="M12,18A6,6 0 0,1 6,12C6,11 6.25,10.03 6.7,9.2L5.24,7.74C4.46,8.97 4,10.43 4,12A8,8 0 0,0 12,20V23L16,19L12,15M12,4V1L8,5L12,9V6A6,6 0 0,1 18,12C18,13 17.75,13.97 17.3,14.8L18.76,16.26C19.54,15.03 20,13.57 20,12A8,8 0 0,0 12,4Z"/>
                    </svg>
                    Sincronizar Grupos
                </h3>
