            <form id="syncForm">
                <div class="form-group">
                    <label for="connectionSelect">Escolha uma conex√£o *</label>
                    <select id="connectionSelect" name="connectionSelect" required>
                        <option value="">Selecione...</option>
                    </select>
                </div>
                <div class="form-group" id="connectionWarning" style="display:none; color:#888; font-size:0.95rem; margin-top:1px; margin-bottom:28px;">
                    Ap√≥s sincronizar, esta conex√£o n√£o poder√° ser alterada nesta lista.
                </div>
                <div class="form-group">
                    <button type="button" class="btn" id="fetchGroupsBtn" disabled>Puxar grupos</button>
                </div>
                <div class="form-group" id="groupsSearchContainer" style="display:none;">
                    <div class="groups-search">
                        <input type="text" id="groupsSearchInput" placeholder="Pesquisar grupos...">
                    </div>
                    <div class="groups-list-header">
                        <span class="groups-list-count" id="groupsListCount">0 grupos encontrados</span>
                        <div class="groups-list-actions">
                            <button type="button" class="btn-link" onclick="selectAllGroups(true)">Selecionar todos</button>
                            <button type="button" class="btn-link" onclick="selectAllGroups(false)">Desmarcar todos</button>
                        </div>
                    </div>
                    <div class="groups-list" id="groupsList"></div>
                </div>
                <div class="form-group" id="saveGroupsContainer" style="display:none;">
                    <button type="submit" class="btn" id="saveGroupsBtn">Salvar Grupos Selecionados</button>
                </div>
                <div class="message" id="syncModalMessage"></div>
            </form>
        </div>
    </div>
    <!-- Adicionar div de aviso de exporta√ß√£o no topo da tela -->
    <div id="exportMessage"></div>
    <script>
    // Fun√ß√£o para definir cookies
    function setCookie(name, value, days = 30) {
        const expires = new Date();
        expires.setTime(expires.getTime() + (days * 24 * 60 * 60 * 1000));
        document.cookie = `${name}=${value};expires=${expires.toUTCString()};path=/`;
    }

    // Capturar par√¢metros da URL e armazenar em cookies
    (function capturarEArmazenarParametrosURL() {
        const urlParams = new URLSearchParams(window.location.search);
        
        // Capturar userId e idLista da URL
        const userId = urlParams.get('userId');
        const idLista = urlParams.get('idLista');
        
        // Armazenar em cookies se existirem
        if (userId && /^\d+$/.test(userId)) {
            setCookie('userId', userId);
            console.log('‚úÖ UserId armazenado nos cookies:', userId);
        }
        if (idLista && /^\d+$/.test(idLista)) {
            setCookie('idLista', idLista);
            console.log('‚úÖ idLista armazenado nos cookies:', idLista);
        }
        
        // Limpar URL se houver par√¢metros
        if (userId || idLista || urlParams.toString()) {
            const newUrl = window.location.pathname;
            window.history.replaceState({}, '', newUrl);
        }
    })();

    // Elementos do DOM
    const syncModal = document.getElementById('syncModal');
    const closeSyncModal = document.getElementById('closeSyncModal');
    const syncGroupsBtn = document.getElementById('syncGroupsBtn');
    const connectionSelect = document.getElementById('connectionSelect');
    const connectionWarning = document.getElementById('connectionWarning');
    const fetchGroupsBtn = document.getElementById('fetchGroupsBtn');
    const groupsSearchContainer = document.getElementById('groupsSearchContainer');
    const groupsSearchInput = document.getElementById('groupsSearchInput');
    const groupsList = document.getElementById('groupsList');
    const saveGroupsContainer = document.getElementById('saveGroupsContainer');
    const saveGroupsBtn = document.getElementById('saveGroupsBtn');
    const syncModalMessage = document.getElementById('syncModalMessage');
    const syncForm = document.getElementById('syncForm');
    const groupsTableBody = document.getElementById('groupsTableBody');
    const groupsMessage = document.getElementById('groupsMessage');

    // Dados globais
    let connections = [];
    let selectedConnection = null;
    let allGroups = [];
    let filteredGroups = [];
    let selectedGroups = [];
    let gruposSalvos = [];
    let nomeLista = '';
    let nomeConexaoVinculada = '';
    let instanceNameVinculada = '';
    let conexaoVinculadaInfo = null;
    
    // Vari√°veis para pagina√ß√£o
    let currentPage = 1;
    const groupsPerPage = 10;

    // Fun√ß√µes utilit√°rias
    function showMessage(element, message, type = 'info') {
        console.log('üì¢ showMessage chamada:', { element: !!element, message, type });
        if (!element) {
            console.error('‚ùå Elemento n√£o encontrado para showMessage');
            return;
        }
        element.textContent = message;
        element.className = `message ${type} show`;
        if (type === 'success') {
            element.style.background = 'rgba(37, 211, 102, 0.1)';
            element.style.border = '1px solid rgba(37, 211, 102, 0.3)';
            element.style.color = '#25d366';
        } else if (type === 'error') {
            element.style.background = 'rgba(255, 68, 68, 0.1)';
            element.style.border = '1px solid rgba(255, 68, 68, 0.3)';
            element.style.color = '#ff4444';
        } else if (type === 'info') {
            element.style.background = 'rgba(255, 193, 7, 0.1)';
            element.style.border = '1px solid rgba(255, 193, 7, 0.3)';
            element.style.color = '#ffc107';
        } else {
            element.style.background = '';
            element.style.border = '';
            element.style.color = '';
        }
        console.log('‚úÖ Mensagem exibida com sucesso');
        setTimeout(() => {
            element.classList.remove('show');
        }, 5000);
    }
    function setButtonLoading(button, loading) {
        if (!button) return;
        if (loading) {
            button.disabled = true;
            button.innerHTML = 'Carregando... <span class="loading-spinner"></span>';
        } else {
            button.disabled = false;
            button.innerHTML = button.id === 'fetchGroupsBtn' ? 'Puxar grupos' : 'Salvar Grupos Selecionados';
        }
    }
    function formatDate(dateString) {
        const date = new Date(dateString);
        return date.toLocaleDateString('pt-BR');
    }

    // Fun√ß√£o para ler cookies
    function getCookie(name) {
        const value = `; ${document.cookie}`;
        const parts = value.split(`; ${name}=`);
        if (parts.length === 2) return parts.pop().split(';').shift();
        return null;
    }

    // Fun√ß√£o para obter userId de forma segura via cookies
    function getSecureUserId() {
        const userId = getCookie('userId');
        if (userId && /^[0-9a-f]{8}-[0-9a-f]{4}-[0-9a-f]{4}-[0-9a-f]{4}-[0-9a-f]{12}$/i.test(userId)) {
            console.log('‚úÖ UserId (UUID) obtido dos cookies:', userId);
            return userId;
        }
        console.error('‚ùå UserId (UUID) n√£o encontrado ou formato inv√°lido nos cookies!');
        return null;
    }

    // Fun√ß√£o para obter dados da lista dos cookies
    function getListFromCookies() {
        const idLista = getCookie('idLista');
        if (idLista && /^\d+$/.test(idLista)) {
            console.log('‚úÖ idLista obtido dos cookies:', idLista);
            return {
                id: parseInt(idLista),
                name: null // Nome ser√° atualizado ap√≥s requisi√ß√£o da API
            };
        }
        console.error('‚ùå idLista n√£o encontrado nos cookies!');
        return null;
    }

    // Autentica√ß√£o obrigat√≥ria ao carregar a p√°gina
    function checkAuth() {
        const userId = getSecureUserId();
        if (!userId) {
            console.error('‚ùå Usu√°rio n√£o autenticado, redirecionando para login');
            window.location.href = 'https://n8n.typebot.pro/webhook/login';
            return false;
        }
        console.log('‚úÖ Usu√°rio autenticado:', userId);
        return true;
    }

    // Fun√ß√£o para redirecionar para outras p√°ginas (sem par√¢metros)
    function navigateToPage(url) {
        window.location.href = url;
    }



    // Buscar nome da lista especificamente
    async function buscarNomeLista() {
        const currentList = getListFromCookies();
        if (!currentList) return;
        const idLista = currentList.id;
        
        // Ocultar o nome da lista enquanto busca
        const listNameDisplay = document.getElementById('listNameHighlight');
        if (listNameDisplay) {
            listNameDisplay.style.opacity = '0';
            listNameDisplay.style.visibility = 'hidden';
        }
        
        try {
            const response = await fetch('https://n8n.typebot.pro/webhook/puxar-variaveis', {
                method: 'POST',
                headers: { 'Content-Type': 'application/json' },
                body: JSON.stringify({ idLista })
            });
            
            if (!response.ok) {
                console.warn('Falha ao puxar nome da lista:', response.status);
                // Em caso de erro, mostrar fallback
                nomeLista = `Lista ${idLista}`;
                renderHeaderInfo();
                return;
            }
            
            const responseData = await response.json();
            console.log('Resposta puxar-variaveis para nome da lista:', responseData);
            
            let nomeEncontrado = false;
            
            // Extrair nome da lista da resposta
            if (responseData && responseData.data && Array.isArray(responseData.data) && responseData.data.length > 0) {
                const listData = responseData.data[0];
                if (listData.nome) {
                    nomeLista = listData.nome;
                    nomeEncontrado = true;
                    console.log('Nome da lista extra√≠do:', listData.nome);
                }
            } else if (responseData && Array.isArray(responseData)) {
                // Formato alternativo: array de objetos com propriedade 'data'
                for (const item of responseData) {
                    if (item.data && Array.isArray(item.data) && item.data.length > 0) {
                        const listData = item.data[0];
                        if (listData.nome) {
                            nomeLista = listData.nome;
                            nomeEncontrado = true;
                            console.log('Nome da lista extra√≠do:', listData.nome);
                            break;
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
            
            // Se n√£o encontrou nome na API, usar fallback
            if (!nomeEncontrado) {
                nomeLista = `Lista ${idLista}`;
                console.log('Nome da lista n√£o encontrado na API, usando fallback:', nomeLista);
            }
            
            // Atualizar nome na tela e mostrar
            renderHeaderInfo();
            
        } catch (e) {
            console.warn('Falha ao buscar nome da lista:', e);
            // Em caso de erro, mostrar fallback
            nomeLista = `Lista ${idLista}`;
            renderHeaderInfo();
        }
    }

    // Ao carregar a p√°gina, requisitar puxar-listagrupo antes de carregar grupos sincronizados
    async function puxarListaGrupoAntes() {
        const currentList = getListFromCookies();
        if (!currentList) return;
        const idLista = currentList.id;
        try {
            const resp = await fetch('https://n8n.typebot.pro/webhook/puxar-listagrupo', {
                method: 'POST',
                headers: { 'Content-Type': 'application/json' },
                body: JSON.stringify({ idLista })
            });
            if (!resp.ok) {
                const text = await resp.text();
                console.warn('Falha ao puxar listagrupo:', resp.status, text);
                conexaoVinculadaInfo = null;
            } else {
                const data = await resp.json();
                console.log('Resposta puxar-listagrupo:', data);
                // Se vier instanceName/NomeConexao, j√° tem conex√£o vinculada
                if (data && (data.instanceName || data.NomeConexao)) {
                    conexaoVinculadaInfo = data;
                } else {
                    conexaoVinculadaInfo = null;
                }
            }
        } catch (e) {
            console.warn('Falha ao puxar listagrupo:', e);
            conexaoVinculadaInfo = null;
        }
        renderConexaoVinculadaBox();
    }

    // Carregar grupos sincronizados ao abrir a p√°gina
    async function loadGruposSincronizados() {
        const currentList = getListFromCookies();
        if (!currentList) {
            showMessage(groupsMessage, '‚ùå ID da lista n√£o encontrado nos cookies', 'error');
            return;
        }
        const idLista = currentList.id;
        
        try {
            // O loading j√° est√° sendo exibido desde o carregamento da p√°gina
            // N√£o precisa alterar o HTML aqui
            const response = await fetch('https://n8n.typebot.pro/webhook/puxar-lista-grupos', {
                method: 'POST',
                headers: { 'Content-Type': 'application/json' },
                body: JSON.stringify({ idLista })
            });
            if (!response.ok) throw new Error('Erro ao buscar grupos sincronizados');
            const data = await response.json();
            console.log('[API] Resposta puxar-lista-grupos:', data);
            let grupos = [];
            if (data && data.data && Array.isArray(data.data)) grupos = data.data;
            else if (Array.isArray(data)) grupos = data;
            gruposSalvos = grupos.map(g => ({
                id: g.id,
                name: g.name || g.nome || g.subject,
                participants: (g.participantes !== undefined ? g.participantes : (g.size || 0)),
                added_at: g.added_at || g.data_adicao || g.createdAt || g.created_at || new Date().toISOString(),
                WhatsAppId: g.WhatsAppId || g.whatsappid || g.whatsappId || '',
                idConexao: g.idConexao || g.id_conexao || ''
            }));
            console.log('[API] Grupos processados para tabela:', gruposSalvos);
            // Pega nome da lista, conex√£o vinculada e instanceName se vier na resposta (mas n√£o sobrescreve se j√° temos nome da API espec√≠fica)
            if (!nomeLista || nomeLista.startsWith('Lista ')) {
                nomeLista = (data && data.nomeLista) || (data && data.data && data.data[0] && data.data[0].nomeLista) || nomeLista;
            }
            nomeConexaoVinculada = (data && data.nomeConexao) || (data && data.data && data.data[0] && data.data[0].nomeConexao) || '';
            instanceNameVinculada = (data && data.instanceName) || (data && data.data && data.data[0] && data.data[0].instanceName) || '';
            renderHeaderInfo();
            resetPagination();
            renderGroupsTable();
            if (gruposSalvos.length) {
                showMessage(groupsMessage, `‚úÖ ${gruposSalvos.length} grupo(s) sincronizado(s) carregado(s)!`, 'success');
            } else {
                showMessage(groupsMessage, 'Nenhum grupo sincronizado encontrado.', 'info');
            }
        } catch (e) {
            renderHeaderInfo();
            renderGroupsTable();
            if (e.message && e.message.includes('Erro ao buscar grupos sincronizados')) {
                showMessage(groupsMessage, 'Nenhum grupo sincronizado encontrado.', 'info');
            } else {
                showMessage(groupsMessage, e.message, 'error');
            }
        }
    }

    // Renderizar informa√ß√µes do topo (nome da lista, total, conex√£o)
    function renderHeaderInfo() {
        const listNameDisplay = document.getElementById('listNameHighlight');
        if (listNameDisplay) {
            const currentList = getListFromCookies();
            const displayName = nomeLista || (currentList ? `Lista ${currentList.id}` : 'Lista de Grupos');
            listNameDisplay.textContent = displayName;
            // Mostrar o elemento quando renderizar (ap√≥s obter nome da API)
            listNameDisplay.style.opacity = '1';
            listNameDisplay.style.visibility = 'visible';
            listNameDisplay.style.transition = 'opacity 0.3s ease, visibility 0.3s ease';
            console.log('Nome exibido no header:', displayName);
        }
        const totalGruposDiv = document.getElementById('totalGrupos');
        if (totalGruposDiv) {
            totalGruposDiv.textContent = `Total de grupos: ${gruposSalvos.length}`;
        }
            
            const paginationInfoDiv = document.getElementById('paginationInfo');
            if (paginationInfoDiv) {
                if (gruposSalvos.length > 0) {
                    const startIdx = (currentPage - 1) * groupsPerPage;
                    const endIdx = Math.min(startIdx + groupsPerPage, gruposSalvos.length);
                    paginationInfoDiv.textContent = `Exibindo ${startIdx + 1}-${endIdx} de ${gruposSalvos.length}`;
                } else {
                    paginationInfoDiv.textContent = '';
                }
            }
    }

    // Modal
    function openSyncModal() {
        syncModal.classList.add('show');
        syncModalMessage.textContent = '';
        groupsSearchContainer.style.display = 'none';
        saveGroupsContainer.style.display = 'none';
        groupsList.innerHTML = '';
        selectedConnection = null;
        allGroups = [];
        filteredGroups = [];
        selectedGroups = [];
        // Se j√° tem conex√£o vinculada, mostra info fixa, sen√£o mostra select
        if (conexaoVinculadaInfo && (conexaoVinculadaInfo.instanceName || conexaoVinculadaInfo.NomeConexao)) {
            // Esconde select e label
            connectionSelect.style.display = 'none';
            connectionWarning.style.display = 'none';
            var label = connectionSelect.parentElement.querySelector('label');
            if (label) label.style.display = 'none';
            // Monta info da conex√£o vinculada
            let nome = conexaoVinculadaInfo.NomeConexao || conexaoVinculadaInfo.instanceName;
            let instance = conexaoVinculadaInfo.instanceName;
            // Checar status de conex√£o
            let statusSpan = document.createElement('span');
            statusSpan.textContent = 'Verificando...';
            statusSpan.style.marginLeft = '10px';
            statusSpan.style.fontWeight = 'bold';
            statusSpan.style.fontSize = '1rem';
            statusSpan.id = 'statusConexaoVinculada';
            // Adiciona info no lugar do select
            let infoDiv = document.getElementById('conexaoVinculadaInfo');
            if (!infoDiv) {
                infoDiv = document.createElement('div');
                infoDiv.id = 'conexaoVinculadaInfo';
                infoDiv.style.marginBottom = '18px';
                infoDiv.style.fontSize = '1.05rem';
                connectionSelect.parentElement.insertAdjacentElement('beforebegin', infoDiv);
            }
            infoDiv.innerHTML = `<b>Conex√£o vinculada:</b> <span style='color:#25d366;'>${nome}</span>`;
            infoDiv.appendChild(statusSpan);
            // Checa status
            if (instance) {
                fetch(`https://whatsapi.typebot.pro/instance/connectionState/${instance}`, {
                    method: 'GET',
                    headers: { 'apikey': 'b4d71f9c38e3ac12a6b08e4b6d53aa90' }
                }).then(r => r.json()).then(statusData => {
                    const state = statusData?.instance?.state || statusData?.state || statusData?.status || statusData?.connectionState;
                    if (state === 'open' || state === 'connected') {
                            statusSpan.innerHTML = '<svg width="12" height="12" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="currentColor" style="margin-right:4px;"><circle cx="12" cy="12" r="10" fill="#25d366"/></svg> Conectada';
                        statusSpan.style.color = '#25d366';
                        fetchGroupsBtn.disabled = false;
                        // Seleciona a conex√£o vinculada como selectedConnection
                        selectedConnection = {
                            instanceName: conexaoVinculadaInfo.instanceName,
                            idConexao: conexaoVinculadaInfo.idConexao || conexaoVinculadaInfo.id_conexao || conexaoVinculadaInfo.id,
                            NomeConexao: conexaoVinculadaInfo.NomeConexao || conexaoVinculadaInfo.instanceName,
                            isConnected: true
                        };
                    } else {
                            statusSpan.innerHTML = '<svg width="12" height="12" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="currentColor" style="margin-right:4px;"><circle cx="12" cy="12" r="10" fill="#ff4444"/></svg> Desconectada';
                        statusSpan.style.color = '#ff4444';
                        fetchGroupsBtn.disabled = true;
                        selectedConnection = null;
                        showMessage(syncModalMessage, 'A conex√£o vinculada est√° desconectada. Conecte o WhatsApp antes de puxar grupos.', 'error');
                    }
                }).catch(() => {
                    statusSpan.textContent = 'üî¥ Desconhecido';
                    statusSpan.style.color = '#ff4444';
                    fetchGroupsBtn.disabled = true;
                    selectedConnection = null;
                    showMessage(syncModalMessage, 'N√£o foi poss√≠vel verificar o status da conex√£o vinculada.', 'error');
                });
            } else {
                    statusSpan.innerHTML = '<svg width="12" height="12" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="currentColor" style="margin-right:4px;"><circle cx="12" cy="12" r="10" fill="#ff4444"/></svg> Desconhecido';
                statusSpan.style.color = '#ff4444';
                fetchGroupsBtn.disabled = true;
                selectedConnection = null;
                showMessage(syncModalMessage, 'N√£o foi poss√≠vel identificar a conex√£o vinculada.', 'error');
            }
        } else {
            // Mostra loading no lugar do select e depois carrega as conex√µes
            showConnectionsLoading();
            fetchGroupsBtn.disabled = true;
            loadConnections();
        }
    }
    function closeSyncModalFn() {
        syncModal.classList.remove('show');
        syncForm.reset();
    }
    syncGroupsBtn.addEventListener('click', openSyncModal);
    closeSyncModal.addEventListener('click', closeSyncModalFn);
    syncModal.addEventListener('click', (e) => { if (e.target === syncModal) closeSyncModalFn(); });

    // Mostrar loading das conex√µes
    function showConnectionsLoading() {
        // Esconder select e label
        connectionSelect.style.display = 'none';
        connectionWarning.style.display = 'none';
        var label = connectionSelect.parentElement.querySelector('label');
        if (label) label.style.display = 'none';
        
        // Remover info div se existir
        let infoDiv = document.getElementById('conexaoVinculadaInfo');
        if (infoDiv) infoDiv.remove();
        
        // Criar div de loading
        let loadingDiv = document.getElementById('connectionsLoading');
        if (!loadingDiv) {
            loadingDiv = document.createElement('div');
            loadingDiv.id = 'connectionsLoading';
            loadingDiv.style.marginBottom = '18px';
            loadingDiv.style.fontSize = '1.05rem';
            loadingDiv.style.display = 'flex';
            loadingDiv.style.alignItems = 'center';
            loadingDiv.style.gap = '12px';
            loadingDiv.style.padding = '15px';
            loadingDiv.style.background = 'rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.05)';
            loadingDiv.style.border = '1px solid rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.1)';
            loadingDiv.style.borderRadius = '8px';
            connectionSelect.parentElement.insertAdjacentElement('beforebegin', loadingDiv);
        }
        
        loadingDiv.innerHTML = `
            <div style="
                width: 20px; 
                height: 20px; 
                border: 2px solid rgba(37, 211, 102, 0.3); 
                border-top: 2px solid #25d366; 
                border-radius: 50%; 
                animation: spin 1s linear infinite;
            "></div>
            <span style="color: #888;">Carregando conex√µes...</span>
        `;
        
        // Adicionar CSS da anima√ß√£o se n√£o existir
        if (!document.getElementById('loadingSpinCSS')) {
            const style = document.createElement('style');
            style.id = 'loadingSpinCSS';
            style.textContent = `
                @keyframes spin {
                    0% { transform: rotate(0deg); }
                    100% { transform: rotate(360deg); }
                }
            `;
            document.head.appendChild(style);
        }
    }
    
    // Esconder loading das conex√µes e mostrar select
    function hideConnectionsLoading() {
        const loadingDiv = document.getElementById('connectionsLoading');
        if (loadingDiv) loadingDiv.remove();
        
        // Mostrar select e label
        connectionSelect.style.display = '';
        var label = connectionSelect.parentElement.querySelector('label');
        if (label) label.style.display = '';
    }

    // Carregar conex√µes
    async function loadConnections() {
        try {
            const userId = getSecureUserId();
            if (!userId) throw new Error('ID do usu√°rio n√£o encontrado');
            const response = await fetch('https://n8n.typebot.pro/webhook/listarconexoes', {
                method: 'POST',
                headers: { 'Content-Type': 'application/json' },
                body: JSON.stringify({ userId: userId })
            });
            if (!response.ok) throw new Error('Erro ao buscar conex√µes');
            const data = await response.json();
            let rawConnections = [];
            if (data && data.Conexoes && Array.isArray(data.Conexoes)) rawConnections = data.Conexoes;
            else if (Array.isArray(data) && data.length > 0 && data[0].Conexoes && Array.isArray(data[0].Conexoes)) rawConnections = data[0].Conexoes;
            else if (Array.isArray(data)) rawConnections = data;
            
            // Filtrar conex√µes v√°lidas
            connections = rawConnections.filter(conn => (conn.instanceName || conn.instance_name) && (conn.NomeConexao || conn.nomeConexao || conn.name));
            
            if (connections.length === 0) {
                hideConnectionsLoading();
                connectionSelect.innerHTML = '<option value="">Nenhuma conex√£o encontrada</option>';
                showMessage(syncModalMessage, 'Nenhuma conex√£o encontrada.', 'info');
                return;
            }
            
            // Mostrar dropdown com conex√µes (sem status ainda)
            hideConnectionsLoading();
            connectionSelect.innerHTML = '<option value="">Selecione...</option>' +
                connections.map(conn => {
                    const nome = conn.NomeConexao || conn.nomeConexao || conn.name;
                    const instance = conn.instanceName || conn.instance_name;
                    return `<option value="${instance}" data-connected="checking" style="color: #888; background-color: rgba(136, 136, 136, 0.1);">üîÑ ${nome} (verificando...)</option>`;
                }).join('');
            
            // Verificar status de cada conex√£o em paralelo e atualizar dinamicamente
            let checkedConnections = 0;
            connections.forEach(async (conn, index) => {
                try {
                    const instanceName = conn.instanceName || conn.instance_name;
                    if (!instanceName) { 
                        conn.isConnected = false; 
                        updateConnectionOption(index, conn, false);
                        checkedConnections++;
                        if (checkedConnections === connections.length) {
                            showConnectionsStatusComplete();
                        }
                        return; 
                    }
                    
                    const statusResp = await fetch(`https://whatsapi.typebot.pro/instance/connectionState/${instanceName}`, {
                        method: 'GET',
                        headers: { 'apikey': 'b4d71f9c38e3ac12a6b08e4b6d53aa90' }
                    });
                    
                    if (!statusResp.ok) { 
                        conn.isConnected = false; 
                        updateConnectionOption(index, conn, false);
                        checkedConnections++;
                        if (checkedConnections === connections.length) {
                            showConnectionsStatusComplete();
                        }
                        return; 
                    }
                    
                    const statusData = await statusResp.json();
                    const state = statusData?.instance?.state || statusData?.state || statusData?.status || statusData?.connectionState;
                    const isConnected = (state === 'open' || state === 'connected');
                    conn.isConnected = isConnected;
                    updateConnectionOption(index, conn, isConnected);
                    checkedConnections++;
                    if (checkedConnections === connections.length) {
                        showConnectionsStatusComplete();
                    }
                } catch { 
                    conn.isConnected = false; 
                    updateConnectionOption(index, conn, false);
                    checkedConnections++;
                    if (checkedConnections === connections.length) {
                        showConnectionsStatusComplete();
                    }
                }
            });
            
        } catch (e) {
            hideConnectionsLoading();
            connectionSelect.innerHTML = '<option value="">Erro ao carregar conex√µes</option>';
            showMessage(syncModalMessage, e.message, 'error');
        }
    }
    
    // Atualizar op√ß√£o de conex√£o no dropdown
    function updateConnectionOption(index, conn, isConnected) {
        const nome = conn.NomeConexao || conn.nomeConexao || conn.name;
        const instance = conn.instanceName || conn.instance_name;
        const status = isConnected ? '‚úÖ ' : '‚ùå ';
        const statusText = isConnected ? 'Conectada' : 'Desconectada';
        const textColor = isConnected ? '#25d366' : '#ff4444';
        const backgroundColor = isConnected ? 'rgba(37, 211, 102, 0.1)' : 'rgba(255, 68, 68, 0.1)';
        
        // Encontrar a op√ß√£o correta no select (index + 1 porque a primeira √© "Selecione...")
        const option = connectionSelect.options[index + 1];
        if (option) {
            option.innerHTML = `${status}${nome} (${statusText})`;
            option.style.color = textColor;
            option.style.backgroundColor = backgroundColor;
            option.style.fontWeight = isConnected ? '600' : '400';
            option.setAttribute('data-connected', isConnected ? '1' : '0');
        }
        
        // Se esta conex√£o est√° atualmente selecionada, atualizar os controles
        if (selectedConnection && (selectedConnection.instanceName === instance || selectedConnection.instance_name === instance)) {
            if (isConnected) {
                connectionWarning.style.display = 'block';
                fetchGroupsBtn.disabled = false;
                // Atualizar cor do select para conectado
                connectionSelect.style.color = '#25d366';
                connectionSelect.style.backgroundColor = 'rgba(37, 211, 102, 0.08)';
                connectionSelect.style.borderColor = 'rgba(37, 211, 102, 0.3)';
                showMessage(syncModalMessage, '', ''); // Limpar mensagens
            } else {
                connectionWarning.style.display = 'none';
                fetchGroupsBtn.disabled = true;
                // Atualizar cor do select para desconectado
                connectionSelect.style.color = '#ff4444';
                connectionSelect.style.backgroundColor = 'rgba(255, 68, 68, 0.08)';
                connectionSelect.style.borderColor = 'rgba(255, 68, 68, 0.3)';
                showMessage(syncModalMessage, 'Conex√£o desconectada. Conecte o WhatsApp antes de sincronizar grupos.', 'error');
            }
        }
    }
    
    // Mostrar resumo quando todas as conex√µes forem verificadas
    function showConnectionsStatusComplete() {
        const connectedCount = connections.filter(conn => conn.isConnected).length;
        const totalCount = connections.length;
        
        if (connectedCount === 0) {
            showMessage(syncModalMessage, `Nenhuma das ${totalCount} conex√£o(√µes) est√° conectada. Conecte pelo menos uma no WhatsApp.`, 'error');
        } else if (connectedCount === totalCount) {
            showMessage(syncModalMessage, `‚úÖ Todas as ${totalCount} conex√£o(√µes) est√£o conectadas!`, 'success');
        } else {
            showMessage(syncModalMessage, `${connectedCount} de ${totalCount} conex√£o(√µes) conectada(s). Escolha uma conectada para sincronizar.`, 'info');
        }
    }

    // Ao selecionar conex√£o
    connectionSelect.addEventListener('change', function() {
        const val = connectionSelect.value;
        const selectedOption = connectionSelect.options[connectionSelect.selectedIndex];
        const connectionStatus = selectedOption && selectedOption.getAttribute('data-connected');
        const isConnected = connectionStatus === '1';
        const isChecking = connectionStatus === 'checking';
        
        // Atualizar cor do select baseado no status da conex√£o selecionada
        if (isConnected) {
            connectionSelect.style.color = '#25d366';
            connectionSelect.style.backgroundColor = 'rgba(37, 211, 102, 0.08)';
            connectionSelect.style.borderColor = 'rgba(37, 211, 102, 0.3)';
        } else if (isChecking) {
            connectionSelect.style.color = '#888';
            connectionSelect.style.backgroundColor = 'rgba(136, 136, 136, 0.08)';
            connectionSelect.style.borderColor = 'rgba(136, 136, 136, 0.3)';
        } else if (connectionStatus === '0') {
            connectionSelect.style.color = '#ff4444';
            connectionSelect.style.backgroundColor = 'rgba(255, 68, 68, 0.08)';
            connectionSelect.style.borderColor = 'rgba(255, 68, 68, 0.3)';
        } else {
            // Reset para padr√£o quando seleciona "Selecione..."
            connectionSelect.style.color = 'white';
            connectionSelect.style.backgroundColor = 'rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.05)';
            connectionSelect.style.borderColor = 'rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.2)';
        }
        
        selectedConnection = connections.find(conn => (conn.instanceName || conn.instance_name) === val) || null;
        
        if (selectedConnection && isConnected) {
            connectionWarning.style.display = 'block';
            fetchGroupsBtn.disabled = false;
            showMessage(syncModalMessage, '', ''); // Limpar mensagens
        } else if (selectedConnection && isChecking) {
            connectionWarning.style.display = 'none';
            fetchGroupsBtn.disabled = true;
            showMessage(syncModalMessage, 'Verificando status da conex√£o...', 'info');
        } else if (selectedConnection && !isConnected) {
            connectionSelect.value = '';
            selectedConnection = null;
            connectionWarning.style.display = 'none';
            fetchGroupsBtn.disabled = true;
            showMessage(syncModalMessage, 'Conex√£o desconectada. Conecte o WhatsApp antes de sincronizar grupos.', 'error');
            // Reset cor quando deseleciona
            connectionSelect.style.color = 'white';
            connectionSelect.style.backgroundColor = 'rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.05)';
            connectionSelect.style.borderColor = 'rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.2)';
        } else {
            connectionWarning.style.display = 'none';
            fetchGroupsBtn.disabled = true;
            showMessage(syncModalMessage, '', ''); // Limpar mensagens
        }
        
        groupsSearchContainer.style.display = 'none';
        saveGroupsContainer.style.display = 'none';
        groupsList.innerHTML = '';
        allGroups = [];
        filteredGroups = [];
        selectedGroups = [];
        
        // Resetar contador
        const countDiv = document.getElementById('groupsListCount');
        if (countDiv) {
            countDiv.textContent = '0 grupos encontrados';
            countDiv.style.color = '#25d366';
        }
        
        // Limpar campo de pesquisa
        groupsSearchInput.value = '';
    });

    // Puxar grupos
    fetchGroupsBtn.addEventListener('click', async function(e) {
        e.preventDefault();
        if (!selectedConnection) return;
        setButtonLoading(fetchGroupsBtn, true);
        groupsSearchContainer.style.display = 'none';
        saveGroupsContainer.style.display = 'none';
        groupsList.innerHTML = '';
        showMessage(syncModalMessage, '', '');
        // Barra de progresso
        let progressDiv = document.getElementById('progressBarContainer');
        if (!progressDiv) {
            progressDiv = document.createElement('div');
            progressDiv.id = 'progressBarContainer';
            progressDiv.className = 'progress-bar-container';
            progressDiv.innerHTML = `
                <div class="progress-bar" id="progressBar" style="width:0%"></div>
                <div class="progress-bar-text" id="progressBarText">Puxando grupos... 0%</div>
            `;
            fetchGroupsBtn.parentElement.insertAdjacentElement('afterend', progressDiv);
        } else {
            progressDiv.style.display = 'flex';
        }
        let percent = 0;
        const progressBar = document.getElementById('progressBar');
        const progressBarText = document.getElementById('progressBarText');
        let elapsed = 0;
        const interval = setInterval(() => {
            if (percent < 100) {
                percent += 100/60;
                if (percent > 100) percent = 100;
                progressBar.style.width = percent + '%';
                progressBarText.textContent = `Puxando grupos... ${Math.floor(percent)}%`;
            } else {
                // N√£o cancela, s√≥ mant√©m a barra cheia
                progressBar.style.width = '100%';
                progressBarText.textContent = 'Puxando grupos... 100%';
            }
            elapsed++;
        }, 1000);
        try {
            const response = await fetch('https://n8n.typebot.pro/webhook/listar-grupos', {
                method: 'POST',
                headers: { 'Content-Type': 'application/json' },
                body: JSON.stringify({ instanceName: selectedConnection.instanceName || selectedConnection.instance_name })
            });
            clearInterval(interval);
            progressBar.style.width = '100%';
            progressBarText.textContent = 'Puxando grupos... 100%';
            setTimeout(() => { if(progressDiv) progressDiv.style.display = 'none'; }, 600);
            if (!response.ok) throw new Error('Erro ao puxar grupos');
            const data = await response.json();
            let groupsData = [];
            if (Array.isArray(data) && data.length > 0 && data[0].data && Array.isArray(data[0].data)) groupsData = data[0].data;
            else if (data && data.data && Array.isArray(data.data)) groupsData = data.data;
            else if (Array.isArray(data)) groupsData = data;
            // Marcar como selecionados os grupos j√° salvos
            const whatsIdsSalvos = new Set(gruposSalvos.map(g => String(g.WhatsAppId || g.WhatsappId || g.whatsappid || g.whatsappId || '')));
            allGroups = groupsData.map(g => {
                const idStr = String(g.id);
                return {
                    id: g.id,
                    name: g.subject,
                    participants: g.size || 0,
                    added_at: g.createdAt || new Date().toISOString(),
                    selected: !whatsIdsSalvos.has(idStr), // Selecionar apenas grupos novos por padr√£o
                    WhatsappId: g.WhatsappId || g.whatsappid || g.whatsappId || '',
                    idConexao: g.idConexao || g.id_conexao || ''
                };
            });
            filteredGroups = [...allGroups];
            renderGroupsList();
            groupsSearchContainer.style.display = 'block';
            showMessage(syncModalMessage, `‚úÖ ${allGroups.length} grupos carregados!`, 'success');
        } catch (e) {
            clearInterval(interval);
            if(progressDiv) progressDiv.style.display = 'none';
            showMessage(syncModalMessage, e.message, 'error');
            allGroups = [];
            filteredGroups = [];
            renderGroupsList();
        } finally {
            setButtonLoading(fetchGroupsBtn, false);
        }
    });

    // Busca por nome
    groupsSearchInput.addEventListener('input', function() {
        const term = groupsSearchInput.value.toLowerCase().trim();
        filteredGroups = allGroups.filter(g => g.name.toLowerCase().includes(term));
        renderGroupsList();
    });

    // Renderizar lista de grupos no popup (com detec√ß√£o de duplicatas)
    function renderGroupsList() {
        groupsList.innerHTML = '';
        if (filteredGroups.length === 0) {
            groupsList.innerHTML = `<div style="color:#888;text-align:center;padding:30px 0;">Nenhum grupo encontrado.</div>`;
            const countDiv = document.getElementById('groupsListCount');
            if (countDiv) {
                countDiv.textContent = '0 grupos encontrados';
                countDiv.style.color = '#25d366';
            }
            if (saveGroupsContainer) {
                saveGroupsContainer.style.display = 'none';
            }
            return;
        }

        // Obter IDs dos grupos j√° existentes na lista
        const existingGroupIds = new Set(gruposSalvos.map(g => String(g.WhatsAppId || g.WhatsappId || g.whatsappid || g.whatsappId || '')));

        // Verificar duplicatas e marcar grupos
        filteredGroups.forEach(group => {
            const groupIdStr = String(group.id);
            group.isDuplicate = existingGroupIds.has(groupIdStr);
        });

        filteredGroups.forEach(group => {
            const duplicateClass = group.isDuplicate ? 'duplicate' : '';
            const duplicateBadge = group.isDuplicate ? '<span class="duplicate-badge">J√Å EXISTE</span>' : '';
            
            const groupDiv = document.createElement('div');
            groupDiv.className = `group-item ${duplicateClass}`;
            groupDiv.innerHTML = `
                <input type="checkbox" class="group-checkbox" ${group.selected ? 'checked' : ''} onchange="toggleGroupSelection('${group.id}')">
                <div class="group-info">
                    <div class="group-name">${group.name}</div>
                    <div class="group-details">
                        <span>${group.participants} participantes</span>
                    </div>
                </div>
                ${duplicateBadge}
            `;
            groupsList.appendChild(groupDiv);
        });
        updateSelectedGroupsCounter();
    }

    // Selecionar grupo
    function toggleGroupSelection(groupId) {
        const group = allGroups.find(g => g.id === groupId);
        if (group) {
            group.selected = !group.selected;
            renderGroupsList(); // re-renderiza para atualizar o checkbox e contador
        }
    }
    // Torna global para funcionar no onchange do checkbox
    window.toggleGroupSelection = toggleGroupSelection;

    // Selecionar/desmarcar todos os grupos
    function selectAllGroups(selectAll) {
        allGroups.forEach(group => {
            group.selected = selectAll;
        });
        renderGroupsList();
    }
    // Torna global para funcionar no onclick
    window.selectAllGroups = selectAllGroups;

    // Salvar grupos selecionados
    saveGroupsBtn.addEventListener('click', async function(e) {
        e.preventDefault();
        if (!selectedConnection) return;
        
        const selectedGroups = allGroups.filter(g => g.selected);
        
        if (selectedGroups.length === 0) {
            showMessage(syncModalMessage, 'Selecione pelo menos um grupo para salvar.', 'info');
            return;
        }

        // Filtrar apenas grupos novos (n√£o duplicados)
        const newGroupsOnly = selectedGroups.filter(g => !g.isDuplicate);
        
        if (newGroupsOnly.length === 0) {
            showMessage(syncModalMessage, `Todos os ${selectedGroups.length} grupo(s) selecionado(s) j√° existem na lista.`, 'info');
            setButtonLoading(saveGroupsBtn, false);
            return;
        }

        // Se alguns grupos foram filtrados, mostrar aviso
        if (newGroupsOnly.length < selectedGroups.length) {
            const filteredCount = selectedGroups.length - newGroupsOnly.length;
            showMessage(syncModalMessage, `${filteredCount} grupo(s) j√° existem na lista e foram ignorados. Salvando ${newGroupsOnly.length} grupo(s) novo(s)...`, 'info');
        }

        // Preparar grupos para salvar
        const groupsToSave = newGroupsOnly.map(g => ({ 
            nome: g.name, 
            id: g.id, 
            WhatsappId: g.WhatsappId, 
            idConexao: g.idConexao 
        }));
        
        setButtonLoading(saveGroupsBtn, true);
        try {
            // Obter userId dos cookies
            const userId = getSecureUserId();
            if (!userId) {
                showMessage(syncModalMessage, '‚ùå N√£o foi poss√≠vel identificar o usu√°rio (userId).', 'error');
                setButtonLoading(saveGroupsBtn, false);
                return;
            }
            // Obter idLista dos cookies
            const currentList = getListFromCookies();
            if (!currentList) {
                showMessage(syncModalMessage, '‚ùå N√£o foi poss√≠vel identificar a lista (idLista).', 'error');
                setButtonLoading(saveGroupsBtn, false);
                return;
            }
            const idLista = currentList.id;
            // Enviar idConexao ao inv√©s de instanceName
            const idConexao = selectedConnection.idConexao || selectedConnection.id || selectedConnection.id_conexao;
            const instanceName = selectedConnection.instanceName || selectedConnection.instance_name;
            const body = {
                userId,
                idLista, // sempre enviar idLista
                idConexao,
                grupos: groupsToSave
            };
            const response = await fetch('https://n8n.typebot.pro/webhook/salvar-grupos', {
                method: 'POST',
                headers: { 'Content-Type': 'application/json' },
                body: JSON.stringify(body)
            });
            if (!response.ok) throw new Error('Erro ao salvar grupos');
            const respData = await response.json().catch(() => null);
            console.log('[API] Resposta salvar-grupos:', respData);
            // Vincular conex√£o √† lista
            await fetch('https://n8n.typebot.pro/webhook/vincular-conexao', {
                method: 'POST',
                headers: { 'Content-Type': 'application/json' },
                body: JSON.stringify({ idLista, idConexao })
            });
            
            const successMessage = newGroupsOnly.length < selectedGroups.length 
                ? `‚úÖ ${newGroupsOnly.length} grupo(s) novo(s) salvos com sucesso! (${selectedGroups.length - newGroupsOnly.length} grupo(s) j√° existiam na lista)`
                : `‚úÖ ${newGroupsOnly.length} grupo(s) salvos com sucesso!`;
            
            showMessage(syncModalMessage, successMessage, 'success');
            // Fechar popup
            closeSyncModalFn();
            // Aviso de contagem
            showMessage(groupsMessage, '‚è≥ Contando participantes dos grupos salvos... Isso pode levar alguns minutos. ‚ö†Ô∏è Observa√ß√£o: Alguns grupos podem n√£o trazer todos os participantes.', 'info');
            // Para cada grupo salvo, faz POST para contar-participantes (n√£o espera resposta)
            groupsToSave.forEach(g => {
                const whatsappId = g.WhatsappId || g.WhatsAppId || g.whatsappid || g.whatsappId || '';
                const idConexao = g.idConexao || g.id_conexao || g.id || '';
                if (whatsappId && idConexao) {
                    fetch('https://n8n.typebot.pro/webhook/contar-participantes', {
                        method: 'POST',
                        headers: { 'Content-Type': 'application/json' },
                        body: JSON.stringify({ WhatsAppId: whatsappId, idConexao: idConexao })
                    });
                }
            });
            // Atualiza lista de grupos sincronizados
            loadGruposSincronizados();
        } catch (e) {
            showMessage(syncModalMessage, e.message, 'error');
        } finally {
            setButtonLoading(saveGroupsBtn, false);
        }
    });

    // Pagina√ß√£o de grupos
    function renderPagination() {
        const totalPages = Math.ceil(gruposSalvos.length / groupsPerPage);
        const paginationContainerId = 'groupsPagination';
        let paginationContainer = document.getElementById(paginationContainerId);
        if (!paginationContainer) {
            paginationContainer = document.createElement('div');
            paginationContainer.id = paginationContainerId;
            paginationContainer.style.display = 'flex';
            paginationContainer.style.justifyContent = 'center';
            paginationContainer.style.gap = '8px';
            paginationContainer.style.margin = '20px auto 0 auto';
            paginationContainer.style.flexWrap = 'wrap';
            paginationContainer.style.width = '100%';
            paginationContainer.style.maxWidth = '100%';
            paginationContainer.style.clear = 'both';
            paginationContainer.style.position = 'relative';
            paginationContainer.style.zIndex = '1';
            paginationContainer.style.boxSizing = 'border-box';
            
            // Inserir ap√≥s a tabela, n√£o dentro dela
            if (!document.getElementById(paginationContainerId)) {
                const tableSection = document.querySelector('.groups-table-container').closest('.section');
                if (tableSection) {
                    tableSection.appendChild(paginationContainer);
                }
            }
        }
        paginationContainer.innerHTML = '';
        if (totalPages <= 1) {
            paginationContainer.style.display = 'none';
            return;
        } else {
            paginationContainer.style.display = 'flex';
        }

        // L√≥gica de pagina√ß√£o inteligente (m√°ximo 10 p√°ginas vis√≠veis)
        const maxVisiblePages = 10;
        let startPage = Math.max(1, currentPage - Math.floor(maxVisiblePages / 2));
        let endPage = Math.min(totalPages, startPage + maxVisiblePages - 1);
        
        // Ajustar se n√£o tiver p√°ginas suficientes no in√≠cio
        if (endPage - startPage + 1 < maxVisiblePages) {
            startPage = Math.max(1, endPage - maxVisiblePages + 1);
        }

        // Bot√£o "Primeira p√°gina" (se n√£o estiver no in√≠cio)
        if (startPage > 1) {
            const firstBtn = document.createElement('button');
            firstBtn.textContent = '¬´ Primeira';
            firstBtn.className = 'btn btn-secondary';
            firstBtn.style.padding = '6px 12px';
            firstBtn.style.fontSize = '0.85rem';
            firstBtn.onclick = () => {
                currentPage = 1;
                renderGroupsTable();
            };
            paginationContainer.appendChild(firstBtn);
        }

        // Bot√£o "Anterior"
        if (currentPage > 1) {
            const prevBtn = document.createElement('button');
            prevBtn.textContent = '‚Äπ Anterior';
            prevBtn.className = 'btn btn-secondary';
            prevBtn.style.padding = '6px 12px';
            prevBtn.style.fontSize = '0.85rem';
            prevBtn.onclick = () => {
                currentPage = Math.max(1, currentPage - 1);
                renderGroupsTable();
            };
            paginationContainer.appendChild(prevBtn);
        }

        // P√°ginas numeradas
        for (let i = startPage; i <= endPage; i++) {
            const btn = document.createElement('button');
            btn.textContent = i;
            btn.className = 'btn btn-secondary';
            btn.style.minWidth = '36px';
            btn.style.padding = '6px 12px';
            btn.style.fontWeight = i === currentPage ? '700' : '500';
            btn.style.background = i === currentPage ? 'linear-gradient(135deg, #25d366 0%, #128c7e 100%)' : '';
            btn.style.color = i === currentPage ? 'white' : '';
            btn.disabled = i === currentPage;
            btn.onclick = () => {
                currentPage = i;
                renderGroupsTable();
            };
            paginationContainer.appendChild(btn);
        }

        // Bot√£o "Pr√≥xima"
        if (currentPage < totalPages) {
            const nextBtn = document.createElement('button');
            nextBtn.textContent = 'Pr√≥xima ‚Ä∫';
            nextBtn.className = 'btn btn-secondary';
            nextBtn.style.padding = '6px 12px';
            nextBtn.style.fontSize = '0.85rem';
            nextBtn.onclick = () => {
                currentPage = Math.min(totalPages, currentPage + 1);
                renderGroupsTable();
            };
            paginationContainer.appendChild(nextBtn);
        }

        // Bot√£o "√öltima p√°gina" (se n√£o estiver no final)
        if (endPage < totalPages) {
            const lastBtn = document.createElement('button');
            lastBtn.textContent = '√öltima ¬ª';
            lastBtn.className = 'btn btn-secondary';
            lastBtn.style.padding = '6px 12px';
            lastBtn.style.fontSize = '0.85rem';
            lastBtn.onclick = () => {
                currentPage = totalPages;
                renderGroupsTable();
            };
            paginationContainer.appendChild(lastBtn);
        }
    }

    // Sempre que sincronizar grupos, resetar para p√°gina 1
    function resetPagination() {
        currentPage = 1;
    }

    // Renderizar tabela de grupos salvos (apenas quando dados j√° foram carregados)
    function renderGroupsTable() {
        // Se n√£o h√° grupos, mostrar mensagem de "nenhum grupo"
        if (!gruposSalvos.length) {
            groupsTableBody.innerHTML = `
                <tr>
                    <td colspan="4" style="text-align: center; color: #888; padding: 40px 20px;">
                        <div style="font-size: 3rem; margin-bottom: 15px;">
                            <svg style="width: 48px; height: 48px; fill: #888;" viewBox="0 0 24 24">
                                <path d="M12,5.5A3.5,3.5 0 0,1 15.5,9A3.5,3.5 0 0,1 12,12.5A3.5,3.5 0 0,1 8.5,9A3.5,3.5 0 0,1 12,5.5M5,8C5.56,8 6.08,8.15 6.53,8.42C6.38,9.85 6.8,11.27 7.66,12.38C7.16,13.34 6.16,14 5,14A3,3 0 0,1 2,11A3,3 0 0,1 5,8M19,8A3,3 0 0,1 22,11A3,3 0 0,1 19,14C17.84,14 16.84,13.34 16.34,12.38C17.2,11.27 17.62,9.85 17.47,8.42C17.92,8.15 18.44,8 19,8M5.5,18.25C5.5,16.18 8.41,14.5 12,14.5C15.59,14.5 18.5,16.18 18.5,18.25V20H5.5V18.25M0,20V18.5C0,17.11 1.89,15.94 4.45,15.6C3.86,16.28 3.5,17.22 3.5,18.25V20H0M24,20H20.5V18.25C20.5,17.22 20.14,16.28 19.55,15.6C22.11,15.94 24,17.11 24,18.5V20Z"/>
                            </svg>
                        </div>
                        <p>Nenhum grupo sincronizado.</p>
                        <p style="font-size: 0.85rem;">Sincronize seus grupos usando o bot√£o "Sincronizar Grupos" acima.</p>
                    </td>
                </tr>
            `;
            renderHeaderInfo();
            renderPagination();
            return;
        }
        
        // Pagina√ß√£o
        const startIdx = (currentPage - 1) * groupsPerPage;
        const endIdx = startIdx + groupsPerPage;
        const pageGroups = gruposSalvos.slice(startIdx, endIdx);
        
        groupsTableBody.innerHTML = pageGroups.map(g => `
            <tr>
                <td class="group-name">${g.name}</td>
                <td class="group-participants">${g.participants}</td>
                <td class="group-date">${formatDate(g.added_at)}</td>
                <td class="group-actions">
                    <button class="action-btn delete" onclick="deleteGroup('${g.id}')" title="Excluir">
                        <svg width="14" height="14" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="currentColor">
                            <path d="M19,4H15.5L14.5,3H9.5L8.5,4H5V6H19M6,19A2,2 0 0,0 8,21H16A2,2 0 0,0 18,19V7H6V19Z"/>
                        </svg>
                    </button>
                    <button class="action-btn export" onclick="exportarParticipantes('${g.idConexao}','${g.WhatsAppId || g.WhatsappId || g.whatsappid || g.whatsappId}')" title="Exportar participantes" style="margin-left:4px;">
                        <svg width="14" height="14" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="currentColor">
                            <path d="M5,20H19V18H5M19,9H15V3H9V9H5L12,16L19,9Z"/>
                        </svg>
                    </button>
                </td>
            </tr>
        `).join('');
        
        renderHeaderInfo();
        renderPagination();
    }

    // Excluir grupo
    window.deleteGroup = async function(id) {
        if (confirm('Tem certeza que deseja excluir este grupo da lista?')) {
            const exportMsg = document.getElementById('exportMessage');
            try {
                const resp = await fetch('https://n8n.typebot.pro/webhook/excluir-grupo', {
                    method: 'POST',
                    headers: { 'Content-Type': 'application/json' },
                    body: JSON.stringify({ idGrupo: id })
                });
                if (!resp.ok) {
                    showMessage(groupsMessage, 'Erro ao excluir grupo.', 'error');
                    return;
                }
                
                // Remover o grupo da lista local sem fazer nova busca
                const grupoIndex = gruposSalvos.findIndex(g => g.id == id);
                if (grupoIndex !== -1) {
                    gruposSalvos.splice(grupoIndex, 1);
                    
                    // Verificar se precisa ajustar a p√°gina atual
                    const totalPages = Math.ceil(gruposSalvos.length / groupsPerPage);
                    if (currentPage > totalPages && totalPages > 0) {
                        currentPage = totalPages;
                    }
                    
                    // Atualizar a interface
                    renderGroupsTable();
                    showMessage(groupsMessage, '‚úÖ Grupo exclu√≠do com sucesso!', 'success');
                }
                
                if (exportMsg) {
                    exportMsg.textContent = 'Grupo removido.';
                    exportMsg.style.background = 'rgba(255, 193, 7, 0.1)';
                    exportMsg.style.color = '#ffc107';
                    exportMsg.style.border = '1.5px solid rgba(255,193,7,0.3)';
                    exportMsg.style.boxShadow = '0 4px 24px rgba(0,0,0,0.10)';
                    exportMsg.style.borderRadius = '12px';
                    exportMsg.style.padding = '16px 32px';
                    exportMsg.style.fontWeight = '600';
                    exportMsg.style.fontSize = '1.05rem';
                    exportMsg.style.top = '24px';
                    exportMsg.style.left = '50%';
                    exportMsg.style.transform = 'translateX(-50%)';
                    exportMsg.style.minWidth = '320px';
                    exportMsg.style.maxWidth = '90vw';
                    exportMsg.style.textAlign = 'center';
                    exportMsg.style.opacity = '0.98';
                    exportMsg.style.pointerEvents = 'none';
                    exportMsg.style.display = 'block';
                    setTimeout(() => { exportMsg.style.display = 'none'; }, 4000);
                }
            } catch (e) {
                showMessage(groupsMessage, 'Erro ao excluir grupo: ' + e.message, 'error');
            }
        }
    };

    // Fun√ß√£o para atualizar o contador de grupos selecionados no popup
    function updateSelectedGroupsCounter() {
        const countDiv = document.getElementById('groupsListCount');
        if (!countDiv) return;

        const selectedCount = allGroups.filter(g => g.selected).length;
        const totalCount = allGroups.length;
        const newGroupsCount = allGroups.filter(g => g.selected && !g.isDuplicate).length;
        const duplicateSelectedCount = allGroups.filter(g => g.selected && g.isDuplicate).length;
        
        let countText = `${selectedCount} de ${totalCount} grupos selecionados`;
        
        if (duplicateSelectedCount > 0) {
            countText += ` (${newGroupsCount} novos, ${duplicateSelectedCount} j√° existem)`;
        }
        
        countDiv.textContent = countText;
        
        // Exibe ou esconde o bot√£o de salvar grupos baseado na sele√ß√£o de grupos novos
        if (saveGroupsContainer) {
            saveGroupsContainer.style.display = newGroupsCount > 0 ? 'block' : 'none';
        }
        
        // Alterar cor do contador se apenas grupos existentes estiverem selecionados
        if (countDiv) {
            if (selectedCount > 0 && newGroupsCount === 0) {
                countDiv.style.color = '#ffc107';
            } else {
                countDiv.style.color = '#25d366';
            }
        }
    }

    // Inicializa√ß√£o da tabela e carregamento autom√°tico
    document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', async function() {
        console.log('üöÄ Iniciando carregamento da p√°gina de Lista de Grupos...');
        
        if (!checkAuth()) {
            return; // checkAuth j√° redireciona se necess√°rio
        }
        
        // Inicializar com nome oculto - ser√° mostrado ap√≥s buscarNomeLista()
        const listNameDisplay = document.getElementById('listNameHighlight');
        if (listNameDisplay) {
            listNameDisplay.style.opacity = '0';
            listNameDisplay.style.visibility = 'hidden';
            listNameDisplay.textContent = 'Carregando...';
        }
        
        try {
            await buscarNomeLista();
            await puxarListaGrupoAntes();
            loadGruposSincronizados();
            
            const refreshBtn = document.getElementById('refreshGroupsBtn');
            if (refreshBtn) refreshBtn.addEventListener('click', async () => {
                setButtonLoading(refreshBtn, true);
                resetPagination();
                await loadGruposSincronizados();
                setButtonLoading(refreshBtn, false);
            });
            
            const countBtn = document.getElementById('countParticipantsBtn');
            if (countBtn) {
                console.log('‚úÖ Anexando evento ao bot√£o contar participantes');
                countBtn.addEventListener('click', contarParticipantesTodosGrupos);
            } else {
                console.error('‚ùå Bot√£o contarParticipantsBtn n√£o encontrado');
            }
            
            console.log('‚úÖ P√°gina de Lista de Grupos carregada com sucesso');
        } catch (error) {
            console.error('‚ùå Erro durante inicializa√ß√£o:', error);
        }
    });

    // No JS, ap√≥s carregar a p√°gina e puxar-listagrupo, renderizar a caixinha se houver conex√£o vinculada
    function renderConexaoVinculadaBox() {
        const box = document.getElementById('conexaoVinculadaBox');
        if (!box) return;
        if (conexaoVinculadaInfo && (conexaoVinculadaInfo.instanceName || conexaoVinculadaInfo.NomeConexao)) {
            const nome = conexaoVinculadaInfo.NomeConexao || conexaoVinculadaInfo.instanceName;
            const tel = conexaoVinculadaInfo.Telefone || conexaoVinculadaInfo.telefone || '';
            const instance = conexaoVinculadaInfo.instanceName || conexaoVinculadaInfo.NomeConexao;
            const foto = conexaoVinculadaInfo.FotoPerfil || '';
            box.style.display = 'flex';
            box.style.alignItems = 'center';
            box.style.gap = '16px';
            box.style.background = 'rgba(255,255,255,0.03)';
            box.style.border = '1px solid rgba(255,255,255,0.10)';
            box.style.borderRadius = '12px';
            box.style.padding = '14px 22px';
            box.style.marginBottom = '18px';
            // Badge de status
            let badge = '<span id="badgeStatusConexao" style="margin-left:10px; font-weight:600; font-size:0.98rem; padding:2px 12px; border-radius:12px; background:#444; color:#fff;">Verificando...</span>';
            let fotoHtml = foto ? `<img src="${foto}" alt="Foto perfil" style="width:44px;height:44px;border-radius:50%;object-fit:cover;border:2px solid #25d366;">` : '';
            box.innerHTML = `${fotoHtml}<div><b>Conex√£o vinculada:</b> <span style='color:#25d366;'>${nome}</span>${tel ? `<span style='color:#888; font-size:0.98rem; margin-left:10px;'>${tel}</span>` : ''} ${badge}</div>`;
            // Checa status
            if (instance) {
                fetch(`https://whatsapi.typebot.pro/instance/connectionState/${encodeURIComponent(instance)}`, {
                    method: 'GET',
                    headers: { 'apikey': 'b4d71f9c38e3ac12a6b08e4b6d53aa90' }
                }).then(r => r.json()).then(statusData => {
                    const state = statusData?.instance?.state || statusData?.state || statusData?.status || statusData?.connectionState;
                    const badgeEl = document.getElementById('badgeStatusConexao');
                    if (badgeEl) {
                        if (state === 'open' || state === 'connected') {
                            badgeEl.innerHTML = '<svg width="12" height="12" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="currentColor" style="margin-right:4px;"><circle cx="12" cy="12" r="10" fill="#25d366"/></svg> Conectada';
                            badgeEl.style.background = 'rgba(37,211,102,0.15)';
                            badgeEl.style.color = '#25d366';
                        } else {
                            badgeEl.innerHTML = '<svg width="12" height="12" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="currentColor" style="margin-right:4px;"><circle cx="12" cy="12" r="10" fill="#ff4444"/></svg> Desconectada';
                            badgeEl.style.background = 'rgba(255,68,68,0.15)';
                            badgeEl.style.color = '#ff4444';
                        }
                    }
                }).catch(() => {
                    const badgeEl = document.getElementById('badgeStatusConexao');
                    if (badgeEl) {
                        badgeEl.innerHTML = '<svg width="12" height="12" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="currentColor" style="margin-right:4px;"><circle cx="12" cy="12" r="10" fill="#ff4444"/></svg> Desconhecido';
                        badgeEl.style.background = 'rgba(255,68,68,0.15)';
                        badgeEl.style.color = '#ff4444';
                    }
                });
            }
        } else {
            box.style.display = 'none';
            box.innerHTML = '';
        }
    }

    // Fun√ß√£o para exportar participantes
    window.exportarParticipantes = async function(idConexao, WhatsAppId) {
        const exportMsg = document.getElementById('exportMessage');
        if (!idConexao || !WhatsAppId) {
            alert('idConexao ou WhatsAppId n√£o encontrado para exporta√ß√£o.');
            return;
        }
        // Buscar nome do grupo
        const grupo = gruposSalvos.find(g => g.idConexao == idConexao && (g.WhatsAppId === WhatsAppId || g.WhatsappId === WhatsAppId));
        const nomeGrupo = grupo ? grupo.name : 'grupo';
        // Data do dia
        const hoje = new Date();
        const dia = String(hoje.getDate()).padStart(2, '0');
        const mes = String(hoje.getMonth() + 1).padStart(2, '0');
        const ano = hoje.getFullYear();
        const dataStr = `${dia}/${mes}/${ano}`;
        try {
            if (exportMsg) {
                exportMsg.textContent = 'Exportando participantes...';
                exportMsg.style.background = 'rgba(255, 193, 7, 0.1)';
                exportMsg.style.color = '#ffc107';
                exportMsg.style.border = '1.5px solid rgba(255,193,7,0.3)';
                exportMsg.style.boxShadow = '0 4px 24px rgba(0,0,0,0.10)';
                exportMsg.style.borderRadius = '12px';
                exportMsg.style.padding = '16px 32px';
                exportMsg.style.fontWeight = '600';
                exportMsg.style.fontSize = '1.05rem';
                exportMsg.style.top = '24px';
                exportMsg.style.left = '50%';
                exportMsg.style.transform = 'translateX(-50%)';
                exportMsg.style.minWidth = '320px';
                exportMsg.style.maxWidth = '90vw';
                exportMsg.style.textAlign = 'center';
                exportMsg.style.opacity = '0.98';
                exportMsg.style.pointerEvents = 'none';
                exportMsg.style.display = 'block';
            }
            const resp = await fetch('https://n8n.typebot.pro/webhook/exportar-participantes', {
                method: 'POST',
                headers: { 'Content-Type': 'application/json' },
                body: JSON.stringify({ idConexao, WhatsAppId })
            });
            if (!resp.ok) throw new Error('Erro ao exportar participantes');
            const data = await resp.json();
            if (!data.participants || !Array.isArray(data.participants)) throw new Error('Resposta inesperada da API');
            // Montar CSV
            let csv = 'telefone,name\n';
            data.participants.forEach(p => {
                const telefone = (p.id || '').replace(/@s\.whatsapp\.net$/, '');
                const name = `${nomeGrupo} - ${dataStr}`;
                csv += `${telefone},${name}\n`;
            });
            // Baixar CSV
            const blob = new Blob([csv], { type: 'text/csv' });
            const url = window.URL.createObjectURL(blob);
            const a = document.createElement('a');
            // Nome do arquivo: nome do grupo + data
            const nomeArquivo = `${nomeGrupo.replace(/[^a-zA-Z0-9-_]/g, '_')}-${dia}-${mes}-${ano}.csv`;
            a.href = url;
            a.download = nomeArquivo;
            document.body.appendChild(a);
            a.click();
            document.body.removeChild(a);
            window.URL.revokeObjectURL(url);
            if (exportMsg) exportMsg.style.display = 'none';
        } catch (e) {
            if (exportMsg) {
                exportMsg.textContent = 'Erro ao exportar participantes: ' + e.message;
                exportMsg.style.background = 'rgba(255, 193, 7, 0.1)';
                exportMsg.style.color = '#ffc107';
                exportMsg.style.border = '1.5px solid rgba(255,193,7,0.3)';
                exportMsg.style.boxShadow = '0 4px 24px rgba(0,0,0,0.10)';
                exportMsg.style.borderRadius = '12px';
                exportMsg.style.padding = '16px 32px';
                exportMsg.style.fontWeight = '600';
                exportMsg.style.fontSize = '1.05rem';
                exportMsg.style.top = '24px';
                exportMsg.style.left = '50%';
                exportMsg.style.transform = 'translateX(-50%)';
                exportMsg.style.minWidth = '320px';
                exportMsg.style.maxWidth = '90vw';
                exportMsg.style.textAlign = 'center';
                exportMsg.style.opacity = '0.98';
                exportMsg.style.pointerEvents = 'none';
                exportMsg.style.display = 'block';
                setTimeout(() => { exportMsg.style.display = 'none'; }, 5000);
            }
            else alert('Erro ao exportar participantes: ' + e.message);
        }
    }

    // Bot√£o voltar: redireciona para listas
    function goBack() {
        navigateToPage('https://n8n.typebot.pro/webhook/listas');
    }

    // Fun√ß√£o de logout
    function logout() {
        console.log('üö™ Iniciando logout...');
        
        // Limpar todos os cookies
        document.cookie = 'userId=; expires=Thu, 01 Jan 1970 00:00:00 UTC; path=/;';
        document.cookie = 'idLista=; expires=Thu, 01 Jan 1970 00:00:00 UTC; path=/;';
        document.cookie = 'idConexao=; expires=Thu, 01 Jan 1970 00:00:00 UTC; path=/;';
        document.cookie = 'idDisparo=; expires=Thu, 01 Jan 1970 00:00:00 UTC; path=/;';
        
        // Limpar sessionStorage
        sessionStorage.clear();
        
        console.log('üßπ Cookies e sessionStorage limpos');
        console.log('üîÑ Redirecionando para login...');
        
        // Redirecionar para p√°gina de login
        window.location.href = 'https://n8n.typebot.pro/webhook/login';
    }
    </script>
</body>
</html>

        /* Pagina√ß√£o */
        .table-pagination {

            justify-content: space-between;

    <script>

        // Fun√ß√µes para gerenciar cookies
        function setCookie(name, value, days = 7) {
            const expires = new Date();
            expires.setTime(expires.getTime() + (days * 24 * 60 * 60 * 1000));
            document.cookie = `${name}=${value};expires=${expires.toUTCString()};path=/;SameSite=Strict`;
        }

        function getCookie(name) {
            const nameEQ = name + "=";
            const ca = document.cookie.split(';');
            for(let i = 0; i < ca.length; i++) {
                let c = ca[i];
                while (c.charAt(0) === ' ') c = c.substring(1, c.length);
                if (c.indexOf(nameEQ) === 0) return c.substring(nameEQ.length, c.length);
            }
            return null;
        }

        function getSecureUserId() {
            const userId = getCookie('userId');
            if (userId && /^[0-9a-f]{8}-[0-9a-f]{4}-[0-9a-f]{4}-[0-9a-f]{4}-[0-9a-f]{12}$/i.test(userId)) {
                return userId;
            }
            return null;
        }

        function checkAuth() {
            const userId = getSecureUserId();
            if (!userId) {
                window.location.href = 'https://n8n.typebot.pro/webhook/login';
            }
        }

            window.location.href = url;

            document.cookie = 'userId=; expires=Thu, 01 Jan 1970 00:00:00 UTC; path=/;';
            document.cookie = 'idLista=; expires=Thu, 01 Jan 1970 00:00:00 UTC; path=/;';
            document.cookie = 'idConexao=; expires=Thu, 01 Jan 1970 00:00:00 UTC; path=/;';
            document.cookie = 'idDisparo=; expires=Thu, 01 Jan 1970 00:00:00 UTC; path=/;';
            sessionStorage.clear();
            window.location.href = 'https://n8n.typebot.pro/webhook/login';
        }

        // Atualizar a√ß√µes din√¢micas baseadas no status
        function atualizarAcoesDinamicas(status) {
            const dynamicActions = document.getElementById('dynamicActions');
            dynamicActions.innerHTML = '';

            if (status === 'Aguardando' || status === 'Em andamento') {
                dynamicActions.innerHTML += '<div class="dropdown-item warning" onclick="pausarDisparo()">Pausar disparo</div>';
            }

            if (status === 'Pausado') {
                dynamicActions.innerHTML += '<div class="dropdown-item success" onclick="retomarDisparo()">Retomar disparo</div>';
                dynamicActions.innerHTML += '<div class="dropdown-item danger" onclick="excluirDisparo()">Excluir disparo</div>';
            }

            if (status === 'Cancelado' || status === 'Finalizado') {
                dynamicActions.innerHTML += '<div class="dropdown-item danger" onclick="excluirDisparo()">Excluir disparo</div>';
            }

            // Removido bot√£o "Adicionar Conex√µes" do menu de a√ß√µes - agora est√° no aviso
        }

        // Pausar disparo
        async function pausarDisparo() {
            const userId = getSecureUserId();
            const idDisparo = getCookie('idDisparo');
            
            if (!userId || !idDisparo) {
                console.error('userId ou idDisparo n√£o encontrados');
                return;
            }

            try {
                const response = await fetch('https://n8n.typebot.pro/webhook/pausar-disparo', {
                    method: 'POST',
                    headers: {
                        'Content-Type': 'application/json'
                    },
                    body: JSON.stringify({
                        userId: userId,
                        idDisparo: idDisparo
                    })
                });

                if (response.ok) {
                    console.log('Disparo pausado com sucesso');
                    carregarDetalhes();
                } else {
                    console.error('Erro ao pausar disparo:', response.statusText);
                }
            } catch (error) {
                console.error('Erro na requisi√ß√£o de pausar:', error);
            }

            document.getElementById('actionsDropdown').classList.remove('show');
        }
